E cauteriza aquel am autra cauteri deves la junctura del col en le derier espondil de lu.	And cauterize that with another cautery it must be done at the junction of the neck in the last vertebra.
E·l cauteri de lu sia clavilh sego la maniera precedent.	The cauterizer of him is to be held in the manner described above.
E aprop cura aquel am aquo que es precedit entro que sia sanat.	Then cure that with water that is preceded, so that it is healed.
Capitol .xxiiii.	Chapter.
De cauterizacio de malautia del pulmo e de tos.	On the cauterization of the malady in the chest and coughing.
Quan tos e malautia de pulmo so de humiditatz fregas e le malaute no ha febre ni tisic e es malautia antiqua, lahoras cauterisa aquel am dos cauteris sobre la furcula en les locz depremegutz leontz e buoytz; e am autra cauteri en le mieg loc del pietz entre dos mamillos; e sia le cauteri clavilh segon la forma precedent.	When coughing and lung disease are caused by moisture, and the fever is not high or there is a old cough, then cauterize that with two cauterizers on the furrow in the place that it is decomposed, and another above it between two breasts; and hold the cauterizer in the manner described above.
E si vols, sia la tua cauterizacio punctan am le cauteri que es apelat puncta, la forma del qual precedeys en la ponctacio de dolor de aurelhas.	And if you wish, your cauterization is to be with the pointed cautery that is called the puncta, the form of which you precede in the application to the pain of the ears.
E sian puntz entro cays ad aquels; e aprop cura aquel am aquo meteys que es precedit entro que sia sanat.	And make points within those; and then cure that with water, if it is preceded, so that it is healed.
E ya sia le cauteri haventz tres ramps quar cauterizacio es am aquel: am una veguada podes far tres cauteris segon aquesta forma:	And now the cauterizer has three ramps for cauterization: with one you can make three cauterizers according to this form:
Capitol .xxv.	Chapter.
De cauterizacio de titillic que es le cap del ajutori.	On the cauterization of titillation, which is at the top of the jaw.
Quan le cap del ajutori es dislocat per causa de humiditatz lubricas e no es fermat en la hora del sieu retornament deves la sua dislocacio entro que sia a lu aquo costuma de retornar, e aprop per un petit movement es deslocat ayssi que s’endeve, ayssi cum nos havem testificat, lahoras cove que primieyrament redusiscas la dislocacio, e aprop le malaute sia reversat sobre le sieu dos o sobre le latz sa; e aprop eleva la codena la qual es en la partida dedintz del citillic a las partidas desus am les ditz de la tua ma sinistra, si la junctura es dislocada a las partidas dedintz.	When the top of the jaw is displaced by slippery moisture and does not return at first in the hour of its return, you must reduce the displacement within that it returns to its usual place, and then turn the intestine that is on top of it towards the inside of the jaw at its ends with the fingers of your left hand; and then raise the cord that is on the outside of the jaw at its ends with your right hand, and let the cord be pulled back.
E aprop igneys le cauteri havent dos caps; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then burn the cauterizer that has two heads; and this is the manner of him:
E aprop cauteriza la codena entro que penetre aquela entro al autre latz; e vindra la figura de cauterizacio lahoras de iv caps cauteris.	And then cauterize the intestine within that it enters on the other side; and there will be a figure of cauterization with three heads.
e so aquel subtils segon la quantitat de tenta; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	and then make it subtle according to the amount of attempt; and this is the manner of him:
E alcunas veguadas es ajustat segon aquest comte i per que son les cauteris .viii.	And some are adjusted according to this count, and because there are the cauterizers.
E aprop pausa sobre le cauteri porys cuytz am sal, e aprop fay adherir le malaute a trenquilitat, e lo membre no sia maugut per alcun temps entro que sia confortat.	Then hold the pointed end of the cauterizer towards the skin, and then make it adhere to the area quietly, and let the member not be irritated by any time before it is comforted.
E si la dislocacio es a las partidas desus e tart es fayt aquo, lahoras cauteriza sobre le muscle am cauteri clavilh o am motz cauteris puntan, quar la junctura es confermada e la humiditat es romauguda e le malaute es sanat.	And if the displacement is at the ends and it is tight there, then cauterize on the muscle with a pointed cauterizer or with a sharp cauterizer, because the joint is confirmed and the moisture is loose and the intestine is healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter.
De cauterizacio del stomac.	On the cauterization of the stomach.
Quan veno en l’estomac freg e motas humiditatz entro que aquel extrazo de la sua compleccio e so multiplicatz raumases a lu, e si tu continuas las manieyras de curacio e no confereyso, lahoras cove que le malaute sia sobre le sieu dos ressupinat, e extenda las suas mas e las suas coysas, e aprop cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris: an un cauteri dejos le pietz per la quantitat d’un dit am cauteri clavilh, e am dos cauteris dejos del dos costatz del cauteri, entro que vengua la figura de cauteri triangulada; e elonga entre els que no sian ajustatz que faran poyredura.	When there is a flow in the stomach and loose fluids enter it from its whole circumference and then multiply, and if you continue the ways of cure and do not confer with them, then, when the intestine is on top of itself, return it by bending, and extend your hands, and then cauterize that with three cauterizers: one cauterizer leave the foot unbound for the quantity of a finger in the pointed cauterizer, and two cauterizers on either side of the two sides of the cauterizer, within that the figure of the triangle cauterizer is made; and make to pass between those which are not adjusted so as to cut them.
E si la profunditat del cauteri la quantitat de les dos terses de la grocesa de la codena.	And if the depth of the cauterizer is equal to the amount of the three times of the thickness of the intestine.
E sia la figura del cauteri segon aquesta forma ses addicio, E si vols, cauteriza am gran cauteri en le mieg loc del estomac segon aquesta forma; et aquest sia un cauteri segon la forma de cercle segon aquesta forma:	And be the figure of the cauterizer according to this form, and if you wish, cauterize with a large cauterizer in the middle of the stomach according to this form; and this be a cauterizer according to the form of the circle according to this form:
E sia cauterizat l’estomac punctan ad aquel que de aquest cauteri es spaventat: e es que tu senhes sobre l’estomac punt segon la quantitat que voles am tenta, e aprop cauteriza aquel am cauteri en les puntz; e aprop cura aquel am la curacio qu’es precedita entro que sia sanat.	And be cauterized the stomach with water that is afraid of that cauterizer: and it is because you feel on the stomach point according to the amount that you want to try, and then cauterize that with a cauterizer in the points; and then cure that with the cure that is preceded within that it is healed.
Capitol .xxvii.	Chapter.
De cauterizacio del fietge fret.	On the cauterization of the fret.
Quan endeve en le fietge dolor per fregiditat o per humiditat o per grossa ventositat entro que de la sieua normal compleccio sia getat per egressio superflua, e es curat le malaute am aquo que havem dit e no comfereys, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sua cervitz, e senhes am tenta tres cauteris segon aquesta forma et aquesta quantitat meteyssa sobre le fietge dejos dels ipocondres, la hon perve le decubit de home.	When pain in the breast comes from cold or moisture or a loose wind within that it is get from its normal circumference, and if you do not confer with it, then, when the intestine is on top of itself, return it by bending, and hold three cauterizers according to this form and this amount of water over the chest between the scapulae, and let this pass to the bed of the man.
E sia l’espazi le qual es entre quascun cauteri segon la grossetut del dit, e sia le cauteri segon la longitut del cors dreyta.	And be the space between each cauterizer according to the length of a finger, and be the cauterizer according to the length of the chest.
E no compremas la tua am le cauteri mot.	And do not press your hand with the cauterizer.
E si la quantitat de aquo que es adhurit la quantitat de la maytat de la specitut de la codena, e no y sia pus ajustat; e si le malaute stant sobre les pes de lu; e si no es estant, lahoras sia jassent, le qual ja ha extendudas las suas coysas, e eleve les sieus brasses.	And if the amount of water that is added is equal to half the thickness of the intestine, and it is not adjusted within; and if the intestine is on top of him; and if it is not lying down, then let it be lying down, which has extended its coysas, and raise its brasses.
E es aquesta la forma del cauteri:	And this is the form of the cauterizer:
E a tu es possible que cauterizes aquestz cauteris am cauteri cutellar, quan es am tu subtilitat e prudencia en l’art.	You can make these cauterizers with a pointed cauterizer when you have subtlety and caution in the art.
E guarda te que trop no procesiscas en la cauterizacio, e sia adhurida la specitut de tota la codena per que sia adhurit tot le cors e pervengua entro als budels, quar la codena aqui es subtil; e sapias aquo.	And beware that you do not process too much in the cauterization, and let the thickness of all the intestine be so that it is adjusted to the whole cors, for the intestine here is subtle; and know water.
Capitol .xxviii.	Chapter.
De perforacio de apostema del fietge am cauteri.	On piercing an apoplexy in the breast with a cauterizer.
Quan endeve excitura o apostema en le fietge e voles saber si aquel apostema es en le carn del fietge o en la tunica de lu, lahoras si es en la carn del fietge, le malaute atrobo gravitat e dolor ses acuitat.	When there is a excitement or an apoplexy in the chest, and you want to know if that apoplexy is in the flesh of the chest or in the tunica of him, then, if it is in the flesh of the chest, the intestine has great gravity and acute pain.
E si es en la tunica del fietge, am la dolor es acuitat gran e vezes que ja afatiguatz les metges la cura de lu.	And if it is in the tunica of the chest, then the pain is acute and great, and already you are tired with the cure of him.
Donc cove que·l malaute sia enversat sobre la sieua cervit; e aprop senha le loc de l’apostema am tenta; e aprop igneys le cauteri le quel es asemblat a rag, la forma del qual a precedit en l’autra pagina.	Then, when the intestine is on top of itself, turn it by bending; and then feel for the location of the apoplexy with an attempt; and then burn the cauterizer that is assembled of meat, the form of which was described in the previous page.
E cauteriza am aquel i cauteri entro que tota la codena sia comborida, entro que pervengua al ciphac, entro qu’en yesca sania.	And then cauterize with it and with another within that all the intestine is closed, so that it reaches the cipha, so that it heals in ash.
E aprop cura aquel per curacio dels autres apostemas entro que sia sanat.	Then cure that with other cures for apoplexies within that it is healed.
E no cove que de aquesta forma de cauteri use sino aquel del qual le estudi en l’art de medicina es prolonguat, e en las mas del qual motas malautias an conogut; mays aquest am esperiment alcunas veguadas sia ardit sobre aquesta operacio, mays empero leyssa aquela deves nos, e es miels.	And I do not know that this form of cauterization is used except that which was extended in the study of medicine, and at its end there were some subtle maladys; however, this one is to be tried sometimes on this operation, but most of all let it lie down, and it is better.
Capitol .xxix.	Chapter.
De cauterizacio de plauresi.	On the cauterization of plauresis.
Diyssero les antics cauteri de las razitz de aristologia a plauresi frega segon aquesta manieyra esser fazedor, e es aquest que tu prenguas de las razitz de aristologia longa secca una razit pun longua que es trobada, e sia de la grossetut del dit.	They said that the small cauterizers of the Aristotelian rasps are to be used in the way described above, and this is what you take from the rasps of Aristotelian long, and be of the thickness of a finger.
E aprop submergeys aquela en oli e eysen aquela al foc, e aprop cauteriza per un cauteri en aquel loc le qual es entre la continuacio de la furcula am le col; e am dos cauteris petitz dejos guidazi, un pauc declinans a la partida que es dejus la barba, e am dos cauteris en aquo que es declinant entre la quinta costa e la cizena, declinant un pauc a las partidas detras; e am autre cauteri en le mieg loc del pietz; et am autre sobre l’estomac, et am tres cauteris de las partidas detras; et am un cauteri en aquel loc le qual es entre las dos spallas, e am dos cauteris dels dos latz del pietz, dejos le cauteri le qual es entre doas spallas.	Then submerge that in oil and then burn it at the fire, and then cauterize with a small cauterizer in that place which is between the continuation of the furrow to the neck; and two small cauterizers on either side of the guide, one slightly declining from the beginning that is left, and two small cauterizers between the fifth rib and the chin, declining slightly at the ends; and another cauterizer in the middle of the chest; and another over the stomach, and three more cauterizers at the sides behind; and a small cauterizer between the two shoulders.
E no cove que compremas la tua ma am le cauteri, ans sia en le manifest de la codena en obra.	And do not cover your hand with a glove while using the cautery, for it will be in the open air.
E ja diyssero alscus antics que so alscus dels homes les quals uson de cauteri de ferr semblant a ray e igneysso aquel, e meto aquel en aquel loc le qual es entre las costas, entro que pervenguam am aquel ad aquel apostema e sia foragetada sania, ayssi cum havem dit en l’apostema del fietge.	And already some say that this is done by men who use a type of cauterizer similar to a ray or fire and place it in the area between the ribs until they reach the pimple and the skin comes off, and then we said about the pimple of the foot.
Mays en aquesta perforacio am cauteri no es ses temor, quar hu mor tantost ho accideys en le loc fistula a la qual no es sanacio.	In this hole made by cauterization there is no danger, because in that place it often happens without cure.
Capitol .xxx.	Chapter.30
De la cauterizacio de la melsa.	On the Cauterization of the Male
Quan tu curas la malautia de la melsa am aquo que havem dit de la curacio en la divisio e no confereys la tua curacio, lahoras cauteri en lu es segon tres manieras, las quals totas son dreyturieras, de las quals la una es que fassas tres cauteris o quatre linhan segon la longitut de la melsa segon la figura dels cauteris del fietge, la figura dels quals ha precedit.	When you treat the hernia of the male, we have already said about the treatment in the division and do not apply your treatment, then make three or four cauterizations according to the length of the hernia according to the shape of the cauterization of the foot, whose image has preceded.
E sia entre quascun cauteri la grossetut d’un dit o un pauc mes, e la manieyra del cauteri sia la manieyra la qual havem dita en le cauteri del fietge engualment.	And between each cauterization there is a size of a finger or less, and the way to make the cauterization is the same as we have said about the cauterization of the foot.
E no compremas la tua ma am le cauteri; e le malaute sia eves sobre lo sieu dos.	And do not cover your hand with a glove when using the cautery; and the patient is lying on their back.
E es autra manieyra de cauterizar, so es que tu igniscas le cauteri haventz dos vertimentz, la qual causa havem dita en le capitol de dislocacio del muscle, e elava la codena la qual es en le endreyt de la melsa la hon perve le jazer del malaute sinistre.	And another way to cauterize is that you ignite the cauterizer with two hands, which causes what we have said in the chapter on dislocation of the muscle, and raise the blade which is in the area of the hernia causing the pain of the patient.
E sia la tua elevacio am la qual elevas la codena segon la longuesa del cors, per que sian faytz cauteris segon la latitut del cos.	And your elevation is made in such a way that you raise the blade according to the length of the body, so that the cauterizations are made according to the width of the body.
E aprop entromet les dos vernimentz, ignitz mot, en aquel entro que am aquels penetres la codena de la autra part.	And approach the two hands, ignite, in that area where it penetrates the code from the other side.
E aprop extrayt le cauteri; e donc son faytz quatre cauteris.	And then remove the cauterizer; and there are four cauterizations.
E si voys, cauteriza am cauteri havent tres vernimentz.	And if you see it, cauterize with three hands.
E aprop tu cura le cauteri pus que aia laysat de getar brac per trops jorns, quar mays es comferent que las autras causas precedentz en la curacio.	And you cure the cauterization faster than it has been used for many days, because it is more certain that other causes preceding in the treatment.
Capitol .xxxi.	Chapter.31
De cauterizacio de ydropici.	On the Cauterization of Hydropsia
Cauteri no catz en ydropici sino en alcinte3 propriament.	Do not cauterize in hydropsia but only in a certain case.
Quan tu curas le ydropic am las manieyras de curacio las quals havem ditas en la divisio e no confereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que aquel cauterizes am quatre cauteris en le cercuit del embelic e am un cauteri sobre l’estomac, e am autre cauteri sobre le fietge, e am autre cauteri sobre la melsa, e am dos cauteris entre les spondils del dos, e un cauteri en lo dreyt del pietz, e am autre cauteri sobre l’estomac.	When you treat the hydropsia, apply the treatment methods we have said in the division and do not apply your treatment, then it is customary to cauterize with four cauterizations around the navel and one on the stomach, another on the foot, another on the hernia, and two between the ribs, and one on the right side of the feet, and one on the stomach.
E la quantitat de la profunditat del cauteri sia propdana a la spicitut de la codena.	And the amount of depth of the cauterization is proportional to the thickness of the code.
E aprop layssa le cauteri ubert per so que gete brac per lonc temps.	And then remove the cauterizer so that it does not get stiff over a long time.
E no evacuas le malaute de curacio aprop le cauteri am aquo que cove per que sian agreguadas a lu doas entencios, e sira festinada a lu am ajutori sanacio.	And you do not evacuate the male by treatment before cauterization, so that two drops are added to it, and the third is mixed with it, and the fourth is used for the application of the treatment.
La forma del cauteri am lo qual es cauterizat lo ventre sia clavilh segon que la forma de aquel es desus precedent, e es aquel am le qual es cauterizat le dos sia olivar segon qu’es precedent a la sua forma.	The shape of the cauterization applied to the stomach is square according to the shape that preceded it, and this is the one used for the two sides.
Capitol .xxxii.	Chapter.32
De cauterizacio de pes e de las coyssas.	On the Cauterization of the Feet and Thighs
Quan les pes so apostematz en ydropitz e so repletz de aygua sitrina, cove que cauterisas les pes sobre le dos del pe in nocrati aquo que es entre le auricular e le anular, e eleva la tua ma am le cauteri e no torses aquel; e aprop eleva la tua ma, e no retornes aquela de tot, quar l’aygua satrina rezuda.	When the feet are aching and full of water, it is customary to cauterize the feet with a little water between the little finger and the ring finger, and to raise your hand with the cauterizer and not twist it; then return your hand, for the water evaporates.
Es le cauteri segon aquesta forma: E aprop fay sobre las doas coyssas dos cauteris, e en quascuna coysa sia feyt cauteri am la extremitat del cauteri cutellar.	This is the way to make the cauterization: And then make two points on the thigh with two cauterizations, and a cauterization in the tip of each.
E sia le cauteri segon la longitut de la coyssa: i dejos le denolh e l’autre jos le mieg loc de la coyssa; e sobre quascuna coyssa dos cauteris.	And the cauterization according to the length of the thigh: and I leave it shorter at the top and longer at the bottom of the leg; and two cauterizations on each.
E layssa la plagua uberta ses curacio per lonc temps per so que alcuna aygua resuda de lu.	And you leave the cut open for a long time so that no water evaporates from it.
E aprop cura le am aquelas causas las quals havem ditas.	And you treat those causes we have said.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Chapter.33
De cauterizacio de cos de ventre.	On the Cauterization of the Belly
Quan cos de ventre es per freg e per humiditat entro que debelice las vertutz, so es la vertut digestiva e retentiva, las quals so en l’estomac e en les budels, e es curat aquo am las manieyras de curacio e no confereys, e vezes le malaute suffertan cauteri de vertut exhiberant, lahoras cauteriza aquel am gran cauteri sobre le sieu stomac segon que a precedit en la cauterizacio del estomac, am le cauteri del cercle e am quatre cauteris en le cercuit del embelic subtils, am cauteri clavilh subtil; e am cauteri sobre le alcatin sobre alozis gran, o am dos cauteris.	When the belly is sore and wet, causing digestion and retention, which are in the stomach and intestines, it is custom to treat with treatment methods and not apply them, and sometimes the patient suffers from the vertigo of exhibitionism; then cauterize it with a large cauterization on the top part of the stomach according to what has preceded in the cauterization of the stomach, with a large circle and four cauterizations around the navel, with a square cauterization; and a cauterization on the thin part above the loins, or two cauterizations.
E si vezes las humiditatz exhuberants e le malaute aquo tollerant, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre le pentenilh e sobre les budels, e fort leu ajustant dos cauteris sobre l’estomac e prop dels inguonas, quar es curacio perficent de juvament de la qual no erras.	And if the patient tolerates abundant humidity, then cauterize it on the pentagon and intestines, and firmly adjust two cauterizations on the stomach and close to the loins, for this is a perfect treatment for the health of which there is no cure.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter.34
De cauterizacio de emorroydas antiquas.	On the Cauterization of Ancient Hemorrhoids
Quan so en la natura derier emorroydas antiquas o una de humors grossas fregas o de humiditatz corrompudas, e son curadas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no confereys la tieua curacio, lahoras cauterisa am tres cauteris sobre le pus dejos spondilh del dos petit e petit triangular, e am cauteri desus le ombelic cays per dos ditz.	When there is a nature of old hemorrhoids or one of gross humors that infiltrate or moistens the area, it is treated as we have said in the division and do not apply your treatment, then make three cauterizations on the pus between the small ribs and the small triangle, and one above the navel, cutting two dots.
E si doptas que l’estomac de lu sia enfregidat e la vianda de lu no sia degerida, e la cara de lu vezes apostemada, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre l’estomac am gran cauteri segon que es precedit; e am un cauteri sobre fietge, e am autre cauteri sobre la melsa de lu am cauteri clavilh, e leyssa le cauteri per alcun temps ubert, e aprop cura lu entro que sia sanat.	And if you judge that the stomach of the patient is irritated and his food is not digested, and his face is aching, then cauterize it on the stomach with a large cauterization according to what has preceded; and one cauterization on the foot, another on the hernia, and leave the cauterizer for a long time, then treat the area that needs to be healed.
Capitol .xxxv.	Chapter.35
De cauterizacio de atheyl aprop la abscizio de lor.	On the Cauterization of Athell Near the Absence of Its Members
Quan tu abscindes atheyl, lahoras tu igneys le cauteri que es asemblat a ray.	When you separate athell, then use a type of cauterizer similar to fire.
Aprop entremet aquel ignit en aquel atheyl abscis, e ultima la tieua ma entro que pervengua le cauteri al orifici de la vena de la qual ve la sanc.	And then put the cauterizer on athell that is cut off, and hold your hand over the hole from which the blood flows out of the vein.
E fay aquo una vetz o doas, quar si achieyl son trops, lahoras cauteriza quascun de lor segon que havem recontat, e aprop cura aquels am aquo que confereys a lor dels enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And make one or two, because if the steps are three, then cauterize each one according to what we have said, and treat those with treatment that is applied, so that they be healed.
E si cauterizas am gran cauteri sobre alquatin, es mays derier en juvament.	And if you cauterize with a large cauterization on the thin part, it will lead to death.
Capitol .xxxvi.	Chapter.36
De cauterizacio de fistolas que son faytas en la natura derie en las partidas de lu.	On the Cauterization of Fistulas That Are Caused by the Nature of Later Steps in the Divisions of the Male
Quan la natura no obeziys a la obra la qual havem recomtada en son loc, e·l pacient es espaventat per aquo, sia sanat am cauteri.	When nature does not respond to the treatment we have recommended in its place, the patient is afraid of it, and he will be healed with treatment.
Donc quan ad alcun ve fistola en la natura derier, e es antiquada, corro sania de lu e humiditatz corrompudas, e donc aquo que es pus digne que cove es que proes aquela am tenta subtil, e aprop conoys la quantitat de la profunditat de lu am la devant dita tenta.	And when there is a fistula in nature due to the later steps in the divisions of the male, and it is old and rotten with humidities that infiltrate it, then apply treatment on it, and do not try it first, for it will cause pain; and reduce the depth of the treatment according to the front specified attempt.
Aprop igneys le cauteri que es semblant a ray.	And then use a cauterizer that is similar to fire.
E aprop met aquel cauteri ignit en aquesta fistula, e segon la quantitat en la qual intrec la tenta.	And place that cautery lit on this tube, and according to the quantity in which it intermixes, pour the wine.
E itera sobre aquela le cauteri entro que sian comburitz aquels cors corrumputz tost una veguada o dos o tres, segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	And repeat over that cautery inside which are burned those corrupted humors once or twice or three times, according to the quantity of your need.
E guarda te de combustio de nervi e de vena; o si fistula va al cors de la vesica o al cors del budel, lahoras guarda te de totz aquels locz; e no fassas aquo sino quan la fistula es en loc carnos e cogitas que no es penetrant.	And beware of burning of nerves and veins; or if the tube goes to the core of the bladder or to the core of the hernia, then beware of all those places; and do not pour water unless it is in a fleshly place and you think that it does not penetrate.
E aprop cura le loc entro que sia sanat.	Then cure the area within that is healed.
E si le loc es sigillat, e so abscindidas de lu las materias, e roman ayssi per lonc temps, lahoras sapias que ja es curat entierament.	And if the area is closed and there are no more materials to be removed, and it has healed for a long time, then you will know that it has been completely healed.
E si las materias no so de lu ostadas, lahoras sapias que es penetrant o en le preon de lu os corromput, o cays aquo de aquelas causas de las quals vindra rememoracio en son loc.	And if the materials are not held back by him, then you will know that it has penetrated or into the preon of his leg or comes from those causes from which remembrance will come to its place.
Capitol .xxxvii.	Chapter .XXXVII.
De cauterizacio dels ronhos.	Of the cauterization of the bumps.
Quan en les ronhos endeve dolor per freg o per grossa ventozitat, e per aysso le coyt del malaute es amermat, lahoras cove que cauterizes aquel sobre les ronhos am cauteri sobre quascun ronho am cauteri clavilh del qual precesic la rememoracio.	When the bumps ache from friction or strong wind, and because of this the patient's leg is tired, then you should know that it is necessary to cauterize each bump with a pointed cautery from which the remembrance comes.
E fort leu cauterizam am le segon un petit dejos, per que vindran tres cauteris liniatz, e donc siran mays deriers en juvament.	And very lightly cauterize it in two places with a small needle, so that three small scars will come, and then put them together with a quick motion.
Capitol .xxxviii.	Chapter.XXXVIII.
De cauterizacio de la vesica.	Of the cauterization of the bladder.
Quan accideys en la vesica debelitat e mollificacio per freg e per humiditatz ayssi que·l malaute la urina no retengua, lahoras cauteriza aquel en la partida pus dejos sobre la vesiqua, la hon comensan les pels del pentenilh, e cauteriza am un cauteri en la partida dreyta, e am autre en la senestra de lu.	When it happens in the bladder that there is pain and soften because of friction and humidity so that the patient does not retain urine, then you should know that he has a swelling on his penis, and at the beginning of the foreskin, and cauterize it with two needles on either side, and another in the right place.
E sia la longitut de quascun cauteri segon la cantitat dels not del pous; e cauteriza aquel am cauteri en la partida pus bassa del dos, o am dos cauteris si es necessitat.	And be the length of each cautery according to the quantity of the flesh; and cauterize it with a cautery at the lower end of the two, or with two cauteries if necessary.
E sia cauteri clavilh segon que es procesit.	And be a pointed cautery according to how it is used.
Capitol .xxxix.	Chapter.XXXIX.
De cauterizacio de la mayra.	Of the cauterization of the hernia.
Quan veno en la mayra freg e humiditatz, e per aysso es prohibida enpreignacio, e son corrompudas las mestruas de lu, e es tardada la provocacio de lor, e accideys dolor deves le haveniment de lor, lahoras cove que·l loc sia cauterizat am tres cauteris en le circuit del ombelic, ayssi cum havem dit en le cauteri de la vesica; e am cauteri sobre le loc pus dejos del dos, o am dos cauteris, e sia le cauteri clavilh.	When there is friction and humidity on the hernia, and because of this it causes pain, and because of that the patient's spermatic cord is corrupted, and the cause of it comes late, then you should know that the area must be cauterized with three cauteries along the navel, as was said in the cauterization of the bladder; and another cautery on the lower part of the two sides, or two cauteries, and be a pointed cautery.
Capitol .xl.	Chapter.XL.
De cauterizacio de la dislocacio de l’anqua.	Of the cauterization of the dislocation of the ankle.
Quan humiditatz moucozas so efundudas a la partida de la anqua, e so faytas causas del yssiment del sieu loc, e senhal de lu es que la coyssa es prolonguada sobre l’autre quan so comparadas entre lor.	When the wet feet are covered with liquid that leaks out of the core of the ankle, and because of this it is clear that the foot is swollen, and if one foot is longer than the other when they are compared to each other, then you should know that it is necessary to cut the bandages from around the foot.
E le loc de la dislocacio es atrobat en lu quays boyt.	And the core of the dislocation is turned inside out.
Adonc cove que cauterizas le malaute sobre la partida de la anqua de lu am cauteri a sercle semblant, pus que tu auras senhat am tenta en le cercuit de la partida ayssi cum es revolguda, e per so que la partida caia el mieg loc del cercle.	Then, when you cut the foot of the patient with a circular knife in a place similar to that which is swollen, taking care not to cut it on the outside as if you do not turn the circle, then the core will fall into its place.
E sia le cauteri del qual precedit la forma en la cauterizacio del estomac.	And be the knife with which the shape of the cauterization of the stomach is preceded.
E si aquest cauteri no es a tu present, lahoras cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris am cauteri olivar gran.	And if this knife is not at your disposal, then you should know that it is necessary to cauterize it with three olive-shaped knives.
E sia fayt le cauteri segon la quantitat de la ispicitut de tota la codena; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And be the knife according to how much the wound is painful throughout its core; and carefully cauterize that area within that needs to be healed.
Capitol .xli.	Chapter.XLI.
De cauterizacio de la vena sciatica.	Of the cauterization of the sciatic vein.
Quan dolor ve en la partida de anqua, e so causa de lu freg et humiditatz, le malaute es curat am aquo que havem dit e no confereys, e aquo es antiquat, lahoras cove que tu lacses le malaute de humors grosses am pillulas fetidas o am pillulas artificials o semblantz; e aprop cauteriza aquel.	When there is pain in the ankle and it is caused by friction and humidity, then the patient should be given water that has been mentioned before and not offer anything else, and if this water is stale, then you know that it lacks the medicines that are required for this; and carefully cauterize it.
E la manieyra del cauteri en aquela es segon dos manieyras: o cauteri am medicinas comburentz, o cauteri am foc.	And the way to use the cautery in that area is according to two ways: or cauterize it with burning medicines, or cauterize it by fire.
Sira segon dos manieyras scientas, de las quals es la una que cauterizes aquel sobre la partida de l’ancha de lu am tres cauteris triangulatz segon aquesta forma; e fay am aquels bona profunditat.	The second is that you cut it with a sharp knife in the shape of a triangle according to this form, and make them deep; then pour the medicine onto it.
E sia le spazi le qual es entre cascun cauteri la quantitat de la grossitut del dit e si le cauteri olivar o gran.	And be the space between each knife the quantity of its thickness; and if the olive-shaped knife or large.
Mays alcunas veguadas sia le cauteri sobre le mieg loc sobre le cap de l’anquan per que son quatre cauteris.	Some additional details are given about the cauterization of the ankle with four knives.
E si vols, cauteriza am le cercle del qual es precesida la forma en la cauterizacio de la dislocacio de l’anqua, la i que sia cercle continent e comburey la ispicitut de tota la codena.	And if you wish, then cauterize it with a circle that surrounds the shape in which the dislocation of the ankle is cauterized; and let the fire burn throughout its core.
E aquesta es la manieyra de cauteri in ciatiqua quan dolor es adherent al anqua e no es estenduda entro a la coyssa.	This is the way to cauterize when pain is attached to the ankle and does not extend into the sock.
Mays si es estenduda entro a la coyssa, lahoras cauteriza aquel am dos cauteris sobre la coyssa sobre le loc al qual envireys le malaute que es la dolor; e am un cauteri sobre la cavilha per quatre ditz un pauc deves la part cilvestra.	And if it extends into the sock, then you should know that it is necessary to cauterize it with two needles on either side of the sock in the place where it hurts; and make a point in the middle of the shin bone for four times, a little bit at a time, so that the core is burned.
E si le cauteri cutellar, e sia la profunditat del cauteri segon la quantitat de la ispicitut de la codena.	And if the knife used for cutting is sharp, and be the depth of the knife according to how much the wound is painful throughout its core.
E si le malaute envireys que la dolor es estenduda entro al loc prop les ditz des pes, lahoras cauteriza aquel aqui on envireys am cauteri per tres puntz o quatre o mays si indigeys de aquel.	And if the patient reports that the pain is extended into the feet, then you should know that it is necessary to cauterize it where the patient feels the pain; and make a point with three or four points, or more if desired, in that area.
E si le malaute envireys dolor esser dejos le donolh ves la coyssa, lahoras cauteriza aquel aqui am un cauteri cutellar.	And if the patient reports pain on the sides of the leg above the sock, then you should know that it is necessary to cauterize it with a sharp knife.
E guarda te en tota cauterizacio que no ultimes am le cauteri en tant que comburas nervi o gran arceria, e que per aquo a tu es sobre le malaute mal noccument o contraccio.	And remember in any cauterization that you do not offer a fire that burns nerves or causes great harm; and if by accident it comes to the patient's skin, then be careful that it does not cause pain or damage.
E yeu ja e vist un e autre de aquels les quals cauterizero sobre la cavilha e ultimero en la cauterizacio, e la cama foc inflada entro que la tumor aconseguit lo pe, e foc perforat e corromput tot le pe.	You have already seen one of those that I cauterized on the shin bone and the last in the cauterization, and the fire was so fierce within that it caused a swelling throughout the leg, and the fire pierced it completely.
E aprop accidic fort solucio de ventre, e aprop aquo la mort.	Then came a sudden solution to his stomach pain, and death followed him.
E si la dolor es en dos partidas ensemps cauteriza quascuna segon aquesta manieyra.	And if the pain is on both sides then cut it each according to this form.
E diysero les savis alcus en la cauterizacio de anqua cauteri del qual aquesta es la manieyra: fay semblant a cercle de ferr del qual le cercuit sia la maytat de un palm; e sia deves le sieu orrifici segon la grossesa de un os de datil o mens un pauc.	The wise said in the cauterization of the ankle, this is the way: make a circle of iron whose circuit is most of a palm; and it should be the distance between the holes according to the thickness of a date or half a palm.
E dedintz aquel cercle sia un autre tertz; e sia le spazi le qual es entre lor la quantitat del notz del pous; e sian aquels cercles ubertz de dos partidas; e sia la longitut de aquels cays un notz o dos notz, e fay en aquels margue de ferr decentment apparelhat en les cercles; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	And within that circle there should be another third; and be the space between them the quantity of the flesh; and let these circles be open on both sides; and this is how it is done:
Aprop sia ignit en le foc entro que s’enrogesisca e gete scintillas, e aprop sia pausat sobre la partida del anqua, le malaute colcat sobre le latz sa.	Then let the fire burn within that it gets red hot and makes sparks, and carefully place it on the ankle, leaving a space between the foot and the leg, so that the heat does not affect it.
E donc cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris redontz en una veguada.	And then cauterize it with three curved knives in one place.
E aprop layssa aquel per tres jorns; aprop emplastre aquel am boder e layssa la plagua uberta per trops dias; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then let it rest for three days; then apply a paste to it and leave the wound open for four days; and carefully cauterize that area within that is healed.
Diys Albucasis : o, filhs, de aquesta specia de cauteri pauc havem usat per la terror del reguardament de lu, e per aquo que paucs havem trobatz les quals reguardan sobre lu.	Diys Albucasis: Son few the cases of this type of cautery that I have used for fear of looking at them, and because few have found those who look at them.
Mays dels bos cauteris a lu qui les sufferta, et atroba am aquel le loc de lu.	More of these cauterization than the sufferer, and turn away from him that place.
Mays cauteri am medicinas adhurentz es que tu fassas dos cercles haventz armula perforada en la qual deyssen le guaffo de la porta de ferr; sia la longuitut de la paretz en la nauteza de lor sian dos nozes o quays aquels.	More of these medical instruments than the sufferer, so that you make two circles with a pointed awl on the door of iron; it is the length of the part in the shape of two nuts or keys that these are.
E si le spazi le qual es entre quascu la quantitat de la grossitut del dit; e sian ubertz dejos e desus, e sian que contenguan se entre lor segon aquesta forma:	And if the space between each amount is equal to the thickness of this one; and are opened from bottom to top, and that they contain themselves according to this form:
E aprop pausa sobre la partida de la anqua le malaut jasent sobre le latz sa, e comprem la tua ma sobre la partida de la anqua; e aprop pren de aygua cauda e fon la entre dos cercles, e la qualiditat de aquela sia am le foc petit a petit, e te aquela per la quantitat de una hora, e sufferta le malaute la mordicacio e la adhustio de lu — quar aquel atrobo mordicacio ayssi cum de foc — entro que cesse la mordicacio.	And put your hand over the opening of the anus while the patient is sitting on his legs, and press your finger onto the opening of the anus; and take a little tail of water between the two circles, and the quality of that is applied to the small fire gradually, and endure the pain of the patient for one hour — so that the pain stops.
E aprop eleva la tua ma am le instrument et abstergeys l’aygua cauda de tota la anqua am aygua dousa.	Then raise your hand with the instrument and wash the tail of water from all the anus with cold water.
E aprop leyssa aquel per tres jorns e pausa sobre aquel boder entro que sia la negror de la adhustio remauguda, e leyssa aquo per alcus jorns, e correra de lu poyredura; aquest es derier en juvament.	Then leave it for three days and put it on the border until the pain is relieved, and leave it for some days, and run away from him. This is the end of the cure.
E aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then this cure is good if it is cured.
E si la dolor es extenduda entro la coyssa o la camba, fay a lu estatua en lu que contengua aygua segon que es feyt en la anqua engualment.	And if the pain extends to the crotch or to the legs, make him sit in a position that contains water according to what is done in the anus.
E aquesta es la manieyra de aygua cauda, e yeu ja he scrit aquela en le tractat de la rectificacio de medicinas.	This is the way of tail of water, and I have already written that in the treatise of the correction of medicines.
Recipe de alcali e de caus no extinta de amdos ana partida una, e trissa les e pausa en una ola nova de la qual la partida dejos sia perforada per un petit trauc, segon la quantitat que intre en lu ray.	Recipe water of alkali and two separate parts one from another, and cut them into three pieces and put them in a new wave of which the opening is pierced by a small hole, according to the amount that enters into it.
E pausa dejos le fons de la ola autra ola enveyriada, e gete sobre aquel alcali e caus viva de aygua doussa la qual cobra aquels per un dit, e pus que tu compremes aquels am la tieua ma per bona compressio, e leyssa la hola que deyssenda de lu aygua aguda en la partida dejos a la ola enveyriada.	Then put the bottom of the wave into another wave wrapped up, and place it on that alkali and alive water of two parts which takes it by a day, and then, if you press those with your good hand, and leave the wave that sends away from him the sharp water in the opening of them to the wrapped-up wave.
E aprop ajusta tota aquela aygua, e geta la sobre autra caus viva e autre alcali renovelatz, quar aquela lahoras sira de mot forta acuitat, la qual es aministrada en motas operacios de medicina e en cauterizacio dels autres membres, quar operacio fa de foc.	Then adjust all that water, and put it on another alive cause and other alkali, because that one is strongly aggravated, which is administered in small operations of medicine and in the cauterization of the other members, because operation makes fire.
E so de las medicinas alcunas am las quals es cauterizat ancha, ayssi cum tezizic e mel anacrat e caus am sabo enayssi que sian mesclatz.	And then of these medicines a few that are cauterized broad, as well as to temper the fire and mix them with salt on the cause before they are mixed.
E Gualia recontet de un home dels antics la operacio e la curacio am la qual es curada dolor de anqua e de vena sciatica, e magnifiquet mot be esser de aquel, e diys que no hac necessitat de autra curacio, e quar es sanat per una veguada ayssi cum recomtec, quar fort leu aquel intrec en banh e eysic ja sa d’aquel.	And Guilia told of a man of the old people the operation and cure by which is cured the pain of the anus and the sciatic nerve, and he praised it very much as being of that good, and said that there is no need for another cure, and because it is cured by one taken thus as well as by fortifying it, because that man was greatly ill before.
Et es que sia pres de certarragi vert, e si no es atrobat vert, sia presa figua recent; e mot sia trissada am un pauc de grays e sia pausat sus la anqua en la qual es la dolor, o en la coyssa, o en la camba, e sia liat.	And it is that it should be taken of a certain type of fruit, and if not, it is taken very fresh; and one is trised with a little salt and placed on the anus in which the pain is, or on the crotch, or on the legs, and left.
E sia layssat per la cantitat de tres horas o per la quantitat que·l malaute centa cedacio de la adhustio.	And leave it for the amount of three hours, or the quantity that the patient can endure the pain.
E aprop met aquel en banh e donc quan le cors de lu sia enrozat, entromet aquel en le sol, quar la dolor cessa e es sanat.	Then put him in a bath and when his body is warm, insert him into the water, because the pain stops and he is healed.
E sapias que no cove que alcu use de cauteri am aquestas medicinas sino aprop la evacuacio del cors.	And you know that it is not necessary to use cauterization with these medicines but by evacuating the body.
Mays ja Escorides diysec que quan am fenda de cabra la vena stretica es cauterizada, aprofieyra a lu mo be; e sia le cauteri am lu segon aquesta manieyra: sia presa lana e sia enbeguda en oli antic, e sia pausat entre le pous del pe e entre le fossil.	More of Escorides also says that when the vein is tightened by a goat's tooth, it will be better for him; and this cauterization with him on this method: Take wool and dip it in old oil, and place it between the feet of the foot and between the toenails.
E aprop pren fenda de cabra secca e emflasma aquela am foc entro que sia fayta carbo; e aprop pausa lu sobre la lana e leysa la entro que sia estengida.	Then take a dry goat's tooth and ignite it by fire until it becomes a charcoal; then put it on the wool and leave it until it is dried up.
E aprop itera aquo, e no cessas far aquo entro que·l scintiment de la mordicacio pervengua entro al anqua e repausa la dolor.	Then repeat this water, and do not stop until the water reaches the sensation of the pain that penetrates into the anus and leaves the pain.
Et aquesta manieyra de cauteri es apelat cauteri de vaquas.	This method of cauterization is called cauterization by oxen.
Capitol .xlii.	Chapter LXXII
De cauterizacio de dolor de dos.	Of the cauterization of pain.
Alcunas veguadas dolor es en le dos per tropas causas, cum per cazement o per percucio o per superflua evacuacio, e per causas ad aquelas semblantz, per infusio de materia frega e humida.	Some pains are in the two parts by two causes, by rubbing or by percussion or by excessive discharge, and by those resembling them, by the infusion of friction and moist matter.
E cauteri no catz sino en aquesta sola specia la qual es fayta per efusio de materia frega.	And cauterization is not done except in this single specialty which is made by the infusion of friction matter.
Donc cove, aprop evacuacio del malaute am pillulas fitidas e am semblant a lor, que sian faytas sobre·l dos en le qual es la dolor tres linhas segon la latitut de lu, pus que senhas am tentha en quascuna linha v cauteris o mays, segon la quantitat que ve de la tolleransa del malaute e de la vertut de lu.	Therefore, it is an evacuation of the patient by pills which resemble them and are made on both sides according to the thickness of his body, so that there are as many in each line as there are in his body, because the tolerance of the patient and the virtue of the medicine allow it.
E sia fayta cauterizacio am cauteri de punt.	And make a cauterization by a small cautery.
E si vols, cauteriza am tres cauteris o am quatre am cauteri clavilh medial segon aquesta forma:	And if you want, cauterize with three cauterizations or four with a middle-sized awl according to this form:
Capitol .xliii.	Chapter LIII
De cauterizacio al comensament de gilbositat.	Of the cauterization at the beginning of gingivitis.
Motas veguadas endeve aquesta malautia als petitz enfantz; e senhal del comensament de lu en les enfantz es que accideys sobre lor estrectura en le ale eves la elevacio e·l movement.	Some cases of this disease occur in small children, and the onset of it can be detected by the development of a crackling sound when they move their jaws; it is from that beginning that the pain occurs in them.
E atrobas en le derier espondil del dos e dels notz de lu que ja comensa a sobremontar sobre les autres spondils.	And it begins at the last vertebra of the neck and the bones of the spine that have already begun to protrude beyond the other vertebrae.
E donc quan tu vezes aquo e voles prohibir, lahoras cauterisa aquel am cauteri que sia cercle segon aquesta forma:	Then when you see this water and want to stop it, then cauterize it with a small cautery which is made in the following form:
que prengua le cauteri sobre tota partida del spondilh engualment.	that takes the cautery onto all parts of the spine as one piece.
E si vols, cauteriza en le circuit del spondilh am le cauteri de punt dos linhas o tres.	And if you want, cauterize in the circuit of the spine with a small cautery made in two lines or three.
E sian les puntz propdas entre lor.	Those points are close to each other.
E aprop cura le loc entro que sia sanat am aquo que havem dit.	Then this cure is good for the place until it is cured with water that we have said.
Mays guarda que cauteri no sia administrat en gelbositat que sia fayta per spasme de nervi.	More should be kept in mind that cauterization is not administered in gingivitis which is caused by a spasm of the nerves.
Capitol .xliv.	Chapter XLIV
De cauterizacio de podagra e de dolor de juncturas.	Of the cauterization of gout and joint pain.
Quan dolor de juncturas son faytas per humors fregas les quals so enfundutz a quascun membre del cors, lahoras quan veno dolors en los pes, de costuma dels metges es que aquo apelen podragua propriament.	When joint pain is caused by cold humors which infiltrate each part of the body, and when pains occur in the feet, it is a sign that the body should be cleaned with a kind of medicine called podrague specifically for this purpose.
E donc cum es curada podagra de causa frega am manieyra de cura e no so remaugudas las dolors, lahoras las remau cauteri.	And then when this gout is cured by rubbing in a certain way and the pains are not repeated, then make a small cauterization.
E es que tu cauterizas aquel aprop evacuacio en le circuit de la junctura del pe am motz cauteris.	It is because you cauterize that with an evacuation on the circuit of the joint of the foot with a few cauterizations.
E sia cauteri olivar del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	Then make this olive cauterization, for which this is the form:
E si es necessitat que puntz sia fayt sobre la fassia del pe, lahoras fay am cauteri de punt.	If it is necessary to make points on the surface of the foot, then do so with a small cautery.
E si las dolors pujan entro als denolhs o a las autras juncturas, e aquo motas vetz s’endeve, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre quascun donolh am tres cauteris o quatre de tota partida am aquest cauteri olivar.	And if the pains press within the feet or towards other joints, and it is a long way to walk, then cauterize that with three or four cauterizations in total with this olive cauterization.
E si motz cauteris que aquestz cauteris sian a tu necessaris, lahoras cauteriza aquel e no premas trop la tua ma am le cauteri abans, sia tant solament enviro la specitut de la codena.	And if you feel that these cauteries are necessary for you to heal, then cauterize it and do not press too much on your hand with the cautery, but only surround the skin of the cord.
E si las dolors pugan entro al donolh e·l dos, lahoras aministra le cauteri le qual havem dit en le sieu capitol.	And if the pain is present in the thumb and also in the index finger, then administer the cautery that we have said in the previous chapter.
E si las dolors so en las mas tant solament, e es apelada suagra, lahoras puncta en le circuit dels focils ayssi cum se revolvo, puncta en aquels dos linhas.	And if the pain is present in both of them only, and it is called sugar, then make points on the circuit of the fire as it spins, making points on those two lines.
E si reman de las dolors en les ditz, lahoras puncta en le cercuit dels focils sobre quascun notz e sobre la pinche de la ma.	And if the pain remains in these two, then make points on the circuit of the fire over each finger and over the edge of the hand.
E si las dolors pugan aprop alscus jorns als coydes o als muscles, lahoras cauteriza les quascus de tota part dels ajutoris.	And if the pain is present in any part of the legs or muscles, then cauterize each one from all sides of the aid.
E no evacuas le malaute de bon regiment e de recepcio de medicinas, quar si es fayt bon regiment e flacma es evacuada am aquest cauteri sira sanat, Dieus ajudan.	And do not evacuate the patient properly or receive medicine, because if you do it well and clean with this cautery, God will help to heal.
Capitol .xlv.	Chapter 50
De cauterizacio de rompeduras.	On the cauterization of breaks/fractures.
Quan endeve rompedura en les angonars e diysendo les budels denant l’atela al genetiu, e aquo es comensan de aprop, lahoras cove que tu mandas al malaute layssar la sua comestio en le sieu dia e que use de causas leniens per so que la fenda deyssenda del sieu ventre.	When a break occurs in the thighs and you order the patient to leave his food alone for a day, and to use mild treatments so that the wound does not open up from the inside of his abdomen.
E aprop segua le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos, e comanda a lu que tengua le sieu ale entro que sia foro getat o aparesca l’atela o·l budels.	Then follow the patient between your hands on his back, and order him to keep his head within so that it does not move or appear, or the intestine or budge.
E aprop retorna aquel am les tieus ditz e senha am tenta la ruptura sobre le os del pentenilh am senhal la extremitat del qual sia semblant a la maytat de cercle a las subiranas partidas del cors.	Then return to the patient's back and try the break on the bone of the spine, taking care that it does not hurt or appear, but rather seems like a circular line from the bottom of the rib cage down to the hip.
E aprop igneys le cauteri del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	Then light the cauterizer in this way:
entro que sia mot rog e gete cintilhas.	within so that it is red and gets hot, and makes sparkles.
E aprop reduzeys le budel o l’atela a la sua conquavitat, e aprop pause la sua ma sobre le loc per so que le budel no yesqua.	Then return the intestine or hernia to its cavity, and place your hand over the area to prevent it from coming out.
E tu ja has ubert entre las coyssas del malaute e dejos lu as pausat un coyssi, et autre servent sia sus las cambas de lu, e autre sus le pietz de lu, le qual tengua las suas mas.	You have already opened the space between the patient's thighs and placed a cushion under them; another servant should be on their legs, and another on their chest, holding their hands.
E aprop pausa le cauteri sobre aquel senhal am la tua ma am cauteri stan dreyt, e te aquel entro que am lu consieguas le os del pentenilh entro al mieg del duiduni; e itera am aquel autra veguada si a tu aquel no has conseguit en la primieyra veguada entro al os.	Then place the cauterizer on that mark with your hand, holding it steady, and bring it close to the patient so that you can feel the bone of the spine at its midpoint; and repeat this process on the other side if you did not succeed in the first attempt within the os.
E observa saviament del ysiment del budel en la hora de la tua cauterizacio, que no comburas aquel budel per so que sobre le malaute no vengua in mort o autre gran malicia.	And observe carefully how the intestine moves during the cauterization, so that you do not burn that intestine and cause death or some other great evil to the patient.
E sapias que quan tu am le cauteri no atenhas le os, no confereys la tua operacio.	And know that when you do not feel the bone with the cauterizer, your operation is not complete.
E cove que·l cauteri dels enfants sia subtil segon le gran e la mesura de lor.	The cauterizer of children should be subtle according to their age and size.
E aprop cura le loc del cauteri per tres dias am boder entro que sia remauguda la scara del foc.	Then clean the area of the cauterization for three days, so that it does not become infected or scarred.
E aprop cura aquel am les autres enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then care for that one with the others within so that they are healed.
E le malaute sia jasent sobre le sieu dos per xl dias entro que sia sigillat le loc e la plagua.	And the patient should be lying down on his back for ten days, keeping the area clean and sealed from illness or plague.
E cove que pauses le nutriment de lu segon la longitut del temps de la curacio de lu le qual le linesca le ventre de lu, e que le budel no yesca fora deves le esforsament de guerir.	And do not stop the patient's nutrition according to the length of time for his healing, and that the intestine does not burn outside due to the effort of healing.
E aprop quan se vol levar aprop xl dias, lahoras aministra liament decentment fayt, e tengua aquel per autres xl jorns.	Then when it is time to remove the cauterizer after ten days, do so carefully and gently, keeping it for another ten days.
E sia mermat de trebalh e de replecio de vianda e de beure, e de votz vehementz, quar quan usa de aquest regiment de sanacio entiera sira sanat.	And with hard work and proper nutrition and beverage, and with great determination, because when you use this complete healing regimen, it will heal.
E yeu diyre la curacio de las rupturas en las autras partidas del ventre, e so al comensament, e vols que no treguan, lahoras cauterisa la ruptura d’aquel am cauteri redon segon la quantitat de lu, e sia aquo que es exhurit de la codena ayssi cum la tersa partida de lu; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit, e no es ajustat.	And direct the healing of breaks in other parts of the abdomen as well, beginning with the third part, and cauterize that break with a small amount according to the quantity, so that it does not stop; then clean that one with water, which comes out of the abdomen, and do not tie it up.
E ja diyssero alcus primiers que ruptura sia cauterizada am cauteri triangular segon aquesta forma, pus que es senhada am tenta:	And others have said that the first break should be cauterized with a triangular shape of the cauterizer, since it is marked in this way:
e es pausada linha que eys per la latitut en le latz pus sobira de la ruptura, e autra linha al desus; e depausa la tua ma am un cauteri clavilh, mays le primier cauteri es pus leugier e milhor.	And it is paused between the lines that go from the bottom of the break and up to the top, and another line from the bottom up again; but pause your hand with a nail, because the first cauterization is lighter and better.
Capitol .xlvi.	Chapter 60
De cauterizacio de torcio.	On the cauterization of twists/twists.
Quan endeve en alscus membres per cazement o per percussio dolor e persevera aquela dolor per lonc temps e no comfereys al u curacio am medicinas, lahoras cove que cauterizes am cauteri de punt.	When the pain is present in any part of the limbs by confinement or impact, and it persists for a long time and does not respond to medication, then cauterize with a pointed cauterizer.
E sia le cauteri de tot membre segon la magnitut e la parvitat de lu, e vertut e develitat de lu, e locacio de torcio e dolor de lu.	And the cauterization of each member according to its size and age, and its benefits and development, and its location of twist and pain.
Donc si·s sanat per le primier cauteri, bo es; e sino, lahoras itera sobre lu le cauteri; quar de costuma de aquelas dolors es que sian punctatz de membre ad aquel membre le qual apropinque al u, per que cove que consieguas aquels am cauteri entro que·l malaute sia sanat.	So if it is healed by the first cauterization, then it is good; otherwise, repeat the cauterization; because usually those pains are caused by punctures in that member, which come close to the body, so that you achieve with these cauterizations what is needed for the patient to be healed.
Capitol .xlvii.	Chapter 67
De cauterizacio de lepra.	On the cauterization of leprosy.
Les lebros alcunas veguadas am cauteri per mot gran juvament, e magerment si la specia de lepra que es fayta per putrefaccio de flacma e de melencolia.	Some leprosy can be healed by a great deal of cauterization, and moderately if the kind of leprosy is caused by the decay of fire and melancholy.
E donc cum tu vols cauterizar aquel, considera si la lepra es comussan e as aquela curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no deysen, ni esta, e temes sobre le malaute que la corrupcio comprehenda tot le cors de lu e tota la compleccio de lu, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre le cap am v cauteris: am un en le mieg loc del cap, e am le segon pus dejos de lu, eves le front a la fi dels cabels; e amdos sobre dos corns; e am un detras, sobre la nuca o servitz.	And so if you want to cauterize that one, consider whether leprosy is caused by fire decay and melancholy, and heal it with water as we have said in the division, and do not go further unless you are sure that corruption has reached all of his body and all of his complex; then cauterize that one on the head using two cauterizers: one at the middle place of the hairline, and another a quarter from it towards the back, facing the end of the hair; and both on either side. And one behind, over the nape or servitor.
E ultima la tua ma am le cauteri un pauc entro que emprema en le os una petita empressio, e de lu sian deslocadas las scorsas, per so que la expiracio de grossas vapors sia alleujada de lu; e cauteriza sobre la melsa segon que es precesit.	And last, your hand with a little bit of cauterization within so that it remains on the bone a small impression, and the scales have been moved away, so that the exhalation of thick vapors is relieved from him; and cauterize on his own hand as soon as needed.
E si la lepra es ja expanduda sobre le malaute e apar manifestament, lahoras cove que tu cauterizas aquel am aquels cauteris les quals havem ditz en le cap; e am cauteri sobre la extremitat del nas, e am dos cauteris sobre las doas maysselas, e am dos cauteris sobre dos spondils del col, e am vi cauteris sobre les spondils del dos, e am un gran sobre les spondils prop de la coeta, e un sobre la cotea , e am dos sobre las anquas, e am un sobre quascuna anqua, e am dos sobre les donols e un sobre quascun donolh, e am dos sobre les coydes, e am dos sobre les muscles, e am dos las teneretutz del sieu pietz; e cauteriza aquel sobre totas las juncturas dels ditz de las mas e dels pes, e sobre quascun talon dels sieus pes, e sobre les foscils de las suas mas.	And if leprosy has spread over the patient's body and appears visibly, then you should cauterize that one with those cauterizers we have said in the head; and one on the tip of the nose, and two on either side of the cheekbones, and two on the sphenoid bones of the skull, and one behind, over the jawbone; and one on each thumb, and another on each finger, and two on the top of the foot, and two at the bottom of the foot, and two on the spines of the hand, and two on the palms of the hand, and two on the shoulders, and one on each breast, and two on the sides of the ribs, and one behind the stomach, and one behind each knee, and two at the top of the thigh, and two at the bottom of the thigh, and one on each ankle bone, and one on each foot.
E guarda te dels nervis les quals so sobre le talo que no comburas aquels.	And keep away from those nerves that are over the skin because you did not burn them.
E alcunas veguadas es cauterizat am un cauteri sobre le os del pentenilh e am autre sobre la boca del stomac, e autre sobre le fietge.	And some are cauterized by a cautery on the bones of the pentil and another on the mouth of the stomach, and another on the feet.
E sapias que quant mays ajustas cauteris, tant es mays juvatiu e mays conferent; e sapias que le malaute no ha en le cauteri dolor, ayssi cum han les sas, per so quar le cors de lu ja es stupefayt.	And you should know that the more times you apply cauterization, the faster it will heal and the less painful it will be; and you should know that with the patient immobile in cauterization, the body doesn't feel pain any longer because it is already numb.
E cove que les cauteris sian grans o paucs segon les membres e las juncturas segon que es precedit de las specias dels ferramentz.	And depending on whether the members or joints are treated before applying the cauterization, either with a large or small instrument.
E aprop cura le cauteri am farina de errs coyta am mel e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then apply the cauterization with flour of erucous seeds mixed with honey and the other cure within so that it heals.
Capitol .xlviii.	Chapter .xliii.
De cauterizacio de stupor.	Of the Stupor.
Quan alcun membre es stabozit o adormit e es curat am medicinas, olis e emplastres, e no es sanat, lahoras tu cauteriza aquel membre stabozit am cauteris segon que merita la grandesa del membre o la parvitat de lu.	When any member is stiff or asleep and is not healed with medicines, oils, and plasters; then you cauterize that stiff member according to the size of the member or the age of the person.
E sia lo tieu cauteri intrant la ispicitut de la codena un pauc.	And this small cauterization enters into the essence of the wound a little.
E aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then apply that one with ointment within so that it heals.
E alscunas veguadas es cauterizada alcuna stupor le qual endeve a las mas e als pes, e als spondils del dos e ves le eysiment dels nervis les quals mavon aquel membre, e es remauguda la stupor.	And some are cauterized in the middle of the stiff member that goes to the top and bottom, and the nerves that move that member, and it is refreshed so that the stiffness goes away.
Mays no prusuma sobre aquo sino aquel que es savi en la anotomia dels membre e de la egressio dels nervis tot le cors moventz.	No more than this, unless one knows about the structure of the body and the exit of the nerves throughout the whole body.
Capitol .xlix.	Chapter.xlix.
De cauterizacio de albaras que es morfea.	Of the Cauterization of Morphed Albaras.
Quan albaras es antiqua e no comfereys a lu alcu dels enguentz de medicina, lahoras tu cauteriza sobre aquela am cauteri preon un pauc segon la quantitat de la specitut de la codena entro que sia remauguda la blancor e la color de lu, e la color de lu sia mudada.	When Albaras is old and doesn't conform to any of the ointments of medicines, then apply cauterization on it a little according to the essence of the wound within so that the whiteness and the color change, and the color of Albaras changes.
E aprop cura aquel am farina de errs e de lentilhas am oli rozat e am folhas de arnagrosa, e am sanc de colomba o am sanc de yronda, da cascuna sia una partida e totas sian mescladas, e aprop sia linit un drap e sus le loc sia pausat entro que sia sanat.	Then apply with flour of erucous seeds and lentil mixed with rose oil and leaves of arnica, and sanch of colombo or sanch of yaronda; a little of each is mixed, and a cloth is laid on the area within so that it heals.
Capitol .l.	Chapter.l.
De cauterizacio de cranc.	Of the Cauterization of Cranks.
Quan canser es comensan e vols aquel ostar, lahoras cauteriza aquel am cauteri de cercle en le circuit de lu ayssi cum es revolgut.	When the cancer has begun and you want to cut that part off, then apply cauterization on it in a circular motion while rotating it.
E diysero les savis que sia cauterizat am lo derier cauteri en le mieg loc; mays a mi no es vist aquo, quar temi que sia ulcerat, e yeu ja e vist aquo alcunas veguadas.	The wise ones said that it is to be cauterized with the last cauterization in its own place; but I haven' seen this, because I think that it is ulcerated, and I have already seen it ulcerated sometimes.
E es pus dreyturier que sia cauterizat en le circuit de lu am cercle ayssi cum avem dit, o am motz cauteris.	It is said that it should be cauterized in a circular motion around its own place as mentioned before, or with a pointy cautery.
Capitol .li.	Chapter.li.
De cauterizacio de adubilati.	Of the Cauterization of Adultered Ones.
Quan alcun adubilati es tardat en maturacio, e aysso es per la superfluitat fazen aquela, o per etat del malaute, quar es vielh en decrepitat, de pauc sanc, o per le temps, e tu vols festinar en la maturacio de adubilati; lahoras cauteriza en le circuit de lu am motz cauteris petitz punctan; e aprop leyssa aquela quar ela fastinara en maturacio.	When any adulterated one is delayed in maturation and becomes excessive, or by age of the patient, being old in decay due to age, or because of time, and you want to hasten its maturation; then apply cauterization around it with a small pointy cautery; and let that one fasten in maturation.
Mays si tu vols la perforacio de lu am cauteri, lahoras tu igneys le cauteri del qual aquesta es la forma de lu: e depausa aquel en le mieg loc de adubilati entro que penetre la codena.	Maybe you want to pierce it with cauterization, then apply the fire of cauterization, and leave that one in its own place among adulterated ones within so that it penetrates.
E si le cauteri en aquel loc que es pus dejos, per so que le cors del brac sia alleujat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And if the cauterization is placed in a place that is left alone, so that the body of the arm is relieved; then apply to it within so that it heals.
Capitol .lii.	Chapter.lii.
De cauterizacio de corrodent.	Of the Cauterization of Corrosion.
Corrodent es corrupcio ambulant en le membre, la qual corrodeys aquel ayssi cum a foc comedent lenha secca.	Corrosion is ambulatory corruption walking in the member, which corrupts that one as if it were eating dry firewood with fire.
Donc si vezes aquel corrodent en loc le qual sufferte cauteri am foc, lahoras tu igneys cauteris clavils motz paucs, e grans segon que es convenent en aquel loc en le qual es corrodent.	Therefore, if that corrosion is in a place where it suffers cauterization with fire, then apply cauterization with a small pointy cautery, and large according to what is appropriate in the place where the corrosion is.
E aprop cauteriza aquel de tota partida entro que erradiques tota la corrosio e no romangua alcuna causa de lu.	Then apply cauterization completely, within so that you eradicate all corrosion and don't interfere with any cause of Albaras.
E aprop leyssa aquel per tres dias, e pausa sobre les locs cauterizats solpre trissat am oli mesclat entro que las scaras sian totas eradicadas e tota la corrupcio.	Then leave it alone for three days, and apply a compress with ointment mixed within so that all the scars are completely eradicated and all the corruption is gone.
E aprop cura aquel am enguentz carn engendrantz.	Then apply to that one with a fragrant ointment.
Mays si aprop tres dias vezes que la carn nasca sana en la qual no es corrupcio, bo es; mays sino, lahoras itera le cauteri sobre aquo que es romas en les locs corrumputz.	Maybe if three days have passed and the flesh grows again in a healthy way without corruption, then apply cauterization on it again because it will re-corrupt; otherwise, repeat the cauterization on the places that are corrupted.
E corrodent es medicat alcunas vetz am medicina aguda, quar aquela es meza en loc de cauteri.	Corrosion is cured with some medicines sometimes, because corrosion is half a place instead of cauterization.
Mays empero cauteri am foc es de pus leugier juvament.	However, cauterization by fire helps to heal quickly.
E yeu ja e dit la curacio de lu am medicina aguda en la divisio, e donc pren aquela quan de lu auras endegencia.	I have already said that the medicine for Albaras is effective in dividing it, and now take it when you need to leave the patient's side.
Capitol .liii.	Chapter.liii.
De cauterizacio de claus e dels autres semblants.	Of the Cauterization of Claws and the Rest of the Semblants.
Motas veguadas endeve a las partidas dejos del pe malautia que s’apela clau, e es causa grossa, fentrada, la qual ladeys le pe; e cauteri en aquels es segon dos manieyras, so es cauteri am foc e cauteri am aygua cauda.	The claws of the bad-tempered patient are sometimes broken, and this is a gross cause, causing the foot to hurt; and cauterize them in two ways: with fire, and with water tail.
Mays cauteri am foc es que igniscas le cauteri concau semblant a pena de voltor, le qual sia feyt de ferr segon la quantitat la qual contengua le clau de tota partida, e sia de subtils marguas.	Maybe cauterization by fire is what ignites the cauterized claw like a torch, and that is made of iron according to the amount it contains in the claw from the very beginning, and it is refined to a sharp point.
E aprop pausa aquel ignit sobre le clau, e aprop revolveys la tua ma am le cauteri en le circuit del clau entro que·l cauteri pervengua a la profunditat del clau.	Then let that claw ignite, and rotate it with your hand near the fire so that the cauterization reaches its depth.
E leyssa aquel per tres dias entro que comense getar brac.	Then leave it alone for three days within so that it starts to burn the arm.
E aprop emplastre aquel am malvas salvatges trissadas am sal, e leyssa le emplastre sobre aquel per una nuoyt, quar aquel sira eradicat de las suas razitz.	Then apply ointment on it with dried sea-weeds cut into three pieces, and leave the ointment on that one for a new thing, because it eradicates its roots.
E aprop cura le loc am enguent de carn generatiu entro que sia sanat.	Then apply to that place with a fragrant ointment generated within so that it heals.
E si so no-convertitz, e motas veguadas accideysso en la superficia del cors, majorment en las mas e les pes, lahoras cove que tu aministres en aquels cauteri am aygua, e es que prenguas una quannula de eram o de ferr o de pena de voltor, e pausa aquela sobre le clau; e aprop geta en la quanula de aygua cauda pauca cantitat, e rete la tua ma, e tu revolveys aquela am compressio de la tua ma de tot, e sia enpremut le marge de la canula en la razit del clau, e atrobara la aygua cauda via al preon de la razit del cau; e espera le malaute un pauc la mordicacio de l’aygua cauda per una hora, e aprop remau aquela, quar le clau am las suas razitz sira erredicat.	If it doesn' convert, and sometimes it happens on the surface of the body, mostly on the hands and feet; then, when you apply cauterization with water tail, a little amount at a time, and rotate your hand; let that water fall slowly into the claw'a hole a little at a time, and return your hand, and now turn that one with a compress of your hand from top to bottom, and plug the edge of the claw'a hole with the compress, and wait for the patient' arm to stop biting the water tail; then remove that one.
E ayssi fe am aquels la i aprop l’autre entro que venguas sobre totz les quals de lor so en le cors.	And then apply to those ones again until you go over all of them in the body.
E aprop cura aquels pus que las razitz dels claus so erradicadas am aquo dels enguentz les quals la carn ve engenran.	Then apply ointment on those places where the claws were to eradicate any infection with water of the ointments that the flesh generates in the body.
Capitol .liiii.	Chapter.liiii.
De cauterizacio de tremor.	Of the Cauterization of Tremors.
Quan endeve ad alcu tremor per freg en le nervi o per febre de causa frega, o per autra causa semblant, lahoras cove que tu cauterises aquel am quatre cauteris o am v sobre les spondils del dos, entre quascun spondilh am un cauteri; e am cauteri en le pietz de lu, e sobre l‘estomac de lu, am cauteri olivar.	When there is a tremor that bites the nerves or due to fever from scratching, or similar causes; then, when you apply cauterization to that one with four cauterizations or five on the spine between each spine with a cautery; and one cauterization on the feet, and another on the stomach, and another on the back, and another on the neck.
E la tremor de lu se repausa e festina la sanetat de la malautia frega.	And the tremor of that patient is relieved, and the healing begins quickly because of the fever.
Capitol .lv.	Chapter.lv.
De cauterizacio de albati accidentz al cors.	Of the Cauterization of Unintentional Injuries to the Body.
Quan en le cors so espellitz albati, e so pustulas fendas las quals so feytas de materias grossas corruptas; donc cove al comensament cum apareyso, que sia cauterizat sobre tot cap de la fistola am cauteri subtil am fustz de mirt, la extremitat del qual es estenduda am foc; o am razitz de erestologia longua; o am cauteri lentecular.	When in the body there appear white spots and pustules that are formed from corrupted thick matter; therefore, at first sight of these, it should be cauterized over all the fistula with a gentle cautery made with a mirth stalk, its extremities being spread with fire; or with long erestology; or with lente-cautery.
E alscunas veguadas es cauteri ademamil al comensament de la sua expulcio segon aquesta manieyra; e no so cregudas, e es disrumpuda la superfluitat fazens aquels, et sana de aquels.	And some veins are cauterized at the beginning of their discharge according to this manner; and they are not widened, and the surplus fluid is stopped by doing so, and cured from that.
Mays empero cove que aquo sia fayt aprop evacuacio am fleubotomia.	But however, it should be done that this is done with a fluid drainage.
Capitol lvi.	Chapter LVI.
De cauterizacio de fluex de sanc accident per incisio de arceria.	Of the cauterization of a fluid flow from an accident by incision of an artery.
Tropas veguadas endeve fluex de arceria que es inciza deves la plagua la qual endeve deforo, o deves la incizio de apostemas o cauteri del membre, e alor semblantz, e es dificil remaura aquel.	Trous veins that flow by incision of an artery must be cauterized or incised at the root, or cauterized at the root of the apotheosis or cautery of the member, and then it is difficult to repair them.
