E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	And so you will continue with that thread inside up to the back of it.
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	Then you will cut the nose in the base of the lacrimal bone with a sharp knife or tiny scissors and leave the flesh of the lacrimal bone exposed so that by incision it doesn’t produce continuous tears.
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And sometimes the ice is spread with a thin layer of oil or fat, then it is cut as if it were a piece of leather, and so that the shape of it is preserved:
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And remember that with the knife you don’t touch the clear skin, and that the rupture isn’t deep, and that the pupil is punctured.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Then incision gets into the foot a little bit of salt mixed with fine sand or something similar to cut off some hair, and leave it inside until another day; and then cure that with water so that it is healed.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	If the ice is not nervous and you can't put in the needle, or it doesn’t stay on top of the ice, then this special kind of ice is cured with medicines, and so it is healed with eye drops and recommended in the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	If you want to cut that ice, then open the patient's mouth and take a sharp knife according to this form:
am subtilitat.	with subtility.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	And if the ice is rarefied and is hard to cut with a sharp knife or salt mixed with something similar, then distil it from your mouth in the hole of some hair, and leave the hole inside for another day.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat the operation on that ice until it is completely broken down, except for water, because then you leave it and cure the swelling at the beginning so that it is healed.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat your operation on that ice with reason so that it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The removal of the lacrimal flesh, if it is a great problem in the foot, should be suspended with oil; cut that ice from one side, and don’t finish the incision so that the tears don’t flow continuously.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	Then distill in the lacrimal hole something similar to cut off some hair until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter XVII.
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	Of incision of a foetus in the womb and of water born of animal blood in the foot.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Some blood mixed with urine is born in the eyelids of a cow and is placed inside so that it covers the pupil, or moves closer or further from the eyes, and presses the eyelids together like pillars, and is joined to a column.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	The operation is that the patient stops his head in the air, and opens his eyelids and collects all of that blood with a needle or basket convenient to water, and then water at the beginning so that it is finished with the incision, and remember the foot that doesn’t cut off your work.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	And be your incision the same way that you cut those or with a sharp knife which we have recommended in cutting the ice, or with tiny scissors according to which form it takes; and remember this chapter for guidance when cutting the ice.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	Then, when your incision is complete and all of that blood has been removed, fill the foot with salt mixed with something similar to the medicine that corrossives, and place it over the foot in case of a swelling caused by cutting off some hair within the womb so that it doesn’t occur.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	If there is any cause of algardenices and it is hard to cut off some hair within the womb, so that you don’t cause a swelling, then leave the foot and cure that swelling with water so that it heals, and repeat your operation on that ice with reason so that it is healed, and make a scar in the animal flesh which occurs in the foot of this species.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	However, remember that you don’t remove any cure of the foot by natural or accidental means through fire, and don’t put your hand in any of these operations until you see that the member is suffering from those operations.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter XVII.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	Of blood collection in the foot.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	These veins are hard and cover the foot so that you can’t see your work, and the foot is kept longer for days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore, it is necessary at the beginning that you consider whether the foot on which the blood is strong and not another disease than blood, then collect that blood.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And it is that you order the patient to stop his head in the air, and suspend those veins with an oil or two according to your prudence; and make those oils double according to this form:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	or two oils gradually in one part according to this form:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	Then those veins are collected with scissors and dried with subtility, and abstain from working them for a while, so that the veins are not re-formed on the foot and are shredded.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And remember that you don’t cut the foot with the edge of a knife; and if your work is in the morning before the sun rises, and hold fast to your work so that you don’t cut off any blood vessels.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	Then when you have finished, then distill in the foot strong water or salt to corrode that blood which is re-formed from blood.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	If water is not possible to collect at that time, then collect all of it with a needle and leave it for some days so that the pain of the foot is numbed, and ensure that swelling caused by cutting off hair is prevented.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat the same way again if necessary so that it is healed.
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	And this is the form of the scissors:
Capitol .xix.	Chapter XIX.
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	Of reducing aridity to the nose.
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you treat aridity with cauterization or acute medicine according to the narrative that precedes it and it is not healed, then don’t make it in it but prepare for a swelling due to the cutting off of hair necessary for maturity of it, and extract all moisture from it which is inside it and the air within it so that it can be discovered the bone.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And then when the bone is discovered and rusted or blackened, then you cut it with this instrument whose form is as follows:
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	It is called a sharp cap, and made of hard iron, and so made that it is sharpened with a point of lime or rounded with a point of subtility (and so made in the following form).
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	And place it over the spot where the bone is infected, and turn it between your fingers, and gently press your little finger into it little by little so that you can feel the infection has been removed.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	Then have a few holes drilled, and restore the area with caustic and drying agents.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	So if the area is well healed and good flesh covers it and the scar is separate from the sound part of the body for ten days, and does not become inflamed or suppurate again, then you will know that it has been cured.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	And if not, then instead of making an incision along the nose, do so in the shape of a V; and thus: for you to cut along the nose, then you make an incision following this shape:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	The tip of the iron is triangular, and the handle slightly curved at the end; thus, when you cut, the curve follows this shape:
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	Then place it over the bone, and keep your hand near the lacrimal; and move your hand slightly forward from the handle, and gently turn your hand towards you so that the point penetrates all of the bone, and the patient feels a pulling sensation as it goes in; and thus, with this movement:
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Then restore the area with caustic medicines that dry it out as well; thus, if it is healing:
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	If the flesh does not heal over the area then the matter that has been discharged from the wound returns to the nose; therefore, place a little salt on the patient's nose.
Capitol .xx.	Chapter 10.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	On the Reduction of a Tumor on the Nose.
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the tumor is complete and nothing hinders or decreases it, then know that you should loosen the nose bandage, and continue with the following: and then blow into the nose regularly with steam, and then place a liniment on the nose made of oil of rose, aloe, sage, and zinc oxide; and then tighten the plaster over the nose with powder.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	And the method of making the powder is that you take sheets of sheepskin, and each sheet is doubled over four times; and make these sheets into powder.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	Then place those sheets on top of each other according to the quantity that the nose requires.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	Then tighten those sheets on top of each other with a strong, tight bandage; and then continue with the steam treatments as mentioned above; and then remove the bandage at night, and let the nose rest in a warm position.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	Perhaps if, meanwhile, the ligature becomes soft, then know that it should be tight.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	Then remove the bandage at night as well; thus, you have everything said.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	And if the nose has already been reduced in size, then it is good; and if not, then repeat the plastering with powder and tightness and steam treatments until it is healed.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter 11.
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	On the Incision of a Tumor on the Eyebrow.
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When the tumor disrupts the eyelid, and it is large and prominent, then cut out the eyelid with a sharp knife as if cutting a hair; and thus prepare the form of a man with that; and then insert the blade into the root of the eyelid on the side nearest the lacrimal bone, and let it penetrate; and then cut along the blade, and take the first blade according to its position; and then continue cutting along the double edge of the blade, and tighten it at the end; thus, you have described the form of a man:
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	Then remove the blade and place it over the nose with wool infused with milk of Magnesia; and let it remain until it hardens.
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	Then treat the nose with water that comforts it, so that the plague is healed.
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	In certain cases, a large bandage is placed over the entire nose, and is adjusted to fit the eminence; and it is pierced with a fine needle that enters through the edge of the nose, and runs the liquid albumin, and dips the nose and enters as well:
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	Then tighten it so that it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 12.
De curacio de alconati.	On the Treatment of Eye Diseases.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This malady, which is called alconati, is nothing but a disease that is made in the nose resembling running water, and it is not that one.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	Perhaps the method of working on it is that you make the nose burn with a hot iron, and place your two fingers on its sides; and then see if the disease comes to the parts near the eyes, and if it does not run down, and if it remains dry, and if the light does not hurt, and if the patient can see; and thus:
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	If it does not run down, you will know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	If it is not prepared for the descent of the disease with water as mentioned above, then place a sharp needle over the eyes and pierce through the eyelids, cutting towards the corner of the eye (where it meets the conjunctiva) on the eyeball's corona; thus, the disease will be forced out.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Then, once it is forced out, you will know that the water is being distilled in the nose; and prepare a solution of water, to which you have added honey or water in which you have already brewed fenugrec and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	Then treat the other causes as well, so that it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 12.
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	On the Treatment of Water Descending from the Nose.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	I have already mentioned the spices of water in the division and how to pierce them with a sharp instrument; then proceed as follows:
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	Then know that you should make the patient burn with a hot iron between his two fingers over a plate; and thus place your finger on its sides, and then see if the water descends; and if it does not, then treat it as mentioned above.
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	Then place your hand on the eyelid of the affected side of the nose; if the water descends into the left side of the nose, then it is the left eye; or if it descends into the right side, then it is the right eye.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	Then place your right hand on the forehead, if the nose is left-sided; or with your left hand, if the nose is right-sided.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	Then place the end of your hand on the forehead, just above the eyebrow; and let it remain there until it hardens. Then remove it with a sharp knife and treat the patient as mentioned above.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	Then pierce into the nose's albumen, and feel that the albumen is already reaching the eye cause;
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	Then know that the measure of the path of the albumen to the eye is equal to the measurement of the pupil within the edge of the dark ring, and it is the nose' crown; because you will see through the nose' pupil with clarity thanks to the conjunctiva layer.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	Then place the albumen within the space in which the water is; and then throw it down with another sharp instrument, and if the water descends quickly, then know that the patient's sight has been restored; and if the albumen falls into the eye, then treat it as mentioned above.
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	Then wait a little; and if the water descends, then remove that other sharp instrument before the albumen falls into the eye.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	Then, when it stops descending and has hardened, remove it easily with a sharp instrument; and then wash the nose inside with clear salt water extracted from gems, and with milk of magnesia mixed with rosewater and albumin of sheepskin; and finally, tie the nose with wool infused with rozmarin oil and milk of magnesia.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	These are the days that we who live now must bear upon this world, over which there comes a cloud of death.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if you do not obey your body when it craves food for its hardness - for there are some men for whom hunger is harsh - then know that you should take the spoon which is called an albutro, and this is the way to use it:
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	And therefore pierce that joint with your knife, and do not place your hand on the spot, and do not delay in applying the poultice to the soft skin.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	Then introduce the food as I have described.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	And you must compliment your own work, preparing the patient's sleeping place nicely in a dark room, and prohibiting all movement.
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	And place water on his head so that its nature is cool, and do not touch his hair to the right or left.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	Then prepare the body according to its disposition within the third day.
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	Then remove it from that dark room and examine the body closely, and return it to its place within the seventh day.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	And do not place water on him in the hour of the cure or at any other time; rather, apply the infusion.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	When you have removed water because it pollutes the body greatly and vigorously with regard to its sight.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	May it happen that a fever arises suddenly; then, if you remove the body before the seventh day, and apply water to calm the fever.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	Then you shall wash his face and place it in a dark room for several days; it is in the dark room that it will be cured of its fever.
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	And then remove it from that room gently and talk to it about its causes.
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	And you should know that in an abortion the disciplinarian cannot excuse himself from seeing certain visions, and then you must be diligent about the operation.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	And we have already encountered some of those who are subject to the Art, and some said that they cause fire in the Air; and one says that he pierces the air with his knife, and water flows out of it.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	But there is nothing strange in our country that has achieved water by piercing; and no water is produced from some of the ancient elements; perhaps it is new.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	These are the ways of magical herbs so that they affect those who do not know them:
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	They are made of iron or steel in its own right, and the two ends of this triangle are sharp, one end being subtle.
Capitol .xxiv.	Chapter 24.
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	Of the cure for nose bleeding.
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When various meats are pushed together in the nose, and some cause of it is gathered because of the weight of the blood; this disease is called polyps, since it resembles a mass of meat in shape.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And of him is carnivorous meat, with the appearance of a lion, not with the color of the fox.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	Then place the foot of the patient between your thighs and put it on the sill, and open the nostrils with a pointed instrument; then cut the tip of the nose in those meats.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	Then take the meat off the bone, and cut it with a sharp knife that has been greased; then, if any of it is left, take it with a pointed instrument easily, so that none remains except what you want to remove, for there is no reason to remove more.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	May it happen that a fever arises suddenly and is cool, then remove the water; or if it is a malignant fever, then cut and cauterize it completely, leaving no holes.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	Then remove any agate from the nose, sharp as a blade and as cold as water or as wet as you can.
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	May it happen that the nose bleeds, and if it is a wet heat within the palate, then know that it is healed.
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	May it happen that if it does not penetrate further, then know that there is nothing inside except bones and cartilage; and no bleeding has occurred.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	Then place the knife firmly on the food, and cut it into pieces of the same size; then, between each piece, measure the quantity with your fingers, and hold the foot of the patient between your thighs, and insert an end of the knife into the nose from below or from above for any reason that may be possible.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	And then water will flow, and its odorant will enter the passages of the nose, and be exuded on its skin, since children are attracted to such things in school, and it is a cause that one wants to do this.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	Then place both ends of the knife, one coming out of the nose and the other inside it; then cut the meat into pieces with your fingers, and water will flow within that you know has reached the end of the meat; for if not, then place the knife back in the nose from below or above.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	Then remove the knife, and take care in the nose to cut off the tip of a bone, and water will flow for three or more days within that which is irritated by the flesh; and let it be covered with ointment.
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	Then at the end of this cause, place in the nose a pipe made of lead to drain it over time until it is healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	May it happen that if you want to use this cure, then do so.
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	And this is the form of the instrument with which water and medicine are distilled in the nose:
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	Water made from silver or iron, which looks like a small flame lit up, as well as a small spoon and the meat resembling.
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	And if you wish, make a closed pipe with a tube and the tube of the instrument that purifies being flat, visible; to which you can attach it when you drain the water or medicine from the patient's nose, and hold it in your hand while doing so.
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	These are the ingredients of a good purifier: resin from the boxwood tree, white balsam, gingerbread, goldeneuse, long pepper, escallion, and ephetums with spice. Give with blood and water extract, and make pills; and if a pill does not dissolve in the drink, then remove it from the patient' nose while they are sleeping.
Capitol .xxv.	Chapter 25.
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	Of the treatment for nosebleeds in the extremities of the nose.
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	The vision of a nosebleed in the extremities of the nose is magnificent and striking within a few days when it seems to be getting worse because of its appearance.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And then remove that foot at the beginning of its appearance; and if you want to avoid bleeding, then place a piece of meat on it.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	Then place over the spot, or cauterize or apply medicine that burns in its place.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	May it happen that if the cutting of the nose is delayed until it is magnificent, then know if it is Lapidary, with its color being dark and its texture being soft, and do not touch that foot with metal, since it is a cruel fever; for the vision of this fever is great over the person who has it.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	And if the fever is sharp and not of dark color, and sometimes it can be cut in all parts; then remove the foot and cut the nose with a sharp knife, and cure the spot with water that heals and distills within it so that it may be healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter .xxvi.
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	Of the surgery of the nose and lips, and of the ear when continuity is interrupted by plague or similar causes.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Do you know that when surgery to restore continuity in one of these cartilages is performed, it succeeds in only a few men?
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	So, when any such cause as mentioned above occurs to him, you should consider if it is fresh plague; then adjust the two lips of the patient with sutures and carefully heal the wound.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	And if the lips that were severed by the wound are now healed, and each one is healthy again, then you should cut off the hair on the area with a scissors, making sure not to injure the skin.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust the two lips with sutures and strengthen them, and sprinkle the wound with dragon's blood and turpentine, and place a plaster of silver or any other hardening plaster on it, leaving it for two days or three, and then remove it and replace it with another plaster, allowing the flesh to come away by itself from the skin, and carefully heal the wound.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	The method of suturing is that you add the solution to restore continuity, or with needles as mentioned above in the suture of the belly, or you add the solution to the wound, and make sure to let it dry completely.
Capitol .xxvii.	Chapter .xxvii.
De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	Of the removal of those causes that cause problems in the two lips when they are split.
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors.	This is sometimes seen in men as a result of the split in their lips: small hard lumps resembling grain; and some are small and some are large.
Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat.	And when you have removed the hard lumps from both lips, and cleared each one of them thoroughly: sprinkle the wound with turpentine until the plague is cleansed, and wash it with water that has been made stiff; then carefully heal the wound.
Capitol .xxviii.	Chapter  .xxviii.
De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	Of the incision of meat that is sutured to the gums.
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	This is a great deal of information about the removal of meat from the gums: when the young ones are taken care of by white milk, then you should suspend that meat on a string or thread and cut it off at the right time; then allow the blood to run out or the plague to be removed.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	Then apply a little turpentine or another drying powder to the wound.
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	And if that meat returns, then cut it again, but do not cauterize it, as cauterization will not help.
Capitol .xxix.	Chapter .xxix.
De razo de dentz am ferr.	Of teeth that cause pain.
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	When, on the surface of teeth that are split within, and between the gums, are some rough spots, and some small lumps are black and become yellow or green through the gum, and some teeth are loose:
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	And when you have made the incision between your teeth and placed a finger on top of them to prevent them from moving, and rubbed the teeth where those spots are: if they do not cause any discomfort, then remove the blackness and yellow and other spots with a file; otherwise, leave them alone.
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	Then if the cause of the pain is in those teeth at the beginning of the root: do not repeat the treatment; but if it is in a later place, then repeat the treatment three times: first on one side, second on the other, and third time on both sides, until you arrive at the last segment.
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	Do you know that teeth require different shapes and forms of the roots depending on the operation to be performed?
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	And because the roots of the teeth that split within have different shapes depending on whether they are cut between the teeth or in other ways: these forms of rasors must be properly prepared, which you will see soon enough.
Capitol .xxx.	Chapter   .xxx.
D’eradicacio de dentz.	Of tooth extraction.
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	Then when you have healed the tooth from its pain: extract it slowly and thoroughly, as there is no reason to delay the extraction of the tooth when it causes pain; for it is a substance that is eliminated in the extraction process.
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	Then when the incision is forced for the extraction of a tooth: you must carefully determine which tooth is painful; otherwise, you may extract a sound tooth and cause pain in it, and we have seen this happen in many operations on the teeth.
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	Then you must carefully determine which tooth is painful; and when you know it well: cut off the gum from around the tooth at its root with a scissor, so that it dissolves from the gum completely; then remove it with pliers or small scissors little by little until it comes out whole.
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	Then hold it firmly with two strong tweezers or a clamp; place the tip of the tooth between your thumbs, holding it firmly so as not to break it; and remove it with pliers or small scissors in such a way that you do not break it into pieces, nor hurt the patient's mouth.
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	And if it is not a root canal: then take one of those instruments, and remove it with ease as if it were cut at the beginning.
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	Then if the tooth is loose or corroded: make sure to use a scissor and a sharp string; cut off the root with the latter, so that it does not break in your hand when you remove it.
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu.	And when you cut the gum completely around the tooth: hold it firmly so that it does not break and cause pain; then return to the patient' mouth; if you need to remove a tooth that hurts more than another, do so first.
E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat.	And remember that you will not cause any harm by removing their teeth: for the great men who have difficult teeth to extract, and whose roots are long, or some of them, or by extracting one of them with a number of bones: this has been witnessed by many.
E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	Then the extraction of it be washed thoroughly with water that is made stiff; or with a mixture of salt and water.
E si endeve fluxs de sanc per aysso, ayssi cum motas veguadas endeve, lahoras trissa alcuna quantitat de zegi e aspergeys sobre la plagua, e si no confereys aquel zegi, cauteriza.	And if there is bleeding during extraction as often happens: then cut off a little blood and sprinkle it on the patient; or if you do not have it, cauterize it.
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	The shape of the tweezers and forceps must be small at the end from which the tooth is removed: it should have a fine grip on the tooth; it should not be twisted when used; they should be sharp, but not blunt.
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	And the handle should be large enough to hold comfortably: it should not twist when used; it should be sharp but not blunt.
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	And they are made of iron of Indian descent: the handles should be straight ends; those that curve inwards should be placed next to those that curve outwards; and those that curve inwardly should be shaped like the beak of a bird; and some of these curved ones are very small, so that they can be held comfortably.
Capitol .xxxi.	Chapter .xxxi.
De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	Of the extraction of teeth and breaking of bones of the mandible that are broken.
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	And when you should extract a tooth that is broken and causes pain: pause over the area with a probe for a day or two until the area becomes soft; then insert pliers or small scissors into the opening of the tooth: use tweezers or forceps with curved ends, shaped like the beak of a bird:
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	The extremities of them are made to go inside like with almond or olive oil.
E si no obediys a tu a eyssiment am aquestas forceps o tenalas, lahoras cove que tu caves sobre la razit e descrobas tota la carn e entrometas le instrument le qual ha nom atali, so es palanca petita del qual la forma es aquesta:	And if you do not obey to him and pull with these forceps or hold them, then note that you make the cut on the root and open all the flesh and introduce this instrument which has no name, so is a small lever whose shape is this:
E sia de breu extremitat grossa un petit, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	And it should be of thick end a little one, and not be embedded so that it does not break.
Donc si per aquo la razit es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, ajuda te am aquestz autres instrument dels quals aquestas son las formas: la forma del primier instrument es de triangulada extramitat en la qual sia alcuna grossesa:	Therefore if by water the root is dried up, it is good; and if not, help you with these other instruments whose shapes are these: the shape of the first instrument is triangular at its end where there is some thickness:
La forma del segon instrument es que sia de triangulada e de pus subtil extremitat.	The shape of the second instrument is that it is triangular and has a slightly pointed end.
E ja so ajudatz am aquest instrument havent dos ramps del qual aquesta es la forma aprop la seguent:	And you are helped with this instrument having two ramps whose shape this follows:
e am autres instrumentz les quals precidero en rasura de dentz; quar juvament es fayt am aquest instrument le qual es asemblat a onci gran, e aquesta es la forma:	and with other instruments that will be necessary to remove teeth; because quickly it is made with this instrument which is assembled like a nut, and this is the shape:
de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	of the triangular end bent or short, which has some thickness, and not be embedded so that it does not break.
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	And you should know that the dental instruments are similar to the others.
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias.	May the artisans be wise and careful in their work, for according to this, it is necessary to make different operations and treatments; because there are many diseases that the old did not know or stop properly by using instruments of various shapes.
Mays si es trinquat l’os de la mandibula o dels autres osses de la boca, o si poyreys, lahoras sia pes curat sobre aquel en son loc am aquo que es a lu convenient dels instrumentz e de las forceps las quals havem dit en la extraccio de las razitz de las dentz, e ajuda te am gesti del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if the bones of the jaw or other bones of the mouth are broken, it is necessary to take care about that in its place with water that is convenient for them of the instruments and forceps which we have said in the extraction of the roots of teeth, and help you with gestures of which this is the form:
E sia en lu alcuna grosseza petit a petit, e sia instringida o tenguda am la boca per que no evasesca o fuga entro que l’os de tot sia foro-getat; e aprop restaura le loc am medicinas convenientz ad aquo.	And it should be of some thickness to small one, and be stretched or tied to the mouth so that it does not escape or run away until the bone is completely dried up; and then restore the place with appropriate medicines according to water.
Mays si en l’os es petita poyredura, lahoras ratz aquel de aquela poyredura e de la sua negror, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And if in the bone there is a small hole, then cut that from that hole and from its blackness, and take care about it so that it heals.
Capitol .xxxii.	Chapter 32
De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	Of the cure of prominent teeth compared to others.
Quan las dentz so eminentz no segon lor cors natural per aquelas la forma es laga, e majorment quan endeve a las femnas, e majorment a las piuselas venerablas; donc cove que tu consideras: si dent es nada aprop autra dent, e no es possibla sarradura ni linament de lu, lahoras radica aquela; mays que no sia annexa am autra dent, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am aquest instrument del qual aquesta es la forma; e es semblant a morr de porc, e sia feyt de ferr de India de extramitat mot aguda.	When prominent teeth are not in line with the natural course of their companions, their shape is wedge-shaped, and more so when they affect the elders or venerable women; therefore you should consider: if a tooth is not next to another tooth, and cannot be split or oiled, then break it; but if it is attached to another tooth, then cut it with this instrument whose shape is this: it is similar to a pork tusk, and is made of Indian iron of triangular pointed end.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscideyses aquela en trops dias per la duricia de la dent, e que no sia comauguda autra de las dentz.	And be your incision with which you cut that in two days because of the hardness of the tooth, and that it is not connected to another of the teeth.
E si es dent eminent expausat a limadura, lahoras lima aquel am lima de ferr de India del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if prominent teeth are cut by grinding, then grind that with iron of Indian origin whose shape is this:
E sia tot de ferr de India e·l margua eysament; e sia de motz menutz puntz ayssi cum lima am la qual son faytas agulhas, am la qual la dent sia limada pauc a pauc en motz dias am fecilitat, per so que no sia autra dent comauguda e caga.	And all of it is made of Indian iron and the edge is slightly pointed; and are made with almond-shaped points using a sharp knife, grinding the tooth little by little in two days with ease, so that another tooth does not connect to it and become stuck.
E aprop lineys aquela en la fi, e ratz aquela am alscus razoris.	And then close that at the end, and cut that with razor blades.
E si es dent del qual una partida es trinquada e lideys la lengua, lahoras cove que tu limescas aquel entro que l’aspretat de aquela fraccio sia ostada e engualhada, e sia aplenada per so que la lengua no ledesca ni la paraula no corrumpa.	And if a tooth is broken on one side and the tongue touches it, then note that you grind that part which is sharp and worn out, and make it flat so that the tongue does not scratch or the word does not corrupt.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Chapter 33
De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	Of the restoration of damaged teeth with gold or silver wire.
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When a tooth is hit or damaged by impact or falling, and the patient cannot bear more than that which is attached to gold wire, and you have not healed with your medicine, then change it so that it does not get infected; and use gold wire instead of silver, because silver becomes green and must be sharpened again after a few days, but gold never changes.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	And be the wire in such thinness and thickness according to the amount that can enter between teeth; and the shape of the incision is that you take the wire and double it between two healthy teeth, and grow it twice around the wire between two gold fillings, or if one or two, then let the thread reach the healthy tooth on the other side.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	And repeat the incision as many times as necessary to reach the end of the tooth from which you started, and strengthen your grip with ease and care until it is not tight.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	And be your tightening with which you tighten the wire to the roots of teeth that do not escape.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	And then cut the excess of the wire with forceps or tweezers, adding them in such places, and making them disappear between the healthy tooth and the gold filling, so that they do not hurt the tongue.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And then leave that stretched as it is with thread.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	And if it is slipped or broken, then tighten it or them with another wire in such a way throughout all the time.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	This is the shape of teeth and the figure of an incision of two healthy teeth and two gold fillings, thus tied:
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	When one or two teeth move back to their places, and are sharpened as described above, and remain so.
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	And do not make this except for skilled and experienced doctors.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	And some are suitable for the root of a cow's tooth, and is made from them in the shape of a tooth, and is placed in its place where it fails, and is tightened as described above, and remains so for a long time.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter 34
De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	Of the incision of the tongue that is seen in the tongue and prohibits speaking.
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	This tongue is seen sometimes leaving the tongue for some time or is natural to him who has it, or happens accidentally because of a wound that has already healed.
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	And the operation in it is that you open the mouth of the patient, his head is raised up; and then cut that nerve with a sharp knife according to its width so that the tongue does not stick to it.
Mays si en aquela es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.	And if in that there is hardness or pain, and water stands because of the consolidation of the wound, then cut that with oil and make it smaller according to its width so that the nerve does not remain cut and remains soluble.
E guarda te que no sia fayta fissura en le preon de la carn e que scindas aqui arceria e vengua flux de sanc.	And take care that there is no made crack in the meat of the tongue, and here cut here is hard and bring water to flow from the blood.
E aprop sia lavat le vestigi de la inscisio am ayguaros o am vi agre o am aygua frega; e aprop pausa dejos la lengua licini; so es meca la qual tengua le malaute dejos la lengua en quascuna nuoyt per so que no sia consolidat autra veguada.	And then wash the trace of the incision with water or soap or clean water; and then leave the tongue alone for a moment so that it does not consolidate again; and so finish this task, leaving the patient's tongue alone.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, pausa sobre le loc vetriol trissat; mays si le sanc ventz, lahoras cauteriza le loc am cauteri lantiginos le qual conveneys ad aquo.	And if there is a flow of blood, then put it on the spot with a bitter taste; and if the blood flows out, then cauterize that place with a common cauterizer that brings water to boil.
E aprop aquel cura am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And then heal that one with other diseases as they heal.
Capitol .xxxv.	Chapter 35
De extraccio de ranula dejos la lengua.	Of the extraction of a tonsil without hurting the tongue.
Alcunas veguadas accideys dejos la lengua apostema asemblant a nomla petita prohibent la lengua de la sua operacio natural; e fort leu es magnificada entro que huempla la boca.	Sometimes there is an apтем on the tongue that looks like a small piece of meat, and it prohibits speaking; and when it becomes loose, it is great danger to the mouth; for it opens the way for food.
E la operacio en lu es que huebras la boca del malaute sesent devant le solel e considera le apostema.	And the operation on him is that you make an incision in the mouth of the patient in front of the sun and examine the abscess.
E si tu le vezes de fusca color o de negra, dur, al qual le malaute no atroba sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel quar es cranc.	And if you see that it is a red or black color, hard, where the patient does not feel sensation, do not touch that part as it is tender.
E si es declinat a blancor, en le qual es humiditat, lahoras tu met le onci en lu, e inscideys aquel am spatum subtil, e inscindeys le de tota partida; e si sanc te ventz en la hora de la tua operacio, lahoras tu pausa desus zegi trissat, so es vetriol, entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	And if it is white in color, where there is moisture, then put the vinegar on him, and scrape that with a sharp knife, and scrape all of it; and if blood comes out in the hour of your operation, then pause for three days, because it is acidic, until it stops bleeding.
E aprop retorna a la obra tua entro que lo haias trayt am compliment de lu, entro que sia lavat am vi agre e sal; e cura aquel am l’autra curacio ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then continue with your work until you have taken care of him completely, washing him with vinegar and salt; and heal that with the other treatment using water until it is healed.
Capitol .xxxvi.	Chapter .XXXVI.
De extraccio de apostema de doas aurelhas e de aquel que es nada en le golayro e de las autras apostemas.	On the Extraction of Abscess from Two Ears and on That Which Is Not in the Jaw and Other Abscesses.
Quan endeveno en le golayro godat, so son glandulas las quals son asembladas algodat, las quals accideysso deforas e son nompnadas doas aurelhas, las quals quan tu las curas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no es sanat, lahoras tu considera si le apostema es dur, de fusca color, de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr.	When it happens in the jaw, there are glands that are gathered together, which happen unexpectedly and are called two ears, which, when you treat them with water that I have mentioned in the division, and they do not heal, then consider if the abscess is hard, of red color, of little sensation, do not touch that part with iron.
E si es de roga color e la razic es grossa, lahoras no toques aquela am ferr per le flux del sanc; abantz layssa aquel entro sia madurat, e lahoras o tu trauqueras aquel, o sira romput per si.	And if it is a red color and the root is thick, do not touch that part with iron because of the flow of blood; let it mature, and then either you pull it out or she cuts it off herself.
E si es de blanqua color, radon, e la razit de lu es subtil, lahoras aquel es que cove esser inscidit.	And if it is a white color, soft, and the root is small, then that one should be incised to see if it can be cured.
E la operacio en lu es que consideras, denant la tua operacio, si ja ha repausat le apostema de lu caut am repaus complit o si es deminuit am alcuna deminucio; e lahoras fay sezer le malaute denant le soleyl, e·l cap de lu sia en le tieu se, e huebre la boca de lu, e le servidor prenent entre las suas mas prema la lengua de lu dejos am instrument mot noble del qual aquesta es la forma:	And the operation on him is that you consider, before your operation, if he has already healed his abscess completely or if it has decreased in any way; and then place him in front of the sun, with his head between his legs, and make an incision in the mouth, and the servants hold his hands behind, holding a noble instrument by which this is the form:
E sia fayt de argent o de aram, e sia subtil cum cotel.	It should be made of silver or bronze, and it should be sharp with a point.
Donc cum tu premes am aquel la lengua e es mostrat a tu la apostema, e catz sobre aquel le tieu vezement, lahoras pren onci e fica aquel en l’amenla, e tira aquel a las partidas defora tant quant podes.	Then when you press on him with your finger and show the abscess to yourself, and place the onion on it, then tie it with a knot, and pull it apart as far as you can.
Otra aquo que tiras alcuna causa de las tunicas, e aprop incideys aquela am instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	Or if any fluid comes out when you press, then consider that one with the following form:
e es asemblat a forceps, empero las extramitatz de lu son corvadas, ayssi que l’orrifici de quascuna de aquelas es en le endreyt del autra, mot agudas, le qual sia de ferr indi enbegut.	it is assembled with forceps, however, the extremities of it are curved, so that the opening of each one is at the end of the other, very sharp, which should be made of iron in a particular way.
Mays si aquest instrument no es a tu present, lahoras inscideys aquel am spatum del qual aquesta es la forma de lu: E sia agut de la una part, no agut del autra part.	If this instrument is not with you, then scrape it with a blade, which should be sharp on one side but not sharp on the other.
E pus que has inscidit una mella, inscideys l’autra segon aquesta meteyssa manieyra de inscizio, e aprop la inscizio le malaute guarguarise de aygua frega	And after you have made one incision, make the other according to this method of incision, and then the incision will be cured by washing with water.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, guarguarise aygua de decoccio de scorsa de milgrana o de fuelha de mirtra e semblantz ad aquel de las causas stiptiquas entro que·l flux del sanc sia restreyt, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	If there is blood flowing from the incision, wash with water made from oak gorse or orange peel and similar to those of the causes of bloodletting until the flow of blood stops, and then heal it as if it were healed.
E alcunas veguadas naysso en le guolayro autras apostemas otra aquelas doas aurelhas, e inscideys aquelas segon que yeu e dit en la inscizio de doas mellas engualment.	Some are located in the jaw and other abscesses are those two ears, and scrape them according to what I said in the incision of two cuts alike.
E yeu ja fu medicat una femna de apostema le qual era nat en le golayro de lu, le qual apostema tendia a color fusca, de pauc sentiment, le qual ja havia claus le golayro de lu, e la femna respirava am meat streyt, e ja havia prohibit a lu comestio e beure de aygua, e ja era pervenguda a la mort si mays agues stat per un dia o per dos.	I have already treated a woman with an abscess that was born in her jaw, which abscess was of red color and had little sensation, which had already closed her jaw, and the woman breathed normally, but she had forbidden her to eat or drink water, and she was close to death if she did not stay like that for another day or two.
E l’apostema ja tant havia pugat que havia mezes dos ramps entro que eyssiro per dos traucs.	And the abscess was already very large, having three fingers in length, and it was coming out through two passages.
Donc yeu me cuytegui fisturalment e fiquegui en un de lor onci, e tiregui aquel, e atirada es de lu gran porcio, e aprop yeu incidigui aquela de on comprendegui del autre trau, e aprop yeu obrigui la boca de lu, e compremegui la sua lengua, e aprop yeu fiquegui le onci en aquela apostema.	Then I hid myself from him carefully and took one of his onions, and threw it at him, and a large piece came out, and then I incised that one where I could understand the other, and then I closed his mouth, and pressed his tongue, and then I tied the onion to that abscess.
E aprop yeu abscizi gran partida de lu, e no corria de lu sino un pauc de sanc.	And then I cut him open wide, and there was no pain from it except a little blood.
Donc absolut es le guolayro de aquela femna, e comensec tantost beure aygua, e aprop presec vianda, donc yeu no cessegui inscidir de aquela apostema motas vetz per lonc temps, e succesia apostema en loc de aquel, le qual inscizia entro que es prolonguat aquel.	Then I completely opened the jaw of that woman, and he began to drink water again, and then I stopped scraping that abscess for a while, and that abscess became in place of that one, which I had incised, until it healed over it.
Donc yeu engen agui e cauterizegui le guolayro de lu, donc astec de addicio; e aprop yeu perambulegui e no saubi que fec Dieus de aquela aprop mi.	Then I went and cauterized his jaw, and then I walked around and did not know that God was with me.
Capitol .xxxvii.	Chapter XXXVII.
De inscizio de huvela quan es apostemada.	On the Incision of a Breast When It Is Swollen.
Quan catarr deysen a la huvula, e es apostemada e es longa, lahoras ela es nompnada perpendicular; e si es en la partida dejos grossa e redonda, e lahoras ela es apelada buba.	When it drains on the breast, and it is swollen and long, then it is called an upright bubble; and if it is thick and round at the base, then it is called a sitting bubble.
Mays quan es curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio, e no comfereys la tua curacio, e eyssament ja vezes que apostema caut ja es ostat de lu e es subtil, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquela que es agreguadas redonda; e si es ad aquela longitut, e es sanguina, de fusca color o de negre, e no es a lu centiment, lahoras cove que tu temtes la inscizio de lu, quar en aquela es temor sobre le malaute.	If it is cured with water that I have mentioned in the division, and your treatment does not work on it, and if it is swollen again and is soft, then consider that you scrape that one that is round; and if it is long and bleeds a little, of red or black color, and it does not hurt much, then consider that you scrape that one.
E quan tu vezes aquela segon la manieyra que yeu he dita de la sua blancor e longuesa, que tu fassas sezer le malaute e premas la lengua de lu am instrument del qual procesic la sua forma e aprop fica le onci en la nuva, e tira aquela en jos e inscideys aquela am un de dos instrumentz les quals e ditz en la inscizio de dos mellas.	And when you see that one according to the way I have described to you of its whiteness and length, then consider that it is a new one, and press his tongue against the instrument with which this form is made, and then tie the onion to it, and pull it apart as far as you can.
E cove que no inscidas aquela sino aquo que es ajustat sobre le terme natural ses addicio, quar si tu inscides de lu mays, lediyras le sieu parlar.	And consider that you do not scrape that one unless it comes out naturally on its own, because if you scrape it more, it will make him talk more.
E aprop la inscizio, usa de aquo le qual havem recomtat en la inscizio de dos mellas, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And then the incision, use water with which I have described in the incision of two cuts, and heal it as if it were healed.
Mays si era le malaute espaventat per la inscizio de lu, cove que use de engen en la cauterizacio de lu ses temor, e la manieyra del cauteri en lu no es sino am aygua aguda, e es que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se, e aprop prem la lengua de lu am le instrument le qual havem dit, e aprop pren de l’aygua la qual havem dita en le capitol de cauterizacio, e comfeys am aquela caus viva, e pausa aquela no spessa ni subtil, e de aquela omple la concavitat de l’estrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	If the patient was frightened by the incision on him, consider that you use water in cauterizing him with his own fear, and the way of cauterization on him is not but to pour sharp water, and it is because you pause the end of the patient's tongue against the instrument which I have mentioned, and then dip that into the water which I have described in the chapter of cauterization, and then heat that with fire, and do not let it get too hot or too cold, and then fill the concave part of the instrument with it:
Sia la extramitat de lu conquavitat en la qual sia pausada la medicina ayssi cum la conquavitat de culher de ray, e pausa le strument am la medicina sobre la vula, e·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu latz per so que corro saliva o musellage de la boca de aquel per la intrinscequa medicina, per so que no deyssenda de aquela deguna causa sobre le golayro de lu e que ledesca aquel.	be it the extension of his tongue, which is concave, and pause the instrument with medicine on his throat, and the patient chews because of the medicine inside, so that it does not come out in a certain way, and so that he swallows it; and this will prevent him from speaking or making a noise in his throat, so that those who are near do not hear what he is saying.
E aprop te la tua ma am la medicina, e exprem aquela sobre la uvula per l’espazi de miega hora entro que vegas aquela esser denegrada e sedada per la mordicacio de la medicina.	And then place your hand on the medicine, and press it over his throat for a long time, up to an hour, so that he does not get black or sleepy because of the medicine biting him.
E si vols, prengues coto e envolopes aquel sobre la extremitat del ray, e submergeys le coto en la medicina, e entrometas le ray am le coto en una canula de sobre entro que·l coto adheresca en aquela canula, e fay aquo tantas vetz entro que consiegues aquo que vols de la cauterizacio de la uva, e aprop leyssa aquela quar ela se seccara e cayra aprop tres dias o quatre.	And if you want, take hold of it and wrap it over the end of the tongue, and dip that into the medicine, and put the tongue into a tube; so that the end of the tongue sticks to that tube, and then pour the water used in cauterization onto that tube, and let it dry out for three or four days.
E si indigeysses que iteras la medicina, itera aquela, e aprop la cauterizacio abstergeys en le circuit de la uva am coto enbegut en boder, e mondifica am aquel aquo que es en le circuit de lu de la medicina, e sia lavat am aygua frega, e sia curat deforo am embrocacio, e dedintz am guarguarismes entro que sia sanat.	And if you feel that the medicine needs to be repeated, repeat it again, and Abstain from cauterizing in the circuit of the grape with the burning edge in border, and wash it with the water of friction, and cure it in front of the embrocation, and within that which is to be healed.
E aquesta especia de curacio es pus salva que inscizio e pus long de temor.	This type of treatment is more safe than cutting and less scary.
