Capitol .lii.	Here is the next sentence:
De curacio de eminencia del umbilic.	Of treatment for a high umbilical hernia.
Eminencia del umbilic es fayta per motas causas; o per fissuras del ciphac le qual es sobre le ventre, e yeys de lu la tela o budel segon que endeve en las autras rupturas; o per sanc le qual flueys de vena o de arceria segon que es denant dit, o per ventositat coarctada en lu.	The eminence of the navel is caused by various things; or due to the fissures of the navel which is on the abdomen, and the thread or intestine comes out according to where it breaks elsewhere; or due to blood flowing from a vein or artery according to whether it flows forward or backward, or due to air being trapped in it.
Mays si es per fissura del ciphac e per yssiment de la tela, lahoras la color del apostema es semblant a la color del cors; e es leon ses dolor, e aprop appar de divers situament.	But if it is due to the fissures of the navel and the thread comes out little by little, then the color of the apoplexy resembles the color of the body, and it is a painful pain, and you can see a variety of things.
E si es per egressio del budel, lahoras le situament de aquel am lu de aquo que havem recontat, de mays vehement diversitat, e cum tu premes aquel am les tieus ditz es occultat, e aprop retorna; e fort leu es am lu so, e es magnificat mot deves le introt de banh e vehement trebalh.	But if it is due to the escape of the intestine, then observe that part of the body which has just been mentioned, and if you press it with your fingers, it will return; and it becomes very heavy at the entrance, and it is a strong cause of great pain and work.
Mays si per humiditat, lahoras es leon e no es occultat quan premes am la tua ma, ni es constrengut, ni es cregut.	But if it is due to moisture, then it is painful and does not stay in place when you press it with your hand, nor is it constricted or fixed.
E si es per sanc, lahoras am aquestz senhals apareys le apostema a negror declinant.	And if it is due to blood, then the following signs appear: the apoplexy turns black and declines gradually.
Mays si es per carn nada, lahoras es apostema greu, gros e dur, e es ficat segon una quantitat.	But if it is due to flesh, then the apoplexy is hard, large, and durable; and it remains according to a certain amount.
Mays si es per ventositat, lahoras le tocament de lu es leon.	But if it is due to air being trapped, then the touch of him is painful.
E la operacio en lu es que consideras lahoras si la eminencia de l’umbilic es per sanc de arceria, o de vena, o per ventositat; lahoras cove que sias prohibit de la curacio de lu, quar en aquela es temor e paor ayssi cum t’e ensenhat en le capitol en le qual he dit les apostemas per arceria e per vena.	And the operation in it is that you consider if the eminence of the navel is due to blood flowing from an artery or vein, or air being trapped; then be careful not to treat it, for in that place there is fear and anxiety as I have taught you in the chapter on apoplexies treated with an artery or vein.
E si la eminencia del umbilic es per le budel o per la tela, lahoras cove que comandes al malaute que tengua le ale sieu, e sia stant extendut; e aprop senha am tenta en le circuit de tot le umbilic, e aprop comanda a lu que stia envers entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos, e aprop circunda am spatum lat en le circuit del umbilic sobre le loc le qual has senhat am la tenta; e aprop exten la maytat del apostema a las partidas desus am unci gran; e aprop lia en le circuit am fiel fort o am ceda e la manieyra del liar decent.	And if the eminence of the navel is due to an intestine or thread, then order the servant to keep his back straight, and he should stand with his feet apart; then cut off all the apoplexies up to its edge with a sharp knife in the same way as you have instructed him; and extend the large apoplexy of the navel towards the two shoulders with a strong grip; and tie it firmly around the navel, and put it around with a rope firmly.
E aprop huebre le mieg del apostema extendut sobre le liament e intromet le dit tieu en aquel indic e quereys le budel; e si tu l’as atrobat ni guardat per le liament, lahoras tu extratz alxorati e impelleys le budel a las partidas dedintz del ventre.	Then cut off the middle of the apoplexy by extending it over the navel and inserting your hand into that part and pulling the intestine; and if you have caught it with your hand, then stretch it outward and pull it away from the navel.
E si has atrobada la tela, lahoras pren aquel am unci; e inscideys las superfluitatz de lu.	And if you have caught the thread, then take it with a grip; and cut off its excesses.
Mays si es contraria a tu arceria o vena, lahoras circunda aquel mot, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio; e pren dos agulhas e met en aquelas dos fiels fortz e entromet dos agulhas en le circuit le qual has feyt entorn le apostema en manieyra de crotz, las quals fassas penetrar; e aprop strenh le apostema en quatre partidas sobre las agulhas.	But if it is against your artery or vein, then turn that part around and return to your operation; and take two needles and put them firmly in those two threads in the same way as you have made an incision around the apoplexy, so that they can penetrate; and tighten the apoplexy into four parts with the needles.
E si tu vols, osta las agulhas e leyssa le loc entro que poyresca la carn extenduda e caia per si; o inscideys aquel quan es subtiliat e se poyreys, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove dels enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And if you want to, stop the needles and let the place heal on its own until it is healed, or cut off that part when it becomes thin; but if you want to keep it longer, then cut it off with a sharp knife, and if it needs to be washed, wash it thoroughly; and heal the wound in which there is blood.
E si la eminencia del ombilic es de carn nada en lu o per humiditat, lahoras cove que tu conquaves le apostema ayssi cum havem dit e estraguas le sanc o la humiditat, la qual atrobas en lu, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove e que consolide le loc.	And if the prominence of the navel is made of flesh or by moisture, then cover that you make the absces to be herewith it and drain the pus or the moisture, which is there, and promptly cure that it covers and solidifies the place.
Capitol .liii.	Chapter li.i.
De curacio de cranc.	Of the treatment of the skull.
Ja havem dit, en la divisio, de specia de cranc e en qual manieyra es via a la curacio de lu am medicinas, e que es squivador en lu la curacio am ferr per so que no sia ulcerat; e havem dit cranc engendrat en la mayra e cautela de la curacio de lu.	I have said, in the division, of the kinds of skull and in what way it is to be treated with medicine, and that it is an innovator in the treatment to do it by iron so as not to be ulcerated; and I have said that a skull is conceived in the main and with caution in the treatment.
E diyssero les antics que alcunas veguadas cranc es en loc on es possibla la eradicacio de lu, ayssi cum de cran le qual es en las mamillas o en la coyssa e a lor semblantz dels membres allocat a estrayre tot aquel, e majorment quan es comensant petit.	And they said that some skull-heads are in a place where it is possible to eradicate them, namely, when it is in the breasts or in the crotch and similar to the members allocated to extract all of that, and especially when it is starting small.
Mays quan es antiquat e es gra, no cove que te propries a lu, quar yeu non pogui sanar de aquel alcu ni no he vist autre, ni que sia pervengut ad aquo.	But when it is old and big, do not cover it because I cannot heal that wound nor have I ever seen anything like it, nor that it has come into contact with water.
E la operacio en lu es quan es allocat ayssi cum havem dit, es que tu precedescas e laysses le malaute e purgues de colera negra alcunas veguadas, e aprop sagna aquel, si es atrobada replecio manifesta.	And the operation on it is that you go ahead and place the patient and purge him of black cholera with some pills, and promptly bind it if there is a manifest re-occupation.
E aprop prepara le malaute am preparacio en le qual sia locat am operacio, e aprop prohiceys en le trauc uncis les quals cove ad aquel; e aprop concava de tota part am la codena sego bona perexcrutacio entro que no romangua alcuna causa de las razitz de lu.	And promptly prepare the patient for the operation, and prompt the surgeon with the tools that will cover him; and promptly cut from all sides good thorough examination so that it does not cause any of the wounds of him to break open again.
E layssa correr le sanc, e no abscidas aquel leugierament, e exprem les locs, e abstergeys le sanc gros tot am la tua ma o am instrument am le qual es a tu possible dels instruments.	And let the pus run, and do not wash away that leeching, and squeeze the places, and abstain from that gross blood throughout your body or with the tool with which you can manage the instruments.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat de sanc gros inscizio de vena o de arceria, lahoras cauterisa aquela entro que·l flux del sanc sia cessat, e aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	But if you have a contrary feeling of that gross blood of a vein or an artery, then cauterize that within so that the flow of pus stops, and promptly cure it with the other treatment within so that it is healed.
Capitol .liv.	Chapter liv.
De curacio de ydropici.	Of the treatment of hydropesis.
Nos ja havem recomtat, en la divisio, de las specias de ydropici de l’aygua, e les senhals de quascuna especia, de la curacio de lu am medicinas.	We have already said, in the division, of the kinds of hydropesis of water and the signs of each kind, of the treatment with medicine.
E aquela la qual es curada am ferr no es sino la specia de althitas sola, e no es aproximat am ferr a la specia de timpanistres ni a la especia de yposarcha, quar aquo es mortal.	And that which is cured by iron is not but the kind of algals alone, and it does not approach iron to the kind of tympanist or to the kind of hypopares, for water is deadly.
E quan tu ja has medicat aquesta especia de ydropici timpanistre am medicinas e no comfereys la tua medicacio, lahoras considera, quar si al malaute ja es conseguida debelitat, o es am aquel autra malautia otra ydropici, ayssi cum si es en lu tos o cos de ventre e semblant ad aquels, lahoras guarda te que no le mediques am ferr, quar temor es sobre aquo.	And when you have already treated this kind of hydropesis with medicine and do not confer your medicine, then consider that, if it is already achieved in the patient's recovery, or it is another kind of illness, namely, if it is in his throat or belly and similar to those, then keep back from giving it iron, for there is a fear about it.
Mays si tu vezes le malaute de vertut exuberant, e am lu no es autra malautia sino ydropici tant solament, e no enfant ni vielh, lahoras la manieyra de la operacio de lu es que tu eleves le malaute entre las tuas mas, e le ministre aprop lu exprema le ventre de lu am la sua ma, enpellen la aygua a la partida dejos del pentenilh, e aprop pren spatum spinos segon aquesta forma:	But if you see that the patient is of an exuberant virtue, and in him there is no other illness but hydropesis only, and not child nor old man, then the way of the operation on him is that you raise the patient between your hands, and the servant raises it to its belly, pushing water out from the penis by means of a sponge, and promptly perform a spasm according to this form:
sia de dos partz agudas lonc, de aguda extremitat ayssi cum spatum; mays empero sia en lu alcuna brevitat petit a petit, per so que en la operacio am aquel no passes entro al budel, e que ledas aquel.	it should be of two sharp parts long, from 端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖端尖
E aprop considera si la generacio de ydropici es de part dels budels, quar lahoras cove que tu am la seccio te alonhes del ombelic per la quantitat de tres ditz a las partidas dejos, en le dreyt de lu sobre le pentenilh.	And now consider whether the generation of dropsy is from the intestines, because it seems that you have cut away three times as much at the navel, on the right side of him, over the fifth rib.
Mays si la generacio de hydropici es per malautia del fietge, lahoras la tua seccio sia sinistra del ombilic per tres ditz.	But if the generation of dropsy is from a hernia in the belly, then your section should be on the left side of the navel for three times.
E si la generacio de lu es per la melsa, lahoras la tua seccio sia en le las dreyt.	And if it is from the mesenteries, then your section should be on the right side.
E no cove que la tua seccio sia sobre le costat sobre le qual vol jaser le malaute per que no corron las superfluitatz ad aquel loc freul.	And do not cut away over the rib where you want to place the patient, so that the superfluity does not run to that place.
E aprop perfora am le instrument tota la codena, e aprop entromet en aquela seccio, e eleva la tua ma am le spatum entre la codena e·l siphac, e tu excorja aquel; e si’ la quantitat de una ungla o enviro.	And now pierce the entire cord with the instrument, and now enter into that section, and lift your hand up to the spoon between the cord and the scoop, and you shall empty out that one; and if the quantity is a finger or less.
E aprop perforo le ciphac entro que pervengua le spatum al loc vuoyt, e es loc de l’aygua.	And now pierce the scoop until it reaches the desired place, for that is where the water will go.
E aprop extratz aquel e entromet un instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	And now remove this one and now enter another instrument of which this is the form:
e es semblant a canula de argent subtil; es fayt de argent o de eram o de lato leon, al qual en la partida pus bassa de lu es un petit trauc, e en les costatz de lu so tres traucs: dos de una partida e un del autra partida; e fayta es la extremitat de lu insciza segon la manieyra de pluma, ayssi cum vezes:	It is similar to a silver tube that is very thin; it is made of silver or tin or lead, and at one end of it there is a small hole, and at the sides of it there are three holes: two from one side and one from the other side; and its end is turned back according to the feather-like method, so sometimes:
E en la extramitat de lu pus sobirana es armilla, quar quan le instrument perve al aygua, lahoras aquela tantost deysen sobre le instrument, donc evacua de l’aygua en la ora miega quantitat, quar si tu evacuas de aquela mes que no cove en la hora, fort leu mor le malaute per resolucio del sieu spirit animal, o accideys a lu cincopi que es appropinquada la mort.	And at the upper end of it is an armilla, because when the instrument reaches the water, then in that moment it must be lifted up on the instrument, so that it evacuates the water in half a measure, for if you evacuate from that less than you reach in that moment, very much weakens the patient by resolution of his animal spirit, or happens to him five times closer to death.
Mays evacua de aquela segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu e segon que significan a tu las disposicios del malaute de la vertut del pols de lu e de la bontat de lu.	But evacuate from that according to the virtue of it and according to what you mean by the dispositions of the disease of the pulse of it and the goodness of it.
E aprop extrats le instrument, e rete l’aygua la qual causa es quar tantost es retenguda per la codena la qual rete le trauc que es sobre le ciphac del qual e recomtat a tu que perfores aquel segon aquela manieyra.	And now remove the instrument, and keep back the water which causes this because it is kept back by the cord that keeps back the hole that is above the scoop about which I have told you that you should pierce it according to this method.
E aprop itera le instrument al autra dia si vezes le malaute tollerant aquo, e extratz de la aygua petita quantitat, e fay aquo per alcus jorns sobre temor, e guarda te de error entro que no romangua de l’aygua sino pauc.	And now repeat the instrument for another day if the patient is tolerant of water, and remove from the water a small quantity, and let it flow gently over fear, and beware of an error within that does not run out of the water but little.
Mays si tu temes sobre le malaute, e leyssas de l’aygua gran quantitat, lahoras cura aquel am sepultura en arena cauda, e mota suzor en banh, e al solelh espere per lonc temps; e cura aquel am medicinas dessicativas entro que sia sanat.	But if you are afraid of the disease, and let go a great quantity of water, then that one should be buried in dry sand, and its froth on the bath, and wait for a long time under the sun; and that one should be cured with drying medicines within.
E cauteriza sobre le stomac, e la melsa e·l fitge aprop la extraccio de l’aygua, segon que yeu he recontat en aquo que es precedit.	And now cauterize over the stomach, and the mesenteries and the belly remove water from the patient, according to what I have told you in that water there is preceded.
Capitol .lv.	Chapter LVI.
De la curacio dels enfants les quals so natz les locs de la urina no-perforatz.	Of the treatment of children who are born with the places of urination not pierced.
Alcunas veguadas alcun dels enfantz es eyssi del ventre de la sua mayre e·l cap de la sua mixtio no es perforat (o es trauc streyt o no es en son loc).	Some are born with the penis inside the womb and the head of the mix (or is not straight or is not in its place).
Donc cove coytar am perforacio de lu tantost que es nascut am spatum mot subtil segon aquesta forma:	So therefore it is necessary to pierce it as soon as it is born with a small spoon according to this form:
E aprop pausa en le trauc un clavil subtil de plom e ligua aquel, e te per tres jorns o per .iiii.tre.	And now place on the hole an iron pin of lead and connect it, and do so for three days or for 3000.
E quant vol urinar sia remaugut e hurine; e aprop retorne aquel.	And when he wants to urinate, let him rise and urinate; and now return it.
E si tu no pauses le plom, ja es possible que la urina la qual va sobre le loc, no leysa aquest claure.	And if you do not stop the lead, then it is possible that the urine which goes on that place, does not allow this closure.
Mays aquel del qual le trauc es streyt sia medicat am clavil de Plom, ayssi cum havem dit, per trops dias entro que sia amplificat.	But that one whose hole is straight should be cured with an iron pin of lead, as I have said, for many days within which it is increased in size.
Mays aquels en les quals es le trauc no en son loc, so leditz, la qual causa es quar de aquels, aquel que es nat e·l trau es deves la fi del cap de la vergua per que no pot urinar a las partidas dedintz, entro que eleva la vergua am la sua ma a las partidas desus; e no es a lu generacio, per so quar le sperma no pot pervenir a la mayre segon rectitut, e es malautia mot laga.	But those in which the hole is not on its place, should be led out, which causes this because of them, that one who is born with the head of the penis is the end of the testicles within it, so that he cannot urinate at the front, within it; and is not a generation, for then the semen cannot come to the mother according to its rectitude, and is a disease that is slow.
E la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que·l malaute sia envessat sobre le sieu dos, e aprop exten le cap de la vergua de lu am la tua ma sinistra am vehement extraccio, e inscideys le cap del cap de la vergua del loc del perpucii am spatum agut, ayssi cum es inscizio de pluma, o que tu ne razas alcuna partida, per so que·l mieg de lu vengua semblant al cap de la vergua e que le trauc caia en le mieg loc segon que cove.	And the way of doing the operation in it is that the patient should be placed on his back, and now extend the penis of him with your right hand for the purpose of its extension, and cut off the head of the penis from its place by means of a sharp knife, or do not cut any part, so that the water of the penis comes out similar to the head and the hole falls into its place according to what it reaches.
E guarda te que en la tua operacio de flux de sanc, quar motas vetz accideys aquo; e pausa te a lu am aquo que abscindeys le sanc, e cura la plagua entro que si’ sanada.	And beware that in your operation of the flow of blood, because it is not safe for him; and now pause at him with water that he cuts off the blood, and cure the plague within which if it is cured.
Capitol .lvi.	Chapter LVI.
De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	Of the treatment of the scrotum on the penis and the corruption, blackness, and adhesiveness of it.
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	Are seen in the penis and is a prominent piece of flesh.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	And of that one, one is malignant and the other is not malignant.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	Not malignant, you shall suspend it with a small oil and cut off that one within which it grows whole; and now place it on a piece of cloth under water, and now wash that one with Egyptian ointment; and now cure that one with the ointment every day until it is cured.
E si albater es maligna, de lega color, lahoras cove que tu aministres cauteri aprop la inscizio de lu e la razio de lu.	And if the albater is malignant, of a red color, then do so that you prepare cauterization near its incision and the reason for it.
Mays si albater es en le prepuci del cap de la vergua no-circumcis, e la una partida de albater es dedintz le prepucii e l’autra partida es defora, lahoras cove que tu ostes albater le qual es dedintz al comensament entro que es consolidat; e lahora tu cura aquel deforo, quar quan tu curas aquel ensemps le prepuci, no es asegurat que no sia trinquat.	But if the albater is in the scrotum of the penis, and one part of it is inside the scrotum and the other part is outside, then do so that you hold the albater which is inside at the beginning within which it hardens; and now cure that one which is outside, because when you cure that one by holding the scrotum, it is not certain that it is not torn.
E ja eysamen accideys en les genetius e en le prepuci negror e corruccio, adonc cove que tu conquavas tot aquo que ja es denigrat e que ja se vol corrompre o que ja es corrumput; e aprop lineys sobre aquel aprop aquo am mel, le qual es contusit am farina de scorsa de milgrana e de errs trissatz e crivellatz.	And already there are seen in the genitals and in the scrotum blackness and corruption, therefore do so that you conquer all that has already been blackened and that is about to corrupt or is already corrupted; and now place it on a piece of cloth close to water, which is made with flour of sesame and with three times finely ground eruca and trita.
E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	And now cure that one with the other treatment within which it should be cured.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	But if there is a flow of blood, then administer cauterization with the moon according to this form:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	Because cauterization with fire is in two positions, so it is in the flow of blood and in the plague when it is corrupted.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	And if the head of the penis is corrupted and has been destroyed all at once in that hour, then do so that you introduce a tube of lead into its meat so that the disease urinates through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the adhesion of the scrotum to the penis (and this adhesion does not happen unless it is in that one whose scrotum is detached, and on it circumcision is not required; and when adhesion happens for plague or for abscess) cut it out with an obtuse knife so that it dissolves the flesh and frees the head of the penis from all parts.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	And if it is difficult to cut off those beautifully, then do so that you cut away with a sharp knife the head of the penis and the scrotum, and now is because the scrotum, when it is thin, is very easily pierced by its thinness.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	And separate between the prepuce and the head of the penis as much as possible with water, so that it does not adhere to anything else.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	Then clean the skin with a wet swab until it is solid.
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter LII.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	Of the washing of children and of the treatment for those who have circumcision.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not enough for continence: but since it is part of our operation and our will, and because it is really useful in children, we must set out a better method and lighter course if we want to recover what has been lost through their fault.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	Therefore I say that the children of the freemen do not circumcise in some of their countries, because they do not use circumcision in their laws, but because they have acquired it by experiment, which is why I have amazed most of the artisans and barbers with circumcision and purification from the foreskins and scrotum; and they use a clean thread and a sharp scalpel on the foreskin.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	And I have seen all these ways; and I do not find a better way of circumcision than with the forex, with a clean thread, because the hair slips off more easily above it, since the cord of the prepuce is between two tunics, and the towel is above them, and it is easier to force another cut there, and it will surely cause more pain.
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	And the circumcision that is done with a knife, and which is done by men, is not safe to cut off the end of the male member, because it goes very deep into the flesh.
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	But in the operation with the knife, you will surely hurt and corrupt your own operation.
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the child's foreskin is short by nature, and it does not look like that which requires circumcision; and I have seen this one.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	But of the circumcision that is done with a knife and a clean thread, the goodness, experiment shows me that this is not true circumcision; because the sharpness of the knife that cuts makes it so deep that it is difficult for it to come out; and therefore, when you press your hand in proportionate length between two sharp things, and cut it according to a comparison at a certain time; and it is done by compressing the skin to form a shape containing the foreskin of all the penis, and which does not make an error from all.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	And the first operation is that you should hold the child firmly most of the time if he is small, so that it does not move; and that you should put the thread in the skin of his penis only a little bit, and that you should release him on the next day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	Then do this with all the care in the world so that it receives your intelligence.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	Then do this with the child between your two legs, prepared and not nervous; and hide the scissors in your hand or on your thigh, so that the child does not see them or any of the tools.
E aprop entremet la tua ma a la vergua de lu e suffla en la codena, e tira aquela entro que sia eyssit le cap de la vergua, e aprop mondifica aquel de aquo que es agregat en ela de sordicia.	Then put your hand on the child's penis and blow into the foreskin, and pull it out as far as it goes; then circumcise him from what is added to the skin of filth.
E aprop lia le loc signat am fiel dobla, e aprop ligua pus bas de aquel un petit le segon liament, e aprop te am le dit pous e endic tieu le loc del liament dejos am bona retencio, e inscideys entre dos liaments.	Then double the thread and tie it well; then bind a little of that thread from one side, and tie the other end with a good knot, and cut between two threads.
E aprop eleva la codena sus leugierament e estratz le cap de la vergua; e aprop leyssa le sanc corre petit e petit, quar es milhor ; e pausa polvera desus e sobre la polvera pausa drap en le qual es spandut mugol de huou coyt en ayguaros concosit am oli rozat recent bo; e layssa aquel sobre aquel entro al autra dia; e cura aquel am curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then raise the foreskin up a little and cut off the head of the penis; then pour a little water from a cup on that little piece, because it is better; and put powder thereon, and over the powder put oil of rose that has been freshly boiled; and leave him until the next day; and cure him with the treatment until he is well.
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The shape of the knife for circumcision, this is the shape:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	Let the extremities not be sharp and the others be sharp; so that there is no edge of the claw, and the length of both sharp things be like the length of two hand-grips held together.
Mays la error en mundificacio es quar fort leu efugeys la codena intrinseca tota, o partida de lu deves la inscizio.	But the error in circumcision is that it cuts off the foreskin completely, or it should be cut off; because it is a very deep cut.
Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Then I say that you should put your hand in the shape of a hook before the place where the thread is tied; and cut according to equality.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	And if you cannot hold it with your hand, then take it out with a knife and cut it.
Mays si son passatz tres dias, e roman aquo que es imflat dejos la vergua apostemat, lahoras tu leyssa aquo entro que sia cedat le apostema caut, e excorja aquel am fecilitat, e inscidex aquel segon que a tu es preparat.	But if they have passed three days, and it is swollen, then do not cut it; but leave it until it has come down, and wash it with water, and cut it with ease; and circumcise it according to the preparation that you have made for yourself.
E guarda te del cap de la vergua, quar no nosera a lu aquo.	And keep away from the head of the penis, because it will not be good for it.
E donc cura aquel am aquo que la plagua consolida de las polveras las quals havem recomtadas en le tractat de las polveras.	Then care for that child with water so that it is cured of the fever of the powders which I have recommended in the treatment of the powders.
E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if circumcision is done with the foreskin over the measure, and follows the shape above it, then do not know it to him.
E mays cura aquel am aquo que havem dit entro que sia sanat.	But care for that child with water which we have said must be cured.
Capitol .lviii.	Chapter LVIII.
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	Of the treatment of urine held in the bladder.
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Retention of urine in the bladder is done by obstruction due to fear or cold, or due to powder or food, and similar things, according to what we have said about ways of treatment in the division.
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	And if the urine is not dissolved, and the bladder's retention is due to fear which already lies in the neck of the bladder; then I say that the sick person should be made to lie on his back.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	Then place the sick person's legs on your two sides and raise his belly as high as it can go; and strain the urine as much as you can.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	Then let the neck of the bladder be constricted and expelled through the passage behind; so that the urine is completely discharged.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	And if the urine is not dissolved by water which we have said is violent; then I say that the cause is on the sick person; and you should deliver it with an instrument called a syringe, of which this is the shape: It is made of silver and very thin leather, like a long finger in length, and at its end like a needle of ash, so small as to go through a thread; and make it very sharp.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	And the manner of delivering urine through it is that you should double the thread and tie it well; then put its end in the hole at the end of the leather or cane by a good knot; and introduce the end of the thread into the cannula with haste, and cut off what is superfluous with scissors if there is any cause in the leather, but insert it into the cannula with force along with the liquid.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	Then lay him on his back, and wrap his bladder with cloth; and put oil of roses on the penis and pee; then wash it well.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	Then introduce the cannula with ease until it comes into contact with the head of the penis; then double the thread above that point and tie it well; then insert the thread into the cannula until it contacts the bladder, and that is enough unless it arrives at the cause that is empty; and if it does not arrive at the cause, but goes in the wrong direction, do so according to this order: first make a small hole in the place where you want to go.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And so stretch out the bowel slowly, because urine dries up the wool.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	So take out that one for cleansing urine, and use a ring, don’t stop making the water go in until the bladder is emptied entirely and the patient is given relief.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter .lix.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	On the quality ofbladder cleansing with a water-filled bladder and with an instrument that agrees to water.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When a bladder ulcer or abcess appears, or a perforation has occurred, and you want to distil water and medicine in it, then use an instrument called a clamp-holder, and this is how it is done:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	unless at the end of it is deaf, then it is closed.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in that there are three holes: two from one side and a third hole on the other side.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	In the beginning it is a tight place, where water is collected, and as much as it opples is added there, except that whenever there is a cause to remove moisture from it, it is removed, and when it is expelled long, according to which clamp-holder is used, oil of naphtha is applied to the ends of the vessel in the sea battles.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	So whenever you want to introduce moisture into the bladder, insert the end of the clamp-holder in the moisture, and shoot at the water that is pushed forward through its holes, because the moisture is shot into the cavity of the clamp-holder.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	And so insert the end of the clamp-holder in the rope according to what we have said in the ring; and so shoot the moisture into the water that is shot, because that moisture arrives at the bladder and at the patient's navel as well.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	Form of the subtle hook to which the bladder is hooked, and this is its form:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	And it should be made of silver or lead, which looks like a small feather at the top, and place a small bowl inside it neatly.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	And so take a bladder by movement, and place the humidity you want to crystallize in the bladder, and so connect that one between two clamp-holders with double fastening, and boil the moisture over fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	And so insert the end of the crystal hook in the rope.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	And so place your hand over the bladder with the moisture that is to be shot upward, in order that the navel may not be touched by that moisture that is to be shot up.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	But if you don't have a bladder present, then take a piece of pigskin and make a circle of it; and pierce that completely all around; and so insert the clamp firmly in those holes, some turned, and so add the ring as it was added before, since you are not stopping the water that you want to introduce moisture, and pour and water.
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	And so put that one in the instrument and make it on the bladder, and express your hand within so that the moisture reaches the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter .lix.
De extraccio de peyra.	On the extraction of urine.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already said in the division of urinary ingredients and the cure of it with medicines, and the difference between urine generated in the lungs and urine generated in the bladder, and the signs of that one.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	We have already said about urine in which catarrh operates, and its section.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	And the urine generated in the bladder itself is that which is retained in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And I will now present that one with a clear and concise exposition and abbreviation.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	Thus I say that urine generated in the bladder mainly comes out with children; and of the signs of it is that the urine excreted from the bladder is similar to water in its subtlety, and appears in that sand; and the navel rubs its ring, and there are visible traces of it; and at the water there is a sound like a rattle.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it is difficult to cure children with that, until they have reached twelve years old; and it is difficult to cure the elderly.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	But in young people it is half-cured by water, because it is between those.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And of that one whose urine is greater and the cure is easier; and if it is little, it is opposite to that one.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Thus when we come to the cure of that bladder, cover at the beginning of that bladder what we have said about the hook used to extract all the content from it; because that crack prevents the spread of urine by means of a probe.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	And so take the bladder from behind with a probe and place it in its cavity, or that one jumps from one place to another.
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	And so insert that one between your hands prepared, and the hands of it are on the sides of its contents, so that the whole bladder is turned downward in its holes.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And so turn that one and all of that outside.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	So if you feel the urine in the space, then sit down soon after sectioning it off.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if you don't leave it completely wet from behind, then cover that one with a ring of oil; and rub that one with oil, and insert it in the navel of the child, or the half-grown youth, and place that one on the navel.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	And turn the urine inside until it is outside from behind.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And you turn that little by little, until the neck of the bladder.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	And so press that one with your fingers on it, and shoot that one outside through its holes; and after the place where you have sectioned it off.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	And order the minister to press the bladder against his hand; and order another minister to extend the genitals towards the holes on his right hand, and pull back the ring that is left behind the genitals, from the place where you make the section.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And so insert an inkwell into it, and this is its form:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	And so split it into the water that is between the genitals, not in the middle place, and return to the back of the left hand; and make the section over that urine and the child's words are in the rear, and so make a transverse section, so that the section outside is wide and narrow inside, according to the amount of urine that is generated for it, and no more, because firm pressure splits the child's words that are at the back of the bladder, and so forced out.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And you should know that there is no water for which one to lean or turn away; therefore, the excretion of it is difficult by means of water.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And that urine is like milk, and is round, and its excretion is less frequent.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Thus if it is that one which is to be leaned or turned away, place in the section.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not like that, then cover that one on it, or hold it tightly on it with a firm grasp, at the end of which you are to push out that one; or insert something sharp into that one from behind.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	But if you can't stand on it, then increase the height of that one slightly, and if you see a flow of blood, cut off that one with vinegar dissolved in three parts.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if the urine is more than one, then at the beginning you shoot your hand into the mouth of the bladder, and so section it off on it; and so insert a small amount of water; and apparently make four, if there are more than two.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	If there is a great deal of pain, you must be unaware that you are cutting into an area with a large nerve, as the patient can suffer either from living with the pain or from frequent urination due to a blocked bladder, since the area is not completely solid.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	Then may the minister expel what is inside as well as what is outside, or engineer a fracture of the leg with pliers in order to extract it in pieces.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Then when you have completed your operation, fill the wound with aloe juice and dragon's blood, and strengthen it.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And place over it a cloth soaked in oil and vinegar, or in rosewater and rubbing alcohol, so that the wound may heal more quickly.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	Then return the patient to his bed on the third day.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when he has been unwrapped, clean the area with water and oil, and apply a poultice of vinegar and oil within which may be healing powder and tar.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	Then if in the wound there is an ulcer that hurts and burns, and from which urine escapes (and this is known by the exit of urine), then cut into it very narrowly with a sharp knife, since if it remains it may cause blisters and gangrene to develop in the bladder, and putrefaction to occur.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then wash the wound with vinegar, water, and salt, and in opposition to all kinds of poultices, with water that carries away the medicine within so that it may heal.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	And in all hours of the day you have applied both pillows and adjusted the medicines that were placed on the area.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	If the pain is slight and it is located in the middle of the foot, and there is no urination, then do not attempt any kind of surgery, since three times has this treatment prevented surgery; and if you spray water on it, and if you insert a steel needle into it lightly, for this is the way:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	of a triangular shape, pointed, and firmly inserted.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	Then return the patient to bed, so that the pain does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	Then insert the needle into the foot with ease in order to pierce it.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	Then turn the needle in your hand slowly, and you will pierce that small spot with it, and then pierce another spot on the other side of the foot, since the urine is soon relieved.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	Then place your hand on it where the pain is on the other side of the foot, since that spot is tender and there may be a rupture due to urination, and the patient will be healed.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	Then if this treatment is not suitable for you for some reason that prevents it from being applied, then return to the patient's side and apply another treatment.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	Then cut into the pain in the foot between two pieces of cloth.
E aprop extratz aquela.	Then extract it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	Then remove the bandage and clean the wound with water.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	It is not necessary to return the patient' side bandage to his body, but it is to prevent the pain from returning to the bladder, and the other bandage above it, since when the bandage is removed, the pain returns to its location, and causes a wound.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	Then for this reason, when you remove the bandage above it, you must raise the foot up, or else it will return to its original position and cause pain again; so do not take off the bandage above it until then.
Capitol .lxi.	Capitol.
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	Of extraction of pain from the female patients.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Pain in women is usually slight.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	Then if you experience any pain from any of those treatments, the treatment for that person is difficult and should not be applied using certain methods.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of these is that a woman's strong body makes her difficult to handle.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	Another reason is that you cannot find a female who will drink medicine when she is pregnant or breastfeeding, or is married to someone.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third reason is that you do not have any female doctors with this skill, mostly for surgery.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	The fourth reason is that the location of the surgery on women is far from the site of the pain, so you would not feel any pain during surgery, and there would be a risk of death.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	Then if necessity forces you to do this, return when you have found a female doctor who is skilled in this matter, and only a few are found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	Then if you are deprived of that person, search for someone who is gentle and subtle, or present a female wife who is respected in the matter of women, or a woman who practices this art well.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	Then present her, and order her to do everything that you command, from the examination of the pain until the beginning; which is why she should check if the woman is pregnant, then return her to her husband' side, and let her feel the pain.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	Then if you find that person, remove her from her husband' side, then order her to mark the area.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	Then if she is not pregnant, order the wife to place her left hand on her bladder, and press it gently.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	Then if you find that person, gradually remove her from the opening of the bladder to its edge with her finger, and let her feel gently where it hurts most.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	Then place her finger gently on the area where it hurts most, and let her feel where it is located in that spot, and order her not to move away from the pain with her hand.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	Then the incision should be small at first; then insert a needle into that area, and if it hurts, adjust the incision slightly according to the quantity that you know the pain will travel from that point.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	You should know that there are many types of pain: some are small and sharp, others are long and round, and some have edges.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Then you should know how many spices of pain there are for each kind of pain that you can feel on your body.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	Then if you want to check for fever, place three drops of vinegar on the spot and inspect it after an hour; then resume your operation before the pain disappears.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	Then prepare yourself with the instruments that are said to be used in extracting pain from men for your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	Then if you want to check for fever, and you know that the discharge of pain is due to the opening of an artery, then place some powder on the area, and apply a pressure cloth tightly; do not repeat this, since a strong person may die from blood loss.
E aprop cura la plagua.	Then heal the wound.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	Then when the pain becomes less sharp, you return to your operation before the pain disappears.
Capitol lxii.	Capitol 62.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	Of surgery on hernia.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia is nothing but an addition of moisture to the skin, which is left behind by the genitals containing water, and it is called cyphac.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	In some cases, it is in the proper skin layer which nature has prepared in the middle of the genitals, separate from each other like two husks; and this is the codena of the genitals between the skin containing water, which we have called cyphac, and it is not water but a substance like honey.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	And the generation of this hernia is due to debility which occurs in the genitals, so that this substance is infused into them, and sometimes it happens by injury made on the genitals.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	And this moisture is not moted in color, for the color of it or is declined to citron or to bloody, or rust, or is black, or is thick white, and is that water which is most.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	And the membranes by which it is drawn out are these: for if it is in the white cipha that I have said, then the apoplexy is gradually declining a little towards length as well as with figure of a bull, and appears on the genitals, since the moisture is present there.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the moisture is in the proper pannicula, then the apoplexy is gradually departing from the bull, and for this reason one supposes that it is another bull.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the moisture is between the genitals and the white cipha, then let him put a cushion.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	And as you wish to know the color of the moisture in the apoplexy that is placed between them, then let him examine the color of the moisture at the edge of the incision from which it has come out; and according to what it has come out of the edge of the incision, judge from that what is inside.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	Therefore when we come to the cure of it by fire, then let him order the patient to be fidgeted if that is possible, and often wash his clothes.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	Then let him be raised on a bed a little higher for some time, and let him put some sheets under him.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	Then let him be placed on the left side of him, and let the minister follow on the right side of him, who extends his cane to one of the two legs between the genitals and the part where the wonder of the belly begins.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	Then he takes a long spear and cuts the genitals at their root along the length near the penis.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	Then the section should be made according to the rule of distance from the line that you wish to make on the genitals, as far as it reaches to the cipha white in all its extent.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	Then let him extract it, and observe, and keep for this that you do not scratch it; and your extraction from the edge of the bull should be suspended a little more finely and carefully examine the extraction according to the quantity that is possible.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	Then he pierces the cipha completely with water by a wide perforation, and removes all the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	Then he separates the two lips of the section with a finger, and extends the cipha to its extremities; and do not touch the genitals together in all their extent, and extract it in that way that is possible for you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	Then extract it in all its totality or in pieces, and primarily its lower part, since if you do not scrutinize the extraction with care, the water will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	But if the bull is made to come out of its root at the hour when you have finished the section of the cipha, then return it inside, and then join the two lips of the genitals with a suture, and then care for that as well as for the other illnesses, until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if the bull is corrupted by some other illness, then let him be lifted up by its suspenders, and extract it, and then care for that with water which we have said.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	But if the water is gathered in two parts, then you will know that they are two hernias; therefore examine those parts according to what you have done to the other; and if it seems to you that it is an operation, then do it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	Then you should wash the wound and immerse it in oil or rose oil; and put another cloth over it which you have immersed in wine and oil, and spread that on the genitals and the wonder of the belly; and open a towel and powder, and lay those open by means of this form:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	Then put two clothes and make them wet with wool or water; and attach those extremities by means of a belt or of wet wool, and attach them to the underwear of the pants, and the one of the extremities should be taken from the rear between the legs, and the other to the part where the panty begins, and two extremities should be placed on two cushions which are left, and two extremities on two angels, and all attachment should be made in the belt of the underwear.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	Some people treat this hernia with surgery instead of cutting it out; and it is because you should cut the genitals with a fine knife and make an incision according to what we have said; then you should make an incision in the form that I have described, and if you discover white cipha containing water, then make cauterization according to this method:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	and it is placed in a Greek letter.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	Then the cipha should be pierced, and it is burned in such a way that all moisture is discharged.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	Then the cipha should be extended with needles and extracted with needles, and extracted by burning with a subtle fire; and extract it according to what is possible for you as far as you drive out all of it; and guard against the fire that the fire does not touch.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	You will know that this operation is closer to saving and further from blood loss, and better than an operation with a section.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	But if you have discomfort during the section or during cauterization or blood loss, then let him know what discomfort you have in return; and cure that with which it agrees for him.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	But if the hunchback is not very great, and does not expect the second operation for its horror, then administer an incision according to what I have said here; and it is when it is certified by you, according to that which has been said of signs, that this hernia is fluid.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Then let him be placed on a raised platform, and pierce the apoplexy in the part that is lower for a long spear, and stop the perforation according to the length of the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	Then make the incision wide in such a way that all the water flows out.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	Then let him be placed on the area where he has cut it, and let him leave it, so that the water runs away from it.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	Then care for that in such a way that the illness is healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if discomfort is to the excitement of water in that hour when you pierce it: and water does not come out except by that which the white pannicul in the orifice of the plague makes discomfort and prevents the exit of water, then let him put into the plague a small or instrument with which the water is extracted from the plagues; or adjust in the constriction of the plague a little one.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	You will know that water returns, and it is collected in a vessel within a few months or years; and when it has been gathered, then pierce it according to that method which I have said; for the hunchback will live its days that way.
Capitol .lxiii.	Chapter LXIII.
De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	Of Section on肉状 Hernia and the Treatment of It.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	You will know that in the section on this hernia is more dangerous to perniciousness in the major cases; but it is seen that its dismissal is and be saved by it for the better.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	I remember the operation of the apoplexy and the spices used in it.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.
