Therefore, I say that the apostems come to those whose genitals are joined together and occur for various reasons: or for acute excess of fluid, which is poured into the genitals, or for a blow.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And it is the color of the apothema according to the color of the body, and does not turn pale in pain, and it is a heavy apothema.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And a heavy apothema is the lapidated one, of which the color is dark, and there is not a feeling of heat.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	And some come because of the knotting of the arteries, and because of the swelling of those where it is already perceived the return of life, or because of the swelling of the veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	But that which comes from the swelling of the arteries is known by the disappearance of the apothema when we press those who tell it; and it does not seem that this touches.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	But that which comes from the swelling of a vein, by no means has its disappearance due to pressing those who tell it;
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible that this kind of apothema be caused by a section and on the other carns; and it is because you place the knot of the genitals, and approach the knives to their joints, and extract that of white cypress, and remove the suspenders of the vessels, and tie them together, and cut off those above all the joints of the knife.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Therefore, if the meat has already been hardened at those places, then you cut off that meat and cut it up.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is an adhesion for any reason in the middle of the genitals, or between them, then you cut off all that adhesion and cut it roundly.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if there is the birth of flesh in the place of the adhesion which is behind, then you cut off all that which belongs to him, and extract the testicles thus: you take them by the scrotum and hold them with one hand;
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when your operation is completed, then fill the wound with rosy oil and clean it well; and take care of that other cure until it is healed.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter LXIV.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	Of the Cure for Hernia, which is due to heat.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	There is an apothema wrapped in something that resembles grass for the softening of the testicles, and it is difficult to move or walk on the patient's back.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in the cure for this disease is due to fear because of which there is a return of life.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, you may say that surgery on those second ones, having first performed it on the first.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	And I say that you should place the patient on a raised platform; and approach the suspenders of the testicles to their joints; and hold the knot of the genitals with your hand between the legs that are stretched towards the knees; and keep those other servants who you are, and stretch them outwardly with force.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	Then cut with a sharp razor across the middle of those vessels on the right side where they are uncovered vessels.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	And then remove all that in one piece as if we have said above in the extraction of arterial tissue that is in the temples.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	And then fasten there one needle which is twice as strong, and tie that in the first place of those places where it happens to be vital, and tie another veil in the last place of them.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	Then cut those at their middle part with a right-hand cut according to the length of the body, and remove that which is joined together with the corrupting and putrid humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	Then care for the wound with a cure of the other wounds that you want to heal by producing them; for it is not good because of water.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if all the vessels are cut off, then the testicles should be extracted or, because of water, that they are torn away from the vessels; for they would lack nourishment by the cutting of the vessels and would wither away, or because of not being fertilized.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter LXLV.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	Of the Cure for Intestinal Hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The coming of this hernia is because of the cutting that is done in the middle of the white cypress which is extended on the belly from side to side of the navel's miracles, so that when those bowels break out through that breach they go into some one of those bowels.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And that breach is either from the middle or from the extension of it; and these two species come about for various reasons: or because of a blow, or because of noise, or because of clamor, or because of a sudden elevation for some heavy reason, or because of the resembling.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the sign of that is, when it comes from the extension of the middle, that it comes little by little over a long time and not suddenly; and it is an apothema within the navel because the middle cuts into the bowels.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the sign of it is when it comes from the cutting of the middle, for at the beginning there is a violent pain; and it is an apothema that makes a sound different from what is near, and the body trembles because of the extension of the middle.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And some come out with the bowels' cloth, and it is called this intestinal hernia zyrbal.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And some come out with wind, and some run in the bowels' fissure; and here it is re-absorbed, and at the water is a great harm to the patient, and some cause bad and greater pain when it is pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the cure for these diseases due to fear, so that he may escape the danger of being caught.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the manner of performing that operation is that you order the patient to return the bowels to their cavity if he obeys your return; and place his hands between your mas, and raise the feet.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	Then tie the knot which severs the genitals at their joints, and cut the knot entirely by the long; and fasten there two blades of a knife according to what you wish to eat; and then place those blades on both sides where you would cut according to your desire.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the cutting is according to quantity that it is possible for you; then from that take the testicles, which would be taken away through the hole.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	Then remove those white cypresses which are hard to cut at their joints, where they are uncovered; and place the knot of the genitals between them to keep them from moving.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Then you cut the testicle with the knife that is between cypresses; and which is hard to cut at its joint, leaving the knot of the genitals between them to keep them from moving; and cut off those adhesions which are behind the testicles.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	Then cut off the knot of the genitals at their joints, and stretch the white cypresses on its sides with your left hand, and lift them up to their joint; and command the servant to hold those testicles in front of you, and dissolve that adhesion which is behind by a complete solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	Then examine the genitals with your hands to see if there is any cause of the bowels being wrapped in the hard white cypresses.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you do not find anything wrong by touching; then place that one on your belly from behind.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	Then take a needle that is strong enough to break four threads, and put that one between the middle of the cypresses, which is under the knot of the genitals, and cut it; then tie those extremities together where they come out from the needle, making them cross in the shape of a cross; and fasten them together with some thread.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then wrap their extremities and attach those with violent pain to the bed, and those vessels that cause them not to be able to transmit any cause so that an apoplexy does not happen from here.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And another thread is attached according to the first thread, three inches from here; and these two threads leave the loop that is of the testicles the quantity of their size, and are cut all around according to the roundness, and are taken away from him the four.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then cut in two places that loop that is of the testicles by section from which run blood and pus, so that this does not happen again as we have already said in what we have said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then administer soaked wool in oil, and place it on the wound; and that thread that we have said is placed (and some of the loop white is cauterized, which we have said to place next to the cutting because blood may flow) and leave the thread inside so that it falls by itself.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	Perhaps if the bed-clothing is late, then water should be boiled, and placed on it according to what we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then heal the wound with the other healing of wounds within that it is healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter. LXVI.
De hernia ventosa.	Of the windy hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this windy hernia, there is nothing to be seen that has been burned on the healing of it.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first said that it is done thus as we have said in the hernia that is on the leg; which is to say, that you place the vessel next to the section carefully; and then cut on its own edge with oil into which run pus and blood, so that the vessels fall.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And heal the wound as we have said within that it is healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter. LXVII.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the droop that happens in the ankles.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Some break in the ankles thus as we have said, and the place is removed.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And do not put any of the intestines on the genitals; and if you do so, there is little; and return to it in all hours.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	Perhaps if the time is prolonged with it, a split appears in the loop within that the intestine is put on the loop; and this happens because the loop stretches, and then becomes soft and the place runs pus; and it is removed.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the healing of it is done thus as has been described before.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And some are healed with iron according to this way: and it is that the patient jumps on your two legs between your hands, and then cut off the place of the split pus by section for the length according to three inches.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then tighten the white loop that is under the testicles within that it is uncovered.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then pull the thread and place it on the edge of the loop, and pull it from the navel at the same time.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then cut off the two edges that are on the end of the loop, and adjust it with a stitch from one to the other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then remove the end of the thread, and do not cut off the loop completely, nor extend the thigh, nor any other cause as we have told you in the healing of the entestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And that is healed with the healing of wounds, and when you cut off the threads, wash it and restore the wound within that it is hardened; for the loop contracts and the prominence of the split is not adjusted.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cauterization is better in this place, because it is closer to being saved.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter. LXVIII.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	Of the softening of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	The testicles of some men are softened by water because the flesh between them is softened, and the watch is kept.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	And then, in the healing of it, let the patient lie down according to his two legs, and cut off all the loop that is softened on the natural loop; and then make a double stitch with it.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you want, cut off the superfluity of the loop that is softened by three or four cuts and a firm stitch.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then cut off between the stitches; and then heal by healing of the other wounds within that it is healed, and let the threads fall.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter. LXIX.
De castracio.	Of castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	You should know that in our law castration is prohibited, except for the reason that I remember it in this book; and it is not necessary to remember it except by two ways, of which one is that this is done in the science of the doctor when he asks about the healing of him on whom it happens; and the other way is that we need to castrate other animals for our pleasure because of them, as with donkeys, and horses, and pigs, and animals similar to them.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And therefore say that castration is done in two ways: either by cutting off or splitting by section.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	And in that which is done by cutting off, the way of the operation is that you should cut the animal's tail with a sharp knife within that its genitals are softened and made weak and let them hang.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take those with your hand within that they are relaxed and do not appear to be cold by the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	And in castration done by splitting and sectioning, be sure that you have the animal, and press the testicles of it with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then tie the suspenders, and cut off above each foot with a section within that two feet process in front of it.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then cut off those that are pus-like to you; and take away each excoriation.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave on the loop any cause, but leave the loop on the vessels that are under them.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this way of castration is better because it is done by cutting off, for cutting off strengthens the loins so that the beast does not desire to copulate.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then heal the wound within that it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter. LXX.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	Of the healing of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men is according to two ways: one is because it appears that the space in the loop of the testicles is cut; and this is a figure of a woman's cunt, for which there are two testes.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And some of that man has urine in the loop of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	And in women it is one kind of sex: and this is because the figure of the woman over the penis is as two testes of man a little less than half of what it was before; from the man's figure and his two testes.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the healing is according to three kinds: of the two men, and of one kind of women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	And it is that you cover those meats adjusted within that it removes the taste of it; and then heal those with the healing of other wounds.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second kind of men of whom you see urine in the loop of the testicles, there is no healing or operation for it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter. XXI.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of limping and of meat prominent for reasons of women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Limping that is strong is adjusted on natural causes within that it is stretched and it does not stop the watch; and in some women, it is enlarged to a great extent as it is done in men when they copulate within that it is spread out.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Then you have the superfluity of lancing your hand or finger and drain it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not finish in incisions, mostly in the membrane of the brain, so that it does not cause a flow of blood.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	Then properly cure that with the cure of the wounds before it is healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Might a newborn child is a child that lies in the womb of its mother until it fills that, and firm is to come out before the parts of the forethought according to appearance of cow (and therefore I will call this "cauda malautia"); then properly cure that with incisions before it is healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter .lxxii.
De curacio de alratica.	On the Cure of Gout
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	A gout is that the ring of the female is not pierced, or it is a small hole.
E es o natural o accidental.	It is either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is by gout that has preceded, and this is caused either by ill-prepared meat or by subtle rust or spice.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	It is either in the womb of the mother or in the legs of the child, or in the pus on top of it, or in the pus below it, and also prohibits bleeding and engaging in sex and childbirth, and firmly prohibits menstruation.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	And the knowledge of this is done by looking at the moon, if the opposition appears, then surely; but if it does not appear, then you seek that with the help of tools or from a beam.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if the opposition is by subtle rust, and it is between the two lips, then you cut and break it.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And that you place over the two lips powder, and place the fingers of both hands in front of them.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And the woman is on her back with her knees open, and place your hands over them with force until that subtle rust is broken and the opposition is opened.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	Then return the lamb to the place where you keep the olive oil and place that over the area, and rub it with your hand every day so that the place of incisions is not consolidated.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the rust is thick and spicy, then you have to lance it with a needle of lead or a leaf of mint.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	But if the opposition is by food, then suspend that with oil, and lance it.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And are given to you the medicines that stop the flow of blood by biting, also with an acacia, and blood of dragon and endives, adjusted to milk of cow.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	Then administer a wide lead needle that the plague is not consolidated excessively.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	And hold it by the two sides and administer four times of a day with warm water.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	Then properly be cured with another cure of consolidation before it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And in some cases it happens during the conception of other meats, and then properly lance according to this way.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if it is for hard meat, that hard meat in the womb has not caused a contradiction to be made in any way.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter.lxxiii.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	On the Cure of Hemorrhoids and Thrombosis that Occurs in the Vagina of Women.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are the appearance of small veins that run from the openings of the vagina, and if they become swollen, they are called acute hemorrhoids, and if they are old, they are called chronic hemorrhoids.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	You have already heard what is said about those and their signs, and also say those that receive the cure and those that do not receive the cure.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Then say that hemorrhoids and thrombosis are when they are in the womb and do not appear in the sense of the woman, then in those there is no cure with iron.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those that are in the opening of the vagina over which a woman feels pain, those are those who are cured.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	Then place the woman in a cloth of friction and place those with the scissors or an ugly cloth, and lance them with the razor blades and cut them with the razor.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	Then sprinkle on those the flow of blood from one of the powders that you lance with a bite, also with an acacia and similar to these.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	Then wipe your feet with a damp cloth for an hour, then place that in warm water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the flow of blood persists, then let that be boiled in a broth of sweet herbs and pepper and cloves and similar to these.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	Then return flour of wheat and make a paste with honey and wine, and put it on the two legs with your hand.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the blood is separated, then let it be; and otherwise, put it together with two windows, and make an incision on the nipples.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then return the lamb and immerse that in juice of coriander or of wild carrot or of grape must with your hand, and let that place be cured within it; and this place is cured from within.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	But if the meat is of harsh appearance, then you have to lance it with water that appears from there according to what I said in the engagement of engagement.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then cure that within so that it is cured.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter.lxxiv.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	On the Perforation of the Vagina in the Womb.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Small veins occur in the womb, and if they are hard and painful and ulcerous and pustular and wart-like and painful and thorny and other small veins.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	I have already said these diseases and the signs of those and the signs of those, and the cures of them in the division.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	Then I say in this treatises of perforation how you do the operation with your hand if you want to know how to operate.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Then you have to consider if the pain of the perforation in the beginning is acute with percussion and blood flow, and if that hardens and becomes painful over it, then do not pierce it, and cure that with water that helps within the maturation until the sharpness of the accidents ceases.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	Then you have to cut the woman on a bench that has two benches; and lean her back with her legs spread apart from the waist, and pause her knees below her, and tie them with a thread next to the water.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	Then the woman follows behind him and administer the instrument with which you will open the opening of the vagina, the shape of which will be according to those cases that will be proper.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And when you want to administer this instrument that your hand be on the ring of the vagina of the woman, and that which enters into the vagina is not more than the ring of the vagina and all the child.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	But if the instrument is larger than the ring of the vagina, then you have to place over its texture in the ring of the vagina so that it does not prevent the entry of any instrument into the ring of the vagina.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	Then you have to place the water that runs in the instrument from above and the minister has the instrument and turns it until it is filled with the opening of the vagina.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	Then when you feel excitement, and it is touched with your hand, and it is wet, then you have to dry that with a sponge.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	Then when the flow is stopped, then you have to place in the pus a needle dipped in rose oil or green oil and stop the bleeding in the section in the ring of the vagina.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	And he dip his hand in clean water and rub it on the head.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then, if it does not heal by itself within two days, put a paste of it into the wound and wash with water until it heals.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	And some are washed with milk and water, until it hardens like a crust; then dip the wound in water in which raisin or barley seed has been soaked, and dip it again into the poultice.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	If the wound is deep inside the head, you are forbidden to use any medicine on it until you have washed away the blood that has collected there; then you may use the water in which raisins or barley seeds have been soaked for a long time.
Capitol .lxxv.	Chapter .lxxv.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	Teaching midwives how to bind the wounds of women according to the diagram, in order not to cause nature to be disturbed.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	A necessary cause is that the midwife recognize in advance the natural figure of childbirth by the signs of the woman; and it is because when you see the woman express herself at the time of delivery, and she has a desire to smell the air, and above her there is something that comes out of her, and she hurries to give birth to it, then know that this delivery follows the natural figure, and that it is this one which comes out from above her head, or hangs down from her navel.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	So that the woman's belly is relaxed, in order that the fetus may gently descend because when it comes out over her head, it comes down; then let it be delivered, and with good hygiene deliver it from those excesses.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu .i., o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	May that which is the other part of this natural figure be unlawful, because when the fetus comes out it is on its feet and over its head; and the mother's back, or the breast, is before her head and her feet; and her mother with one hand. or it is on its head and her mother, or her navel; and it has a firm hold on the side of her head, like those natural figures that are not lawful.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	A necessary cause is for the midwife to be wise and skilled in all matters, and to guard against error and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And you will show all these figures, and what is hidden in them so that it may be understood by water, and rest on top of it.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the fetus is brought out over her head by natural effort, and this delivery is difficult; and sometimes the virtue of it has already been destroyed, then let them cut off the hair, or let them apply fenugreek poultice, and wash with water.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	Then the midwife will place herself between the woman's legs, and cut off that hair with a small blade, or rub it with her own hand, until she has removed all the moisture from it.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	Then press on the woman' belly so that she gives birth to the fetus.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	May she not deliver; then let the woman be crusted with a poultice of foxtail and a poultice of fenugreek applied.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	And let her be put in the crust until it hardens, and make her sneeze with a towel, for sometimes the fetus is stuck inside; and close her mouth and nose for an hour, because after this the fetus will come out by itself.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if two more of the fetus are stuck at the beginning, you shall decrease them little by little with ease.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	May she not obey the instrument; then let her sit on a stool and lift up her feet, and let the stool be placed on the ground; and the woman be held so that she does not fall down with the shock.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the fetus is not turned inside and dies; then let them be cut out of it, and take out the fetus with it, for it will come out easily.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	From the delivery of the fetus on its own feet.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the fetus comes out on its own feet, you shall encourage it; then make this little one turn over and over again, then pick him up with your hand, and put one of his legs into your mouth to pull him out.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	May the fetus come out between the legs; then you command her to contract herself, and make her sneeze with a towel, for sometimes it will come out by itself if God wills it.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not stuck with water that I have described; then you return the little fetus little by little until you reach the second natural figure, because this one will come out easily with a slight movement.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is forbidden to use all the water that I have described; then take a poultice of oak and of gum dissolved, and pound it well in the mortar with a good blow, and put it on the navel of the woman, from the bottom of her belly.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	And let him make a cut in the water that flows, so that he may achieve the hypochondriacs.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	When the contractions of the woman become less frequent; then apply to her sniffing with mint and stopping her breath.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	When you have sniffed her with mint for an hour, then let her sit on a stool, and make her sneeze, and open her mouth wide, and press the lower part of her belly slightly; because the fetus will come out easily after this.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	Delivery of the fetus from its own feet and legs.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the fetus comes out in this form, then you will encourage it to contract little by little; and let the woman sit with her back down, and her feet up, and her legs stretched out, and her knees bent, and her head between her legs, and her hands behind her back.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	Then press on the woman' belly little by little, and take out that which is under her legs from between her ears, until it is ready for the delivery of the lower part.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the fetus is not stuck; then pick up its legs and move them violently, and press that which is under them little by little, until the fetus can come out with the contractions of the woman.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	Then encourage it to contract little by little, and order the woman to contract herself until the fetus comes out.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	Delivery of the fetus hanging downward from its own feet.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	She is to be put in a state of relaxation; but if she cannot be relaxed, then lift her up and let her go down.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	If she cannot go down; then let her lie on the ground, and encourage her to sneeze with a violent blow, and administer those which I have described to you of the poultices.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	And if the birth has come; then let her sit on a stool, and study how to put the woman in relaxation, and take the fetus into the natural form, and encourage the woman to sneeze, and command her to contract herself until she is stuck.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	Delivery of the fetus on his back, with his legs and feet spread out, and his head between his legs, and his hands behind his back; the feet being higher than the head.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	Then let the midwife hold the fetus, and let her turn it little by little with ease.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is stuck; then let it be turned over and over again, then pause on the navel with that water and those poultices that I have described to you.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	Then order her to contract herself little by little, and when she has given birth to the fetus, let her sit on a stool with her back turned to the light, and let her be slightly bent forward, and order her to sneeze with a towel.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The exit of the fetus prepared over the side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When it begins to push out of the mother according to this method, consider, and then you cut the second one with your fingernail before it is evacuated from the moisture.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is suspended over the neck, then you cut that of the umbilical cord so that it is not held and dies.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	Then you push the fetus into the opening within until you hold it, and sends the woman that presses herself several veils, and the lord outside if not light, if God wills.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	The exit of twins or a bunch of fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twin fetuses are natural, and sometimes there are three or four, but this one is strange and hard to believe; there are five causes for a fetus to be dead, and not alive.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And count them, even if they are multiplied, a second one, and separate them with a string, distinguishing those entering the navel of each of these; And sometimes veils are separated by chance as it is a fetus naturally light, and some veils are separated by chance as it is a natural fetus light.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if they are difficult for them to achieve the pregnancy and reach the water that we have spoken of natural figures, then you care for them as we have said.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the woman is subtle and makes water that facilitates and subtlety, and tardiness, and is ingenious according to all figure according to which it is prepared of the engineer bringing salvation.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Remember that it is formed in the womb from embryos and Aborted are.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some are formed in the mother's one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and ten times, and it has been verified that a woman can get pregnant six times, and another ten times altogether, which causes pain to be felt by measuring the glorious wise ones.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all this covers that is in the science of the woman how strong it is to that small similar to water, and therefore stops at water that is small that covers.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter LXVII.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	Of the removal of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you care for the dead fetus with water that we have said in the division of medicine and is not outside it, and you necessarily use surgery with hand, then consider if the woman is of healthy virtue and is not from the accidents for which she is a lost cause.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then consider that the woman is lying on her side, and her head is turned so that her feet are raised.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	The minister should hold those two parts or be tied on the side that the head does not extend too far for the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	Then you wet the mouth of the mother with water to drink, and with astringent of althaea and fenugrec, and with semolina.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	Then you dip the woman's hand in water and in astringent, and then bring it closer to her body, and then close the door where the nails of the fetus are located.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	You place it in a convenient way: then consider if the fetus is prepared to put on its head, and then you fix the nails into its holes, or into its neck, or its mouth, or its palate, or leave it with a beard, or its fork, or the locations near the ribs, or leave them in the hypochondriacs.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	And if you send it over its feet, then place it on its back or side.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	Then consider if the nail is on the right side of the body, and pause the curve at that place which is between the ribs of the left side, and bring it with ease and fix the nail in one of these places that we have said, until it reaches the cause by water.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	Then you pause and fix in the position another nail, or third if necessary, so that it is a trap, and not an extension according to its rectitude, only.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	Then it is better from the beginning, so that the light of it is relieved in this way as it is made in the natural way of its root; and it is necessary to extract it with care, lest there be an infection.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	Then consider if it is in water that the extraction is softened; and if any part of it is held, then consider that the woman dips some string what we said to the oil, and brings it carefully and turns it with a stick, and dip it into water that is held.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Then if the part of the fetus is lost, then consider that the nails are switched; and do so in such a way as to put all the fetus out.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	And if the woman is relieved in front of the other one, and it is not possible to reduce that by the curve of it; then consider that it be wrapped over that; and you extract that within that all is out. And cut that or at the junction of the hand or at the wrist.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	Then consider that you draw the other hand and the two feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	And if the head of the fetus is large, or happens to the curve in the extraction, or it is on top of the water that is adjusted; then consider that you dip between the fingers spiky and sharp, and cut the head, and extract the water, or remove this one with an instrument called "alundada," whose shape will come close to the shapes of the other instruments in the chapter which is suitable for it.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	Then consider that if the fetus is of large head by nature; and then consider that you cut that with a tool, or take that with an instrument "alundada," as we have said; and then extract the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is out and is curved by nature; then consider that it be cut within that water that is spilt on the feet.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	And if it does not complicate or die by nature, then consider that you cut the head as soon as possible according to your power.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the fetus is left in the womb it is an abortion or it is in the water; then consider that you make a hole where the moisture is located.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	And if the fetus is over its feet, then the attraction of it is light and the direction of it towards the mouth of the mother is light.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	And if it is curved by nature above the belly; then consider that you extract that with cloth in which you wrap around your hand, and cut the belly and remove the water within that.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	And if the other members are held and turn the head; then consider that the woman brings her left hand; and if the mouth of the mother is open, then bring it with the right hand, and take the head with some string, and throw it into the mouth, and then dip it into water.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the mother is curved by water that it is like in the apple; then consider that it does not disturb above it; before you consider, bring a stream of moist air.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And administer emollients; and follow the patient in water that softens and moistens.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the fetus is over its rib; then consider that it is curved: and give to drink water that we have spoken of in the living fetus.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then it should be cut out and extracted.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And as for any causes left inside the second one.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed all of your operation, then administer the medicine that we have talked about for the cure in the eyes, which happens because of the main cause.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there is a flow of blood from the eye, then it should be washed with stinging waters and then administer the other cure.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have already seen a woman in her womb who was dead, and on top of that a pregnant veiled woman, and when the fire died out, the other one also died.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	Then it happened to him after a long time an eye discharge in his testicles; and it swelled up inside that fire, and began to burn.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to treat him, and I medicated him for a long time, but the plague did not subside.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I stopped it with some causes of strong attraction, and he discharged an arm from him, and after a few days, another one; and I was very astonished, because in the womb there was no arm.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	Then I realized that they were the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Then I cured the plague and extracted all of the bones, the woman remained in her own position, and I treated her in this way for a long time, and she got some relief from the pain of one arm.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not think it was strange, but because in that there is science and helping the sick with artificial means for a cure, administer medicine.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	of the shapes of the instruments that are necessary to extract the dead fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Shape of the turn that is opened by the mother:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the shape of strength in which you are bent over, and in which bending there are two turns at both ends of two limbs.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	But this turn, however, must be less rigid, and it can be made with a boy's rod or a boy's stick.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the length of each is a palm and a half; and the width of each is a palm and a quarter, and the thickness of each is a palm and a little more; and the width at both ends of each is two fingers, or a little less.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	These two additions are to be placed in the mouth of the mother so that she can open herself when you turn her two prescribed turns.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another shape resembling that, but less rigid and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Be made of wood or sticks according to the appearance of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	But in the end of him there are two additions like this, and the length of each addition is a palm, and the width of each is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the mother with these, then place her on her back with her feet hanging down, and it will be between her thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your mouth with the instruments in the same way as you would with forceps, according to the quantity that you want of the taste of the mouth of the mother before the medicine reaches it.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The shape of the turn that they called the little ones:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	The shape of the push that is pushed with it:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	The shape of the grip that holds the head tight:
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is assembled with forceps that have teeth at the end, like this, and some veiled women are done with them in this way according to this shape, with teeth, and they are cut off and held tight with them.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	The little shape of the grip:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	The shape of an uncircumcised penis:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	The shape of an uncircumcised penis with two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	The shape of the grip that holds the head of the fetus tight:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of the staff have two extremities on which the head is abseced:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two spatulas:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All of these instruments are exercised, and when the spices of that are multiplied and prepared by the artificers, how much is put in the operation and how much is put on men for their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And do not work of those instruments that is what it is necessary you should prepare, because the need for these is not excusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	The extraction of the second.
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the second is kept you command to the malady that it retain its ale, and approach that he stinks with condition, and strengthen your hand over the mouth of him and over his nostrils, and if by this it is out, good is.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then you take a wave and pierce in the covering a troch and stop in that herbs burn the mouth of the mother, so soothing and rough and it comes out and chamomile and Arabic and cassia and linden wood and saintly herb.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All of these herbs or some of them are submerged in water in the wave, and stop it on the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And approach a cannula of cane in the mouth of the mother, and keep that within which the evaporation comes to the concavity of the mother.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And approach that he stinks so as has said, and the second is gone out with speed.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	Mays if remains close this cure and not is discharged, then you command to the woman that it submerges its left hand in olive saponaceous or in a mixture of mint of altea, and approach injects those in the navel and seeks after that the second, and when he encounters it, then you take and extract that little by little Mays if is annexed to the preon of the mother, then injects its right hand that have repeated, and when has found the second, extracts that little by little according rectitude so that the mother does not catch again the violent attraction.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	In advance of which is changed to right and left with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And approach be adjusted in the quantity of attraction, because it will obey and will evade attachment.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the mother is closed, then we have repeated the cure with sneezing and with medicine of the wave with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	May if is not forgotten by all the causes that we have repeated, then you keep that not you do again to her in a sequence of abstraction, but when it comes out from him to the mouth of the mother lies in the cushion of the woman, and approach cristallizes that with oil and tetrapharmacon; because this will putrify that appropriately days and is dissolved and is forgotten.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	May when they are putrifying, it is of him elevated bad odor to the head and to the stomach, and that leads the malady; and then approach are administered sub- fumigacious and convenient to water.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	May some of the Ancients are already putrefied sub-fumigación of nasturcium and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Form of instrument am which the woman is sub-fumigated is what it is necessary you retain menstruation and the second:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	Be made of virgins or spayed one.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And be stopped the subtile extremity in the navel and the wide extremity over the fire, and the sub-fumigación is stopped over the braziers of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep that within which it is consumed that sub-fumigacion and repeat - another one.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	The cure of the rear end of the unperforated child.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	May children are not born yet and their rears are not perforated, those which already has made subtle and bright.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	And approach to the woman that it perforates its rear with sputum in advance, and keep that not it touches water.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And approach stop over that wool of smoke in the wind and oil; and approach cure that with oil within which is bright.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	May if you fear that it will be bright, then approach stop in the troch a cannula for some days, and prevent that when the child will want to change.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And that happens already bright of the rear because of consolidation of plague or of abscess; and then approach is cured with water that we have said of the cure and the dung.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	The cure of the fistulas that involve them.
