Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	Fistulas that are involved in the opening of pus is put into a sequence and thickness of those that are involved further from the rear or in the space of one opening.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or some drops.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And with that sequence is aged and is corroded by the acrid white or subtle putrefaction, and some of these fistulas are penetrant some.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those penetrant are recognized by water that is discharged of them for the egress and for ventilation; and some times use the exit of the woman, and strongly is discharged of them from those.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And so of those fistulas some recognized in the space penetrant into the bladder, and within the meat of the urethra; and so of those penetrant into the junction of the navel and into the neck of the uterus.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And water in which the fistula is penetrated into the rear and not penetrant, it is what you put the virgin's saying in the rear, and injects tries of spayed or of iron in the fistula when not it is used.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	May if in that is used, then injects tries of spayed or of horse hair within which you feel the attempt or the hair on the virgin's saying.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel that one completely or process any cause of egress or wind or ventilation, so as has said, then you know that it is not penetrant, and then prepare for the cure.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula is penetrated into the bladder or within the meat of the urethra, then the sign of it is completely of urine of that and prohibition of that at this moment that the place to the medicine is consolidated.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	May if it is penetrated into the junction of the navel or within the bone and injury of pain in the opening, then the sign of it is what the attempt penetrates here if not it is used within the bone, and injury of pain in the opening of the rear; and that of it is putrifying always; and that it does not enter into that medicine, nor is consolidated with oil.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those fistulas penetrant is not cure completely, and the cure of those is work and vanity of the medicine leaves about which are closed.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	May if it is not penetrated and is not aged, then the cure with iron is hoped according that you have recommended, and that already has heard and has used.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is what the woman dances between her two and raises the cambas of him within them, and the coyssas are inclined to the navel of him, and approach injects tries of spayed or of iron if it is used in the fistula aged, within which you know the place where the attempt penetrates.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if that woman turns the man around, then you approach injects the virgin's saying in the mouth.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel in the virgin' s saying the attempt has already penetrated here if not it is used in that cure, and then you know certainly that that is penetrant; and then do not work in that cure, because it is not in that cure.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But some say that it is healthy for some men to be tough.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And for the medicine by which one hopes to revive him, you should ignite a subtle cauterization according to the width of the fistula, and in this way, when it is preceded, and enters into the fistula until it reaches within that it comes into contact with the flesh; and then repeat that two or three times until you know that they are all attached those tissues that are like feathers of a goose.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then heal those with bandages wrapped around that it reaches all of those tissues that are attached, and then heal those with medicines that generate and consolidate flesh, and if healed, it is good; and if not, do not heal them in any way with another treatment.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the attempt enters and does not reach inside·l the master says that it is in the anus, and between the attempt and what is velament of flesh or of skin, and sometimes the fistula in something that touches the surface of the penis, then dry the penis from the beginning of the fistula, and you see if they are dried, and if not, separate them by a knife, and it is released through the fistula into that part where the tip of the attempt reaches, and thus the attempt is freed and cured.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then clean those fistulated tissues that are attached to a tube of a goose's beak, and they do not leak due to some other cause.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	But if the flow of blood comes out between you and your work when you are inside those tissues, then the milk that is and of the pus should be cleansed with a sharp instrument, either by fire or by acute medicine, because cauterization by fire fixes well: so it is attached to those attached tissues, and it removes the dry excrescence of the moisture.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then heal those with bandages wrapped around or with a trisse of flesh inside that place gets swollen, and then quickly heal the plague with a strong fire that generates and consolidates hard flesh.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And thus medicines in which there is stringency and excision; when they are restored, they are already healed, and you do not fear repetition.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the fistula has already penetrated into the anus' surface and is elongated, then the master says in the anus and examines it.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And so if the attempt is a hundred and between you and it is velament of skin or of flesh, and it is about to penetrate, then there is no operation in the syno in which one does not have trust and hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	The cause is to administer it in a way of three methods: either to cauterize it as we have said; or to dry it out within that you can reach the cavity with which one can possibly enter the fistula, and if necessary, separate them by a knife so that they do not cut the skin containing the penis, and to come across the patient's back slightly of their own will; and then heal those with water that we have said, because it is strong medicine that heals; or to elongate that velament and make pus that you dry out within that you can reach the anus' cavity, as we have said, either by the attempt or by another instrument with a sharp end, and then clean those fistulated tissues that are in the section within the anus, which you can do by perforation; and then try to restore the whole plague with a cut, and if the pus hole above it is not consolidated, and the fistula opens at the base of the anus, and leave pus out through the patient's back.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And in some cases the fistula ends according to this method: when you enter the attempt into the fistula, and it is at the back of the anus' surface next to the penis, then take an attempt with a sharp end, which is thus how one prepares wounds according to this form:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	and put it inside the envelope of five fields or into those; and then enter the attempt in the envelope within that you can reach the cavity,
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	But if it penetrates in the back of the anus slightly inside, then you take out the envelope from there, as you enter the master in the anus; and you pull out the end of the envelope and adjust its two extremities evenly, and you cut them both, and you leave it there for a day or two, and when it bleeds more, put it back into the flesh, and you can see those tissues that are between two extremities of the envelope that fall.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	And then heal the plague within that it is consolidated and healed.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	But if the orifice of the fistula is not penetrate, then make it so that it penetrates in some way, as it is not your task to do it so that you do not cut the skin; and then make it so that it is healed.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The shape of a pointy thing for the fistula to split: its curve is sharp and the other end is blunt, so that you do not cut it where it is unnecessary, as sometimes happens.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Of stitches of hemorrhoids in which blood runs out in the incision of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids as if they were made of wood, or because they are made of fat flesh.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And those are small and large, and the blood flows from them at any time, and they are just below the anus, and on their two ends.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	But those that are outside the anus are according to the second: because they have little moisture, and from which yellow water or a little blood flows continuously on the skin, and according to the color of the skin.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the cure for those inside the penis is that you order the patient to sit and press within so that the penis relaxes, and the hemorrhoids will appear to you.
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	And then you cut yourself and hang them on a nail or what you have in your hand, and then cut off their branches.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	But if the nails are not holding them because of their moisture and softness, then take them by a sharp or rough edge of a cloth, or a piece of stone or wool, and pull them out by the roots, and cut them off at the base where they join the body, and dust over them some powdered herbs appropriate for cauterizing, so that the blood does not flow; or cauterize them according to what has been said in the chapter on cauterizing.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And then heal those with the other cure before they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the anus does not obey the exit, then christen the patient with a small biting, and wash it with water that is in the penis and which obeys the exit slightly.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	But if the hemorrhoids are outside the anus, then the cause of them is slight, and it is because you pick them up with your fingernail or pick them up with a nail, and cut them off, and then heal those with water that we have said within that they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	And that person who performs the incision, let him prepare sutures for them according to this method: take an envelope wrapped with a field and put it in a needle, and then pull out the emorrhoid by its two ends, and wrap the two ends of the envelope around the head of the needle, and so stretch the emorrhoid strongly, and then cut it with the needle, and you leave it there; and then remove the needle.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	And do this to all of them, and leave one of them uncut, so that the excess blood runs from it.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And place on his rear side a drape in rose oil or in wax; and that one over the back, and commands the patient to rest.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And he lets fall that which is inside a box; and when it falls, he heals those with oil or with another cure within that which is to be cured.
De curacio de fistulas.	Of the treatment of fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Such things as are seen happen because of drying up of a wound or because of constriction in nature.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And with this old medicine that is not good for those things, let it be that you cut those things at the tip of a spit or at your own nail into moist humors and fed upon those by pus from above, which one forbids to consolidate; and he heals those within that are consolidated.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	Then let it be that you cut those things with a very sharp pus that the first within that are to be cured and are inflamed, and he heals those within that have been cured.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	Of the treatment of ulcers, as much as is needed.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	You know that if it is red in the whole body and more so in the legs and feet, and especially on the toes, and also because of which there is pain throughout the entire body, then one should be concerned about the liver.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	And then let it be that what is incised there is removed from the nail bed or with oil, and that it is cut off from its root; and he heals that one.
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize the second that precedes in the foot.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	May be a wart is a small, round, painful swelling on the surface of the body, and such things are seen in many children.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	And for the treatment of it is that you spread and incise it or that you open it with a chisel or within what is inside a box.
E si vols, cauteriza aquo, segon que havem dit, am foc o am medicina acuta.	And if you wish, cauterize it, as we have said, with fire or with acute medicine.
E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And they are removed in both directions with the instrument that I direct.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	May be a fungus is a small swollen area on the skin, and when it comes into contact with something, it feels like a fungal infection, and it happens all over the body.
E curacio de lu es que prenguas una canula de pena de auca o de pena de voltor, e sia fort, e pausa aquela sobre la formigua entro que la contengua le cercle de la canula de las partidas de lu; e aprop revolveys la tua ma am la canula entro que inscidas aquo que es en le circuit de la formigua, e pauses aquela en le preon de la carn, e que eradiques la formigua de la sua razit.	And for the treatment of it is that you take a tube from a pen or from a whip, and press hard, and place that one on the fungus within the circle of the tube, and then turn your hand around the tube; and he heals those that are on the side of the meat by pressing the tube against them, and cutting off the fungus from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish, make it with a steel or iron tube according to this form:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	May be the tip of the tube is made to go in easily, silent (if it is not a piercing one), wrapped around what that turns it from side to side.
E si vols cauteriza la formiga segon que es denant dit en la cauterizacio de atheyl en le capitol de cauteri.	And if you wish, cauterize the fungus as we have said in the cauterization of athyium in the capitulum of cautery.
De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	Of the shape of the instruments that are used to administer therapy.
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Some are made of silver or lead or fused or hammered; and some are made of small instruments and large according to those with which they are administered, because those that are administered in the treatment of small children are small; and those of those that are painful or painful are small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The shape of a large crystal:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	May be the tip of the tube is wide according to this way: and its distance from where the bag is tied in such a way that it may fall there several times.
E la extremitat de lu pus dejus, la qual es entromesa en le cul, sia sorda (so es no-uberta) mot leon, atrasent a subtilita; e en la un del latz de lu sian dos traucs, e en l’autre costat un trauc, e sia la amplesa del trauc segon la groseza dels rays e pus gros un petit.	And the end of it that is to be inserted into the anus is silent  (if not pierced) and is turned slightly toward the outside, being a small opening on one side and a larger one on the other; and that which is on the edge of the anus is made wider according to the thickness of the rays and larger at the end.
E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	May be the bag in which are held the medicines of animal bladder or of sheep's skin, and its handle be a palm.
E sia perforada per motz traucs ayssi cum es revolvuda; e si l’espazi le qual es entre les traucs la grossetut del dit.	May be the opening is made with sharp edges as it is turned; and if the space between the edges is large according to the thickness of the finger.
E aprop entromet en aquels traucs fiel fort de fiel cru le qual sia de detz fiels, o enviro aquels; e ajusta am aquel la borsa; e quan es pausada en lu la borsa, sia streyt en le cap del cristeri entre dos distingentz am fort costriccio, e aprop cristeriza am aquel quascun trauc: Mays la qualitat de cristerizar am aquel es que tu omples la borsa de la medicina, que sia escalfada segon la quantitat de la tolleransa del malaute; e guarda te que no sia trop cauda ni trop freja.	And it is inserted into those sharp edges with a strong thread of a red wine, which should be of the color of blood, and adjust to one the bag; and when it is placed in that one the bag, it is made straight on the tip of the crystal between two different and strong pressure, and he cuts each hole: May be the quality of cutting through one is that you fill the bag with medicine, which should be heated according to the quantity of tolerance of the patient; and you must not let it fall too much or become too sharp.
E aprop le malaute sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos, e eleva las suas cambas en sus e pausa dejos lu un cuer sobre le qual ja so les homes o un lansol; e aprop unta la extramitat del cauteri am oli o am album de huou o am mucellage de fenugrec o de semblantz; e aprop entromet aquel en le cul am facilitat, e aprop le ministre prengua la borsa e exprema aquel am doas mas e essemps am vehemencia entro que sia evacuat en le budelh tot aquo que es en le cristeri; e aprop extra le cristeri e le malaute leva las suas cambas a la paret.	And then the patient is to be raised on his two feet, and the bed lifted up so that the feet are over the footrest, and the minister takes the bag and presses it with two hands and forces it out into the body until all of it that is in the crystal is emptied; and he removes the crystal and the patient moves his legs away from the wall.
E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament.	And if the medicine forces it out of the body by force, keep as much as you can; and if it sleeps in that one for all a night, it is a sign of recovery.
Mays si tu cristerizas aquel en las malautias de solucio de ventre e l’eyssiment de lu le coyta, lahoras tu itera le cauteri entro que sia sanat.	May be if you cut those things with a sharp knife according to the treatment of flatulency and the pain of the gut, then do so within the crystal that is to be healed.
E si en le cul so emorroydas o apostemas ledens, lahoras sia le cristeri mot subtil e leon, dels cristeris am les quals les enfantz so criterisatz.	And if there are in the anus painful hemorrhoids or pus-filled cysts, then use a very small crystal; those of those with which children are treated are made small.
De curacio de las plaguas.	Of the treatment of blisters.
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	You have already said and done in the division of the treatment of blisters that it is convenient for the foot, and I say thus the treatment of those with feet and medicines according to the complaint.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	And so I say that blisters are different according to what causes them and according to the place where they occur on the body.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes of blister formation are due to heat of the weather, or incising a space or a knife, or striking with an axe, or with a spear, or similar to those that cause blisters.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	May be blisters that are in the places of the body are due to a blister that occurs on the head, or the neck, or the foot, or the belly, or the thigh, and similar to those of the limbs.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And I recommend the treatment of some blisters in order that that reasoning and rule may be applied to the other blisters.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	And I will begin with the simple blisters of the head, because the remembrance of the composed things will come at the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	And so I say that when it occurs on the head a simple blister is not broken, then consider: if it is because of heat or similar, and you have already tied up the knot so much only and it is a large blister and you are worried about a pus blister forming over the head, then you rest and take a light diet for some time, and do not delay taking medicine; and extract from it according to the quantity of its virtue if there is no other cause that prevents you from taking light food, especially if the blister is small.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	And it is the flabotomy of the opposite of the infected part; and keep the patient from eating rich food and from eating thick foods.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	May we then of the minuteness of the matter for any cause, let it be lessened by the food and not brought near to meat or drink.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And pause over the wound if it bleeds, a drop of rose water or wine let be put on it or in it which is dried up.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	May we then if it is certain that the wound bleeds, pause over it, if it is recent let him sweat and put air on it not having changed that powder which I will recommend to put small.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already changed that powder, then pause over ashes wet him up until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	May we then if the wound is large or by cut of a blade and similar things, and the lips are not closed by pustules, let those be sutured according to what I recommend about suturing them.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	May we then if the wound is already discovered from the bone and pen, and it does not retain it but only a small suspensory, let that be cut and cure the wound with medicines and restore the flesh to its place instead of coden, and command the patient that he eat food that is dry: cheese and fruitlet and similar things until it is healed.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	And if the putridness in the coden does not adhere to the bone, then let you cut all of it and remove it, and cure it.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	May we then if these wounds are artery or vein from which the flow of blood may come out, and it is not cured by medicines, then you inquire about the artery, and if you do not cut that that does not heal, let you cut it with a blade, or let you pierce it; and if necessity forces you to put what we have said, let you cauterize it so that the blood be stopped.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	And if these wounds are simple and small, the cause of them is little; therefore you put on those this powder, for once solid they do not change before the air.
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	And the way of the powder is this: take one part of olive oil, two parts of dragon's blood, three parts of non-extinct resin; all mixed together and well shaken, and if it is a wound filled with pus and confined by good constriction so that it does not adhere to it and coagulate on top.
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	And let you put those on the powder and leave it there, and not remove it while it is still like that so that it does not bleed, for it is not needed to be removed before being healed.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And some time later pour oil alone into the wound, when there is no need for you in present olive and dragon' blood.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And this operation should be done in large wounds when it is convenient to pause them on those and make them straight, and only recently wounded wounds whose air has not changed them.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And if the air has changed them, and mainly when it is in summer time, then do not put this powder on, but cure those with oil that we have said, or let you pause over them with a hot compress, or let you pause over their ankles with flour of ordi soaked in water and honey until they are healed; and let you cure those with other treatment until they be healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	May we then if a fracture in the bone occurs and it is small, then you extract oil with gestures.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor.	I will direct the cure of fractures in the head in the poison water.
De las plaguas del col.	Of wounds in the neck.
Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.	May we then if a wound occurs in the neck, let it not be treated differently from medication, and for wounds in the head when they are simple.
Mays si ja le nervi del col es inscis o arteria, lahoras si es nervi, no es en lu engen sino que sia evitada curacio de lu am aquo que fa vehement stipticitat, ayssi cum ziniar e zegi que es vetriol e semblantz a lor quar nozo als nervis e contrazo aquel.	May we then if the neck nerves are cut or an artery, let them be avoided with treatment of water that causes violent contraction, and also to rub it and oil that is bitter and similar to it for nerves do not grow there.
E no pauses sobre la plagua alcuna causa de tot freja, quar la sustancia dels nervis es freja e la continuacio de lu es am le cervel, le qual es le pus aut de totz les membres.	And let you not pause over the wound for any cause of all is fresh, for the substance of the nerves is fresh and the continuation of it is to the brain, which is the pus of all members.
E si’ aquo am que es curat de medicinas leugieras, ayssi cum es caus lavada am aygua dousa, alcuna veguada enfusa en oli rozat o no-rozat, e thucia quan es lavada am aygua dousa e las autras peyras minarantz segon aquesta manieyra, e enguentz humitz.	And if it is cured with light medicines, then let it be washed with double water, and put some drops of rose water in it, and wash it when it is washed with double water and other things to be mentioned below, and rub it.
Mays si la plagua es gran, lahoras aministra sutura, o coarta las labias de lu, e aprop cura aquela am pulvils entro que sia sanada.	May we then if the wound is large, then administer sutures or tie up the lips, and let those be cured with powder until they are healed.
Mays si a la plagua es profunditat o accideys en lu a la pus bassa partida poyredura, lahoras perfora aquela en le loc mays depremegut.	May we then if the wound is deep or it occurs in the pus that is low broken, then pierce it in the place most sunken.
Mays si en la plagua ja es inscisa arteria e es conseguit flux de sanc, lahoras separa o secca aquela, o lia aquela, o cauteriza aquela si necessitat te provoca ad aquo.	May we then if the wound is already an artery and there is a flow of blood, then separate or dry that, or pierce it, or cauterize it if necessity forces you to put water on.
Mays si ja ha insciditz les spondils del golayro o tot, e so salvadas las venas del col, lahoras tu ajusta las labias de la codena am sutura sobre la cana del golayro e no toques aquel; abantz egala aquel e reduzeys aquel sobre la sua figura natural, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent, e leyssa aquela per alcus jorns; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz en les quals es stipticitat e excitacio entro que sia sanat.	May we then if the spine of the neck is already broken and all of it, and the veins of the neck are only saved, then you adjust the lips of the coden with sutures on the cane of the neck and do not touch that; before doing so, make that one equal to its natural figure, and let those be strengthened by stretching them decently, and leave those for a few days; and let those be cured with rubbing in which contraction and excitement are caused until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquela, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.	May we then if the wound in the bone has already begun to heal, then strike that, and if it has fragments of bones, extract all that you can; and if it is not covered with cloth, leave it until the wound is healing, and let those be separated and its relief be obtained.
E si la plagua es recent lahoras polveriza sobre aquela polvera la qual t’e recomtada.	And if the wound is recent then put on it this powder that I have recommended to you.
Mays si en la plagua es fayta fistula, lahoras cura aquela am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra aprop en le sieu capitol.	May we then if the wound has become a fistula, then let those be cured with oil that will bring to mind that which is mentioned in the chapter of the head.
De las plaguas del col o de semblantz quan fayta entre las spallas e es fayta am spaza o am cotel o am lansa o am semblantz.	Of wounds in the neck or similar things when it is between the shoulders and has become a space, a cut, a lance, or similar things.
Si es percussio de lansa o de cotel, e vezes de lu la profunditat, lahoras considera mays si de la plagua yeys ventositat quan le malaute elena; lahoras sapias que la plagua es mortal.	If it is a cut of a lance or a cut, and many times deeper, then consider whether the patient has fever, for the wound is dangerous. You will know that the wound is deadly.
E si en lu no es profunditat e la plagua es recent am le sieu sanc, lahoras tu pauses en lu de la primieyra horo polvera, e no strenhas aquel per que no sia le sanc retengut en la profunditat de lu e que retorne al cor e que aucigua le malaute, mays pausa en lu enguent atractiu, e deslia aquela doas veguadas le dia.	And if it is not deep and the wound is recent with his sanc, then let you pause in it this powder for the first hour, and do not tighten that so that it does not retain his sanc in the depth of it and return to the pulse, but let you rub it gently, and leave that for two days.
E si l’enguent no es a tu present, lahoras tu pausa en le orrifici de la plagua coto viel per que sucque aquo que yeys de las humiditatz; e fay que le malaute dorma sobre la plagua per que corra aquo que es en lu ajustat.	And if the oil is not with you now, then let you pause in the wound a blade for sucking water that it has of humidity; and do so that the patient sleeps on the wound so that water runs through it.
Mays si ja de la plagua son passatz tres dias o mays e no accideys al malaute spasme ni tremor de cor mal ni strictura de ale, e vezes las autras dispozicios bonas de lu, lahoras sapias que plagua es salva; e adonc cura aquela am calguas e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanada.	May we then if the wound has passed three days or more and there is no spasm of the patient or tremor of the heart or constriction of it, and many times other good dispositions of him, then you will know that the wound is healed; and let you cure those with water and other treatment until they be healed.
Mays si la sanacio de lu es excusada, e ja tot temps es uberta, lahoras sapias que ja es fayta fistula; cura donc aquela per le sieu capitol.	May we then if the patient's healing is not finished and time has passed, then you will know that it has become a fistula; therefore let you heal those in his head.
E si la plagua es per inscisio de spaza o de cotel, e es simpla en la superficia del pietz o del dos, lahoras cura aquela am aquo que es precedit de sutura, si es gran, o am polvera, si es petita.	And if the wound is by incision of a space or a cut, and it is simple on the surface of the foot or hand, then cure that with water preceded by sutures if it is large, or with powder if it is small.
Mays si ja ha fayta enprecio en le os, e so ja de lu inscizas pessas, lahoras tu torqua la plagua e coyta ad extrayre aquelas pessas, si so separadas.	Mays si ja ha fayta enprecio en le os, e so ja de lu inscizas pessas, lahoras tu torqua la plagua e coyta ad extrayre aquellas pessas, si so separadas.
Mays si no so separadas, lahoras leyssa las entro que se poyresca la plagua, que la extraccio de lor es alleujada.	If they are not separated, leave them in place so that the plague can be removed later, which is a relief.
E de las autras plaguas accidentz en les autres membres le juvament en curacio es le juvament de aquo que havem dit.	And of the other plagues that happen to the other members, healing in therapy is the healing of water that we have said.
De las plaguas del ventre.	Of the plagues of the belly.
L’indisposicio la qual accideys en le ventre es o gran, o pauc, o migiera.	The discomfort that occurs in the belly is great, little, or mild.
De la gran alcunas veguadas yeys le budel o nervi del budel, per que es fayta intromissio de lor e la sutura de lor esser pus vehement e pus subtil.	With a great hernia, the intestine or nerve of the intestine comes out and the suture becomes more violent and more subtle.
E disrupcio petita es fayta dificil per autra manieyra, e siec se que la reduccio de lor es pus dificil, si no te coytes de la intromissio de lor al sieu loc tantost, quar se ubre e es engrossat per que le intrament de lu es fayt difficil.	A small rupture is difficult to repair in any way, and if you do not prevent the intrusion of them at their place, because they are open and thick, it will be difficult for the instrument to enter.
E donc la milhor disrupcio es migiera, quar en aquela no es dificil la reduccio del budel, ayssi cum es dificil en las doas specias denant ditas.	And therefore the smallest rupture is mild, because in that one it is not difficult to reduce the hernia, and so it is difficult in the two mentioned above.
E sapias que sutura del ventre es segon quatre manieyras, mays doas suturas son comunas que conveneysso en suturas de las autras plaguas del cors.	And you should know that surgery on the belly is done in four ways, and two stitches are common that also correspond to the stitches of the other plagues of the body.
E duas autras suturas proprias comunican a las autras plaguas, mays empero so mays proprias en la sutura del ventre.	And two other specific stitches communicate with the others, but only one is specific in the surgery of the belly.
E yeu recomti a tu quascuna am exposicio e declaracio.	And I recommend to you each explanation and description.
Donc dic que quan la plagua es petita e es eyssit alcuna causa del budel per aquela, e es fayt dificil a reduzir aquel, lahoras aquo es en una de doas manieyras: o per parvitat de la disrupcio ayssi cum havem dit, o quan al budel es venguda inflacio per la frigiditat de l’ayre.	Therefore I say that when the plague is small and no cause has been found of the hernia for it, and it is difficult to reduce it, this is done in two ways: either because the rupture is very small, as we have said, or when the hernia swells with cold air.
E donc quan aquo es ayssi, lahora cove que tu scalfes aquel enayssi que tu submerges una sponga ho drap humit en aygua tebeza sola, o que coguas en aygua squinant, e cyperum, e spic, e embroques am aquela le budel entro que la imflacio sia resolvuda.	And so when water is like this, then you must scratch it in such a way that you dip a sponge or a damp cloth in tepid water alone, or that you take some water from the sea, and cypress, and mustard, and mix it with the hernia before its swelling is resolved.
E alcunas veguadas fa aquo vi en le qual ha stipticitat, e es milhor que la aygua sola en resolucio de la imflacio.	And some ruptures make water come out, and it is better than water alone in resolving the swelling.
E donc cum tu vezes la imflacio esser resolvuda, lahoras tu humecta le budel am aygua en la qual es coyta altea e malvas, quar per aquo es alleujat le intrament de lu am pauca causa.	And so when you see the swelling resolved, then you humidify the hernia with water that is slightly warm, because water relieves it for a little cause.
Mays si es escusat le intrament de lu aprop aquesta curacio, lahoras scindeys la disrupcio un petit am strument am le qual so inscididas emorroydas.	If the instrument is not suitable for this therapy, then you will have to cut off the rupture with a small instrument in which the hemorrhoids are embedded.
E la curacio primieyra es milhor, quan es propriada que no es seccio, e no sia occupacio a seccar aprop necessitat e defaliment.	The first treatment is best when it is appropriate that it is not cut, and there is no need to dry out by habit.
Del instrument, sec se la forma de lu:	About the instrument, tell me its shape:
La una partida de lu torta aguda, e l’autra partida no-acuta, e la extremitat subtil, e no sia am la subtilitat de spatum, abantz sia obtusa un pauc.	Does the hernia possess the edge of the instrument or another way? The one end is acute, and the other end is not acute, and the subtlety is thin, and it is not the subtlety of a blade, its edge being somewhat blunt.
E donc cum la plagua es amplificada e yeys fora le budel, lahoras cove que la sua reduccio sia segon la forma de lu natural, en le sieu loc propri, si es possible sobre aquo, quar milhor es.	And so when the hernia is enlarged and comes out of its place, then you must reduce it according to its natural shape in its own place, if possible above water, because it is better.
Mays quan la disrupcio es ampla, e es en la partida pu bassa del ventre, lahoras cove que tu fassas jazer le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa las suas cambas pus autas que·l sieu cap; e si es en la partida pus desus del ventre, lahoras tu pause le cap de lu e·l pietz pus autz que las partidas dejos.	If the rupture is wide and is in the lower part of the belly, then you should put the patient on their back with their legs raised above their head; and if it is in the upper part of the belly, then you should place the head of the patient and their feet higher than the parts where they are.
E semblantment si la disrupcio es en una de las doas partz del ventre, lahoras pausa la tua entencio e la tua consideracio tostemps en aysso per que la partida en la qual es la plagua sia pus auta que l’autra.	And apparently if the rupture is in one of the two parts of the belly, then you should pause your intention and consideration momentarily so that the part where the hernia is may be higher than the other.
E ayssi cove que tu aministres aquo en las plaguas grans e en las plaguas migieras.	And so you should prepare water for the large and small plagues.
E en las plaguas petitas, pausa aquo que es a tu preparat, e aprop fay que·l ministre sia entre las tuas mas pyatados, le qual tengua la disrupcio tota am la sua ma e ajusta las labias de lu, e aprop descuebre de aquela ad aquel que siec la sutura alcuna causa aprop autra.	In the small plagues, pause the water that is at your disposal, and so that the minister is between your five fingers, which has the entire rupture together with it and adjusts the lips of it, and so you discover the cause of the stitch in place where the hernia occurs.
E aquesta es la manieyra de sutura comuna: una que prenguas la agula, o comte de agula segon la cantitat de la amplitut de la plagua; e aprop layssa de la extremitat de la disrupcio del dit anular, e strenh la agula una, otre que tu no metas fiel en las doas extremitatz de la codena, am doas extremitatz del ciphac que es dejos la codena de las partidas dedintz, entro que fassas aquela penetrar de aquela partida; e tu ja has agreguadas doas extremitatz de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, e so faytas quatre ordes.	This is the common way to sew: one that you hold the needle, or consider the needle according to the quantity of the plague's width; and so you leave the end of the rupture of the little finger, tighten the needle a little, or other than what you put into the two ends of the thread, leaving the ends of the threads inside, as long as you put that the needle enters that part; and you have added two ends of the thread and four orders.
E aprop strenh am fiel doble en le circuit de la agula, e alcunas veguadas de doas partz ensemps, e aprop agregua las doas labias e la plagua per agreguacio decent; e aprop layssa la grossitut del dit e fiqua una autra agulha en aquela, e aprop lia aquela am fiel ayssi cum fiest am la primieyra agulha; e no cesses far aquo si es necessitat am las agulhas entro que ajas complida tota la contriccio de la plagua.	And so you tighten the thread a little in the circuit of the needle, and some ruptures are made from two parts together, and so you add the two lips and the plague by addition; and so you leave the thickness of the thread and you fix another needle in it, and so you tie that with the first needle; and you do not stop making water if there is a need to make needles while you have not completed the entire repair of the plague.
E sian las agulhas migieras entre groceza e subtilitat, quar las agulhas subtils mot leugierament insciden la carn; e las grossas so de dificil intrament en la codena, e donc per aquo cove que sian migieras en subtilitat e grosseza.	And the small needles are between grace and subtlety, because the subtle needles cut the flesh easily; and the thick ones are a difficult instrument in the thread, so that by water you make them be of both subtleties and graces.
E no cove que la agulha sia ficada en doas extremitatz de la codena propdana mot, per so que la carn no sia inscidida leugierament e que la plagua se huebra devant la sua consolidacio.	And I do not know that the needle is fixed in two opposite ends of the thread, because flesh does not easily cut easily; and the plague may become established before its consolidation.
E no sian prolonguadas de sutura per que la plagua no sia prohibida de consolidacio.	And the stitch should not be prolonged so that the plague is not prevented from being consolidated.
E aprop inscideys las extremitatz de las agulhas per so que no ledescan le malaute deves le sieu dormier; e pausaras sobre la sutura pulvils expanduts de tota partida, les quals tenguan las extremitatz de las agulhas; e layssa aquelas entro que sapias que la plagua ja es consolidada.	And so you should insert the ends of the needles so that they do not cut the patient in his sleep; and you pause on the stitch of all parts, which hold the ends of the needles; and you leave them where you know that the plague has been consolidated.
E aquestas specias de sutura am agulhas en cal manieyra es pus convenient en las plaguas petitas, quar habasta en la sutura de lor una agulha o doas o entorn aquelas.	These types of stitches with needles are more convenient for small plagues because they only require one needle or two or turn them around.
Mays la segonda sutura es cominal: e es que tu aministres am sutura las quatre extremitatz, de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, en una veguada, am agulha en la qual sia fiel envolopat engual en subtilitat e grosseza.	If the second stitch is done in a similar way: and so you provide for four ends, of the thread and two extremities of the cord, in one seam, with a needle that is wrapped in both grace and subtlety.
E aprop quan am la agulha auras penetrat aquestas quatre extremitatz, reduzeys la agulha de aquela meteyssa partida de la qual comensest, per so que le fiel retrayt caja de la pus subirana partida a la plagua, per so que la sutura sia segon sutura de drap am la qual les draps so strengutz.	And so when the needle enters these four ends, you should reduce the needle from that part where it began to enter, so that the thread does not come out of its first part and does not separate; and the stitch should be according to a sutura de drap with which the draps are strong.
E pausa entre quascuna sutura la quantitat del gros del dit mendre.	And you should leave between each stitch the quantity of the smaller thread half.
E aquesta sutura sabo les homes.	This stitch is good for men.
E am tal sutura yeu cozegui la plagua la qual era accidida a un home en le sieu ventre le qual era stat plaguat am un cotel, e era la disrrumpcio de la plagua major de un palm, e era eyssit dels budels entorn dos palms del budel del mieg loc e era la disrupcio en le mieg del membre; e adonc yeu reduzegui aquel depus que le budel havia stat foro la plagua per xxiiii horas.	With this stitch I healed the plague that had affected a man in his belly, who was stabbed with a knife, and it was a rupture of two palms of his navel; and so I reduced it after twenty-two hours.
E la plagua fo consolidada en le spazi de xv dias o entorn, e curegui aquel e es sanat; e aprop aquo visquec per motz ans, e es conversat en las suas disposicios.	And the plague was consolidated in the space of fifteen days or less, and I healed that patient and it was cured; and so you should drink water for its cause to be discovered.
E les autres metges havian jutgat que no fora sanat; e per miracle foc, quar yeu no curegui aquel am enguent, quar era en loc en le qual enguent no era atrobat ni deguna medicina, mays pausegui sobre la plagua coto viel dos veguadas lo dia e ablucio assiduo am aygua de mel entro que foc sanat.	And the other limbs had not been healed; and by a miracle of faith, because I did not heal that patient with medicine, but I put him on the plague for two days, and he washed himself frequently with water from honey within which he was cured.
Mays yeu diyre dos specias de sutura proprias segon narracio de Paraula.	May you direct two special sutures according to the narrative of the Parable.
E es que tu comenses am sutura de la codena, e entrometas agulha de la partida deforo a la partida dedintz.	And that you begin the suture of the tendon, and introduce the needle from the outside into the inside.
E donc cum la agulha penetra en la codena e en aquel meteys lacertz segon rectetut e en longetut de tot le cos, e layssa la extremita del ciphac en le qual has entromesa la agulha; e fay penetrar en la autra extremitat la agulha de la partida dedintz a la partida deforo en l’autra extremitat del mihat.	And so with the needle penetrating into the tendon and in that place of the knot according to prescription and in length of all the thread, and leaves the end of the thread in which you have introduced the needle; and make it penetrate into the other extremity from outside to inside in the other extreme of the wound.
E don cum tu auras fayta aquela penetrar, lahoras tu fay aquela penetrar autra veguada en aquela meteyssa extremitat del mihat de la partida deforo a la partida dedintz; e leyssa la extramitat del ciphac que es en aquest latz, e fay penetrar la agulha en l’autra extremitat de la partida dedintz a la partida deforo.	And so when you have finished that penetration, then do another penetration in that extremity of the tendon from outside to inside; and leave the end of the thread that is in there, and make it penetrate into the other extremity from outside to inside; and leave the end of the thread that is there, and make it penetrate into the other extreme of the wound from outside to inside.
E fay penetrar am aquela la tua penetracio am la qual fas aquela penetrar en le ciphac en la extremitat del mirat la qual es en la partida de lu entro que tot aquel penetre.	And make it penetrate with that one of yours in which you do the penetration in the tendon in the extremity of the wound that is in the inside where everything enters.
E aprop comensa de aquest meteys costat e cus aquel am la extremitat que es del ciphac en l’autra latz, e extratz la agulha de la codena la qual penetrec, e aprop redutz aquela en aquela codena e cos la extremitat del ciphac que es en l’autra costat am aquesta extramitat del mirat; e extratz aquela de la codena la qual es de part de lu.	And then begin from this side and make that one on the other side with the needle that penetrates in the tendon, and take out the needle from the knot, and make that one of yours in which you do the penetration in the extremity that is on the inside of the wound; and take out the needle from the other side of the tendon.
E fay aquo una veguada e autra, e fay aquo una veguada aprop autre veguada entro que tu cozes tot aquo que es deforo segon aquel eysemple.	And do this one and another, and make this one inside that other; and do all of those things that are there according to that example.
E la suma de aquesta manieyra de sutura es que tu cozes am sutura de pellicies am la qual cozo las pels, enayssi que tu cozes le ciphac una veguada de la part de la extremitat de la codena, e que leysses aquela autra veguada entro que la ajas complida.	And the sum of this method of suture is that you sew with a needle through the skin, and that you make one stitch on the tendon from the outside of the extremity; and leave that other stitch inside where it is complete.
Mays la segonda specia de sutura propria la qual dieys eyssament Gualia , e aquest es de sermo de lu e per lu recomtat, es que tu cozas aquela segon semilitut am la qual alcus medicantz cozo aquela, enayssi que agreguan tota partida a la sua compar partida a lu convenient per natura; e aplican la extremitat de autre de lu e la extremitat del mirat al autra extremitat de lu, e aquo es fayt segon que yeu a tu recomti.	And the second type of special suture that you will direct is called "Galia", and it is from the speech of him and for his recommendation; it is that you sew that second stitch on the tendon in the way that doctors do, adding all the thread to one side of it convenient according to nature; and apply the extremity of this one to the other extreme of it, and here is done according to what I have directed you.
Cove que tu fiques la agulha en la extremitat del mirat a tu propdana de la partida deforo, e fassas aquela penetrar a la partida dedintz en aquel sol, e leysses dos extremitatz del ciphac; e aprop revolveys la agulha e fay aquela penetrar de foro a la dedintz en dos extremitatz del ciphac.	And when you have the needle in the extremity of the wound that is in front of you from outside to inside, and make that one penetrate into the inside in this thread, and leave two extremities of the tendon; and then turn the needle around and make that one penetrate from outside to inside in the other two extremities of the tendon.
E aprop revolveys aquelas cascunas, e fay penetrar quascunas de la partida dededintz entro a la partida deforo en dos extremitatz del mirat autras que so en le latz contrari.	And then turn those cushions around, and make any of them penetrate from inside to outside in the other two extremities of the wound that are on the opposite side;
E aquesta manieyra de sutura es milhor de la sutura comuna leugiera, e es sutura de la qual precedic rememoracio.	And this method of suture is better than common suture with thread, and it is a type of suture from which I have reminded you before.
Aquest es le sermo de Gualia	This is the speech of "Galia".
E mays le diyssero alcus, sutura del ventre es rectificada am dos agulhas, so es que tu entrometas en aquestas a quascunas un fiel, e comensa am intromiccio de agulha de aquo que es deves tu, e fay aquela penetrar entro al autra latz segon sutura de aquels les quals cozo les cuers engualment.	And they call it "sutura del ventre", which is corrected with two needles, so you introduce the needle in them, and begin to make the puncture from this side according to the suture of those whom you have directed to sew with your hands; and make that one penetrate into the other side according to the method of suturing with hands.
E sapias que quan disrupcio es en le mieg loc del ventre, lahoras la sutura de lu es pus difficil que dels autres locs del ventre.	And know that when there is a rupture in your belly, the suture of it is more difficult than that of other places in your belly.
Mays le juguament de medicacio de plagua es jutgament de las autras plaguas.	And the judgment of the medication of gout is the same as for the other gouts.
La qual causa es quar quan tu consieguas la plagua recent am le sieu sanc denant que l’ayre altera aquela, e reduses le budel e cozes aquela e aptas aquela decentment, lahoras pausa sobre aquela polvera encarnativa.	And it is caused when you get the gout recently before that air changes it, and reduces the hernia and sews it up well; then apply over that blood-red dust.
E si le ayre ja ha alterada la plagua, lahoras pausa sobre aquela alcus enguentz les quals so a tu presens entro que fassan peyra dura e cajan les fiels, e sian consolidatz ciphac e mirat; e aprop cura aquela ayssi cum es la curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And if the air has already changed the gout, then apply over that with water and those who are in it, so that they do not make a hard lump and fall out, and that they are consolidated tendon and wound; and then treat that one as you treat the other gouts according to what heals them.
Mays si a tu no so presens las medicinas, lahoras pausa sobre aquela tantost, pus que comensa a getar brac, coto viel, e permuta aquel dos veguadas le dia, ayssi cum a tu e ensenhat, entro que sia sanat, quar tu no indigeysses de autra medicacio en motas disposicios quan las plaguas so simplas.	And if you do not have the medicines, then apply over that for a little while, because it begins to burn, and change that one of those every day, as I have taught you, according to what heals them, because you do not need any other medication when gouts are simple.
Mays si tu temes que la plagua comunique en lesio als membres principals, lahoras cove que tu submergas lana leon en oli de trempada qualiditat, o en oli rozat, e pausa aquela en le circuit dels locs que so entre les angonas e dejos las aysselas.	And if you are afraid that the gout will spread to other limbs, then apply that you immerse wool in oily solution with a quality of water, or in rose oil, and leave it there; and apply over those places that are between the joints and leave them wet.
E si sent dolor o putrefaccio en les sieus budels, quar motas veguadas aquo s’endeve, lahoras cristeriza aquel am vi stiptic negre tebe, e majorment si la poyredura es pervenguda en le budel e es fayta exitura penetrant entro la conquavitat de lu.	And if you feel pain or putrefaction in your hernia, because it is not visible, then apply a black stain on it with the vi stiptic, and more so if the putrefaction has reached the hernia and there is an outlet penetrating inside the cavity of it.
E sapias que aquela que es del budel gros es de pus leugiera sanacio que aquela que es en les budels subtils.	And know that those who are in your belly are more likely to heal than those who are in them are in a small belly; and that those who are in the belly are more likely to heal than those who are in them are in the gut.
E es de dificil sanacio quar le budel le qual es apelat “gegunu” no recep sanacio de plagua que caja en lu de tot; e aquo es per la gran multitut de venas que so en lu e per la magnitut de lu que so en aquelas, e per subtilitat del cos de aquel, e per propinquitat de aquel a natura de nervis.	And it is difficult to heal because the hernia called "gynecomastia" does not receive the gout that gets into it from all sides; and here is due to the great number of veins that are in it and to its size, which is small there, and to the proximity of that one with nature of nerves.
Mays si aquo que procezeys de la plagua es la tela, e conseguas aquela recent, redutz aquela segon la tua rectetut am la qual reduzes les budels engualment.	And if what you are doing for the gout is the same as that which I have directed you to do, and you reduce those hernias according to my prescription with hands; and if it is the recent one, then reduce that one according to my method of reduction with hands.
Mays si es passat a lu spazi e ja es feyt vert o negre, lahoras que tu strenguas aquela am fiel sobre le loc que es denigrat de lu, per so que vengua fluxs de sanc, quar en la tela so venas e arterias.	And if it is passed on to that space and has already become black or green, then apply that one with a string over the place that is corroded by it, so that blood flows out; because in the belly are veins and arteries.
E aprop inscideys aquo que es otra aquel liament, e pausa dos extremitatz del fiel pendentz de la partida dejos de la plagua foro lu, per que sobre tu sia alleujada la atraccio de lu deves le cazement de la tela e emissio del brac de la plagua.	And then cut off that one with the other string, and make two extremities of the string hang from the part of the wound where they are at the outside; so that on your side is not attracted what you need for the repair of that one, because it is necessary to make a small hole in the belly through which flows out blood.
Rememoracio de las plaguas quan accideysso en le budel.	Remembrance of gout when it happens in the hernia.
Quan accideys disrupcio en le budel e es petita, lahoras es possibla que sia resteurada en alcus homes, per aysso quar yeu vi aquel le qual era stat plaguat en le sieu ventre am percussio de lansa et era la plagua de la part dreyta del stomac, e la plagua era antiquada e fayta fistula, e eyssic de lu gestio e ventositat.	When there is a small disruption in the hernia and it is possible that it will return to those men; because I saw that one which was stat plaguat (gout) on his belly with a lance, and that gout was old and made a fistula, and it came out from its stomach and had a fever and a feverish feeling.
Adonc yeu pansegui la curacio de lu ja sia que no era confizat en la sanacio de lu, mays cessegui subtiliar aquel entro que foc sanat e le loc es consolidat.	And then you see that the treatment of it is not certain for its healing; but leave that one inside where it is cured and the place is consolidated.
E yeu pus que vi le loc ja consolidat, timegui sobre le malaute que endevengues sobre lu accident de mal en le sieu ventre; e no endevenc alcu per aquo mal accident e romas en las suas milhos disposicios mangant e bevent, e aprop entrec en banh e es exercitat en sos ditz.	And then I saw that the place was consolidated, and I left on your belly the accident of the bad one in his stomach; and do not do anything else, but enter into a bath and exercise yourself in it.
E ja diysero alcus experimentados que quan endeve plagua en le budel, e es petita, lahoras cove que sia liada segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu prenguas fromiguas de grans caps; e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua e pausa una fromigua de aquelas que aja la boca uberta sobre las doas labias de la plagua; donc quan pren sobre aquelas e strenh la sua boca, abscindeys le cap de lu, quar adhereys e no es dissolvut.	And they say that when there is a small gout in the hernia, then apply this method: and it is that you take a piece of cheese with a big hole in the middle; and then place those two pieces of cheese on the mouth of the hernia, and stretch them; then when you put one over the other and squeeze them together, cut off the top part of it because it adheres to it and does not dissolve.
E aprop pausa autra formigua prop la primieyra, e no cesses aquo a far am formiguas una aprop autra segon la quantitat de tota la plagua.	And then place another formiga next to the first one; and do not stop applying those formigas like this according to the quantity of all the gout.
E aprop reduzeys aquela e cos la plagua; e romanguan aquels caps annexces en le budel entro que·l budel sia sanat; e no accideys al malaute degun nocument.	And then remove that one and cover it with a cloth; and those attached caps to the intestine, until the intestine is healed; and do not harm the patient in any way.
E ja es possible que·l budel sia liat am fiel subtil lo qual es fayt del budel de bestia annexs am lu, pus que es mes en agulha; e es que tu prenguas la extremitat de aquestz fiels de budel, e sia mot descarnat, e aprop lia la extremitat de lu am fiel de li, envolopat, e aprop entromet aquel fiel en agulhas e cos am aquel le budel, e areduzeys aquel en la disrupcio.	And now it is possible that the intestine is latched onto a thin thread that comes from the animal's intestine; because you take hold of the end of these intestinal threads and it is sharp; and it is because you grasp the end of these intestinal threads, and it is sharp, and then you wrap the end of them in a thread, and then you put the thread around those needles and tie them together with that thread, and then you cut off that part.
E aquesta manieyra de sutura am formiguas no es sino segon via de fiducia e d’esperansa.	This way of stitching with sewing needles is only a secondary and backup method, but it is a reliable and hopeful one.
Mays si la plagua es gran e ampla, majorment si es en un dels budels subtils, quar lahoras no es engen sino subtiliacio, e no es sanacio de lu de tot.	Maybe if the wound is large and wide, especially in one of the thin intestines, because then there is only suturing and not healing completely.
De curacio de zuchem e fistula.	Of cure for the swelling and the fistula.
Sapias que tota plagua e apostema quan se envilheseys e se Antiqua, e es fayt ulcus, e no es consolidat e geta braç tot temps e no es abscindit, lahoras, en qualque membre sia, universalment es nompnada fistula e nos la apelam aquela azukem.	Know that any swelling or pustule that becomes red and swollen, and is a ulcer, and does not heal and keeps getting bigger all the time, and does not dry up, but rather gets worse, in any member, is called a fistula in general, and we call it a boil.
E fistula segon veritat es nodacio feutrada, dura, blanqua am la qual no es dolor e a la qual es conquavitat ayssi cum es conquavitat de pena de ausel; e per aysso nompnat aquela alcus rizatz, id est pena.	And a fistula in truth is a hard, white, and painful wound, and it is concave like the pain of a bruise; and for this reason it is called an alcus rizat, that is to say, a wound.
E es en alcus homes humida, la qual geta brac; e fort leu la humiditat es abscidida en alcunas horas.	And it is in men's wet wounds, which keep getting bigger; and the moisture dries up in some hours.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta humiditat es mota, e es pauca, e es grossa, e es subtil.	And sometimes that moisture becomes dry, and it is little, and it is thick, and it is thin.
E yeu ja he denant dit en la divisio, lahoras cum yeu diyssi las plaguas, que tot ulcus que no es sanat ni no es en lu nuda carn, no es aquo sino per una de ix causas: de las quals la una es o per pauquesa de sanc en le cos; o per malicia de lu; o quar entre lu e las labias es carn dura prohibent nativitat de carn; o quar es de mota legesa; o quar aquel ulcus en si meteys es poyrit e la materia que es a lu tramesa es de mala qualitat; o quar la medicina es enconvenient en la curacio de lu; o quan corrupcio catz en la regio, e es pestilencia; o per proprietat de regio ayssi cum endeve a Saragossa , en la qual es fayta difficil degestio de las malautias, e es tardada en aquela sanacio de apostema per natura; o quar en lu es os un, o motz osses.	And sometimes that moisture becomes dry and hard, and it is little and thick because of one of these nine reasons: either because of pain in the flesh; or because of maliciousness; or because there is hard tissue between it and the lips; or because it is due to a leak; or because the wound is infected with matter that comes out; or because the medicine is inappropriate for treating it; or because corruption spreads in the region, causing a plague; or because of the nature of the region itself, which makes the treatment difficult and delays healing by nature; or because there is an ossicle, or multiple ossicles.
Ja e mostrat totas aquelas causas, e·ls senhals de aquelas e la curacio de lor am medicinas en la divisio.	I I have shown all these causes, and they are linked to those, and the treatment of them is discussed in the text on medicines in the division.
E cove assi que yeu fassa a tu saber la curacio de fistula la qual es fayta per via de operacio am ma.	And I have shown you how to treat a fistula, which is done by surgery with the hand.
E sapias que fistula accideys en totz les membres del cos; quar de aquelas son fistulas que perveno a las venas grantz e arterias, o als nervis, o al ciphac, o al budel, o a la vesica, o ad alcuna de las costas, o ad alcu dels spondils del dos, o ad alcuna de las juncturas compostas per composicio ayssi quo de la ma e del pe; e de aquelas so que dan a lu propinquitat del membre principal e de semblantz.	Know that fistulas occur in all parts of the body; because they reach the large and small arteries, or nerves, or bowel, or bladder, or any of the spinal bones, or any of the joints formed by two bones joined together, and this is due to the nature of the hand or foot. And from these similar causes arise those that affect the near parts of the main member; and they are called fistulas according to their location.
E donc aquela de aquestas fistulas que es segon aquesta manieyra es de las malautias de dificil sanacio, e no recep curacio, e occupacio am aquela es trebalh e ignorancia.	And therefore of these fistulas, the second type is difficult to heal and does not respond to treatment, and it takes a long time to heal and requires work and ignorance.
E si es de las fistulas alcuna la profunditat de la qual no perve ad aquestz locs que e dit, e esperas e confizas en la curacio de lu, e vols pervenir a cognicio de lu, lahoras pren tenta de eram o de ferr, e si la fistula va segon rectetut, e perquireys aquela am lu.	And if any of the fistulas is very deep and does not reach those locations that are mentioned above, and you wait and trust in the healing of it, and want to gain knowledge of it; then try to pierce or sew it, and if the fistula goes according to plan, and you inquire about it.
